summary: AI-powered photo & video creation‚Äîfast, fun, and effortless with Quick Actions

scraped_reviews.content: It's supposed to have Quick Actions such as Captions. It's been God awful trying to do anything that's supposed to be a Quick Action and it just won't locate files on Android, even connected to Google. It just won't do it right. Three minutes puts you back to about 2001- slow, but it finishes. And why does it have to back out, save, reload just to attempt the captions in the first place. I'll go with captions by another party like Edits or use desktop.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Johnnica! Sorry about the trouble with Quick Actions, especially captions. Could you share a screen recording of the workflow where it fails to locate files via our community here: adobe.ly/adobeexpresscommunity? That would help us understand what‚Äôs happening on Android and get this checked by the team. ^SV

scraped_reviews.content: Ever since they've forced your work to be "on the cloud," it's become almost unusable. For some reason they seem to think it's a good idea to take local graphics, make you upload them to work with them just to download them back except so many times, they either get stuck in the download or you have to wait forever for them to get "back online," and no, clearing the cache doesn't change anything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lew! Adobe Express uses cloud storage to securely save your projects and keep them accessible across devices. This means a stable internet connection is essential for smooth editing and downloads. You mentioned downloads getting stuck, can you share if it stops at a certain percentage or with specific projects? ^Sonali

scraped_reviews.content: Not as good as Photoshop Mix, what has now become inaccessible. You need a premium account to use the eraser! Everything is "AI", when it works its quick and easy, but 99% of the time it churns out rubbish and you can't improve it without staring again, again and again. Would be greatly improved with the addition of 'specialist' tools like: Erase, select, magic select.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thanks for sharing such detailed feedback. We hear you on wanting more control with tools like erase, select, and magic select, and we‚Äôll share this with our team as a future improvement. Can you also tell us a bit more about which AI tools you‚Äôve tried that feel unreliable? That‚Äôll help us understand better. ^SV

scraped_reviews.content: *Edited (12/16/21) to say: SInce the recent change to this app, all I can say is that if I had subscribed, I would be greatly disappointed with the "new" changes and how much is no longer offered for Subscribers. Pity. Changing my original 5 stars to 1* I LOVE this app! I only wish I could purchase it instead of paying monthly/yearly, which I will not do. I'll continue to use the free version and hopefully, one day, changes will allow for a one time payment purchase.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We hear you. Thanks for sharing your thoughts on the recent changes and the subscription model. At the moment, Adobe Express is available as free or subscription-based, and we don‚Äôt have a one-time purchase option. We‚Äôll share your feedback with our team as it helps shape future improvements. ^SV

scraped_reviews.content: This app had been one of my favorites for editing photos/generating ads-- it was quick and easy to use. The newest update changed that-- it's now clunky, slow, and not intuitive (best example of this is the number of steps it takes to add text, and the reduced resolution of your work) There are so many great photo apps, I suggest you look beyond AdobeExpress for one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Really sorry the update disrupted your workflow. We‚Äôd love to know more about what feels clunky or what text steps feel too long. For the resolution issue, is the quality dropping during import or after export? Let us know so we can look into it. ^SV

scraped_reviews.content: They offer a free trial, to see if the app will do what you need, it isn't free. They charge you right away and when you call they say they cannot refund your money. Google Play has to refund me. The app didn't do what I needed, it's more a photo editor app in my opinion, I needed to create something. I thought that is what trials were about, to find the app you need. Don't offer something if you can't deliver, just say pay, let the consumer know what they are getting.: exactly reiterated.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ouna! We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience. Trials are meant to help users explore features, but we understand how this feels. It looks like one-on-one live support will be the best option for you. Please head here [https://helpx.adobe.com/support.html] and select the chat button in the lower-right corner of the page. ^SV

scraped_reviews.content: For the love of all things good in this world, please go back to the old version. This app was user friendly, and I cannot get it to function at this point. All the blank templates seem to have disappeared. I used to pick the layout and could make the border the size and color I wanted (what border...). I'm not a huge fan of technology, so being able to jump in and design something quickly was a bonus for me. I'm so frustrated now I'll probably just uninstall the damn thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We are sorry for the experience you are facing. Our community of experts can help you get to the bottom of this here: https://adobe.ly/adobeexpresscommunity. Please share your app version & the screen recording of the action you're performing. Thanks! ^SV

scraped_reviews.content: You have to log in to desktop to use the images. Update: the above issue seems to have been resolved. My latest issues include not being able to use the app at all (despite paying money for it, it was buggy and not granting me access). After wasting a lot of time with customer support, they convinced me not to cancel... By offering me a free trial for three months. I agreed... Unfortunately, instead of providing a free trial, they decided to be sneaky and instead bill me twice a month.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, sorry to hear about this. Definitely not what we want to hear. Have you tried reinstalling the app? If that doesn't do the trick, you can get help from our community of experts at (https://adobe.ly/3DS568s). Thanks! /SI

scraped_reviews.content: A damn good site for anything you want, logos, flyers, cards, invitations, you name it. I have only used the free version and I have made some really good looking business cards and flyers. Really easy to navigate also, you don't need any designing skills to create and get super results. I am going to get the paid version soon because if the free version is this good the paid one must be awesome! Try it you will like it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your 5-star rating. We genuinely appreciate it. Please feel free to visit our community at your convenience, where you can find helpful tips and much more: https://adobe.ly/3DS568s. We also welcome any improvement suggestions at https://bit.ly/AdobeFeature. Thank you for your continued support. Lyn

scraped_reviews.content: Makes the most simple things so challenging! I just don't find it very intuitive yet. I end up going to Figma or PS on the computer often when trying to use this app. My biggest gripe is that it's impossible to get the fonts I want. There's just a big, unalphabetized horizontally scrolling list that I can't search (I have a LOT of fonts activated as a designer).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We understand that the app may not feel intuitive, and we apologize for any frustration caused. We will consider your feedback for future updates. Meanwhile, please organize your fonts on the computer to make the selection process easier. Please share at. https://bit.ly/AdobeFeauture. Thank you, Neelam

scraped_reviews.content: I am so annoyed. Worked hours on a flyer. Could not get it into PDF format. Went to another computer to access Windows 10 so that I could open it without my phone. Opened it. Had to sign up for premium. Lost all fonts. Had to re-design it. After all that, there was no option for saving or sharing or exporting at all. OR getting it into PDF which is what I needed in the first place. Very frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the frustration you experienced with our Adobe Express: Graphic Design app. We understand your frustration with saving, sharing, and exporting your design into PDF format. We appreciate your feedback, and we are continuously working to improve our app's functionality. Thank you, Neelam

scraped_reviews.content: I mean... I've only used it for like an hour but I've had no problems creating a custom gamerpic so I'm giving it five stars. Everything is super accessible and I didn't need to watch a tutorial video for anything. $9.99 is too steep a monthly subscription for a photo editing app. I would definitely pay that one time. I will have to discontinue use and cancel before my free trial ends. You can't say I'm not fair, Adobe.

Maybe I'm suddenly old, but i don't care about sharing my photos on every possible app. I used Aviary for several years and absolutely loved it... I paid for many of the filters, it was such a fun tool! I got a new phone though and couldn't re-download it. A Google search said this app would replace it.. hard no. Not even comparable. Plus it encourages you to slap someone else's designs over your own photos and call that art? I'm so disappointed. I thought Adobe was better than this.

I hated the previous version, and find the new app much more user friendly! There's definitely a learning curve, it looked more complicated at first, but once I got my bearings, I loved it. Particularly love how you can just try out several pictures without constantly going back to the search tool and retyping what you're looking for. HOWEVER CAN SOMEONE PLEASE EXPLAIN WHY WE DON'T GET A JUSTIFY TEXT OPTION ? Sorry for screaming, but it's just SO basic that the absence of it is beyond me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We recommend the following steps to resolve this issue: 1. Ensure a stable internet connection. 2. Clear the cache and data of the app and restart your device. If the problem persists, please reinstall the app. Please let us know if this helps. For feature requests, please share your your input at https://bit.ly/AdobeFeauture. Thank you, Neelam

scraped_reviews.content: I don't know why I think they'll change and that every time I give Adobe another shot by trying one of their products I won't be let down. At least they're consistent. While there are a few nice things it doesn't outweigh the fact that using Adobe is like taking a step back in technology. I feel like I'm stuck in 1992 or pre windows with the product they provide. VistaCreate, Canva, I can name a dozen other apps that offer a lot more for a lot less. I'm sorry but step up your game or close shop!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jonathan, sorry to hear you're not happy with the Creative Cloud Express app. Not what we want to hear. If you have any issues, let us know at https://adobe.ly/3DS568s. Our experts can help best there. Thanks ^Mk

scraped_reviews.content: Honestly the one feature I was hoping to find doesn't seem to exist. I was hoping to find the ability to draw over images for manual enhancements and touching up, but that isn't an option as far as I can tell. Actually, being able to add layers and properly, with a fully customizable selection of colours, draw over photos would be ideal. Honestly, even the ability to draw over photos as basically as Microsoft paint 3D works would be helpful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Nichole, Many thanks for writing. We are constantly at work to improve the app, and your feedback is valuable. Feel free to share it in our community so others can upvote
it, too: [https://bit.ly/expressuser]. Thanks ^Mk

scraped_reviews.content: really set up to perform as they had intended, very limited. If you set serious crappy limitations on the trial, you can't expect a purchase based on faith that the full version actually works. Cannot fit to size, edited original in another Adobe app, 5 times smaller, still stretched to full which is larger than the border. Stupid. If you aren't creative, and you want to slap a picture down and put simple words over it, this will do that, but it's simple.

Updates often completely change functionality causing a brief period of "re-learning". 2,000+ memes later this is still the best app I've found that can absolutely nail 99% of what I need. Amazing. If they could include a way to utilize a GIF animation as the image instead of just a still of the first frame I would switch from the free version to a paid subscription. So close to the best thing on the Internet!

The older version was much better but since the new UI changes, it has gotten a lot slower. Also I am now no longer able to download my designs via the app using my OnePlus 9. I have cleared cache, reinstalled the application, etc and nothing works. I would have to go on the browser in order to download them. That, paired with no support for Tablets (which was one of the main reasons I had gotten a tablet) makes the user experience a lot worse overtime.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Sorry to hear you're facing this issue. Does the download freeze at a certain percentage or keep loading endlessly? Also, is this happening with all export formats or just a specific one? Let us know so we can assist you better. ^SV

scraped_reviews.content: New version is awful and not user friendly like before. I can't use it to make collages anymore because I can't figure out how to. Edit: I figured out how but omg is it more work when all I had to do was put my pictures in and if they weren't fitting properly the app had a easy adjustable option to fix that. Now I have to select a grid and individually place them in and even then they might not even fit right so I'll have to do it over again. Edit: I uninstalled, it's too frustrating to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for the trouble. Currently, the feature to create a collage using provided photos is unavailable in the app. However, you can create a blank file, add a Grid object, and replace the placeholder images with your own. For more help, contact our community of experts at https://adobe.ly/3DS568s. Thanks, ^NK

scraped_reviews.content: Frustrating to use! There isn't a day that goes by that this app doesn't crash then to find the recent work you've been working on didn't save and your time wasted! It has great potential if the crash issues could just be dealt with! I cannot endorse this app and I'm seriously contemplating cancelling my subscription. Why pay for something that isn't working within reason? If anyone knows of a great alternative, please let me know! üëç
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the frustration caused. Please try clearing the app cache and updating the app to the latest version. You could also try reinstalling the application. Please let us know if this helps. Thank you, Neelam

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app, but it can be very buggy. And when I have a deadline to put out a flier or whatever, having to restart/reinstall the app just to have certain features work, it's a huge hindrance on my work/time. Ie. Cannot search for templates through app. Searching through browser works, but I can't transfer any of them to the app. Also the spacing on the boxes around lettering will change or move for no reason and won't allow me to line things up properly until I close the app and restart
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there, we're so sorry about this! Definitely not what we want to hear. Have you tried reinstalling the app? If that doesn't fix the issue, you can get help from our community
of experts at (https://adobe.ly/3DS568s). Thanks ^Mk

scraped_reviews.content: sooooooooooooo this app has a ton of potential but needs work. 1. I want to be able to organize my designs. otherwise you end up with a ton of mixed content in your feed 2. THE TIME I SPEND MAKING THINGS IS A WASTE OF TIME BECAUSE THE IMAGES START FAILING TO LOAD AND YOU LOSE YOUR WORK 3. I've lost so many time consuming images because of the failed to load situation. if it didnt lose my images so often, I'd easily give it 5 stars but this is something to look out for.

This last update screwed me. Some of the fonts, including the one I use for my marketing material, has switched and now looks like the font I have my phone set to (cool jazz). Every post I have saved has for some reason switched the font to something to resembles cool jazz. UPDATE: I switched the font on my phone back to the original font and restarted my phone. That seems to have fixed the issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Glad you found the solution! Unfortunately Samsung's custom font feature isn't compatible with the way our app renders text.

scraped_reviews.content: I only want to make simple slideshows with music and voiceover. The free version of Adobe Express allows for that with no watermark, this includes basic transitions between images. However, they don't help you do it, the app is set up to use premade templates and they push AI. If you're willing to take the time to figure out how to make your own, then it's worth it. I might give 5 stars if they made the simpler way easier to find and use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thanks for sharing your thoughts. We're glad you enjoy the free version for slideshows! We understand that finding simpler options can be tricky. Check out this guide for more help: adobe.ly/AdobeExpressonMobile. We appreciate your feedback! ^SV

scraped_reviews.content: Loading speed is atrocious. 15-20 mins to "upload" a 3 min video already on my phone into the app, 15 mins for it to "prepare to download" the finished project and you can't leave the app. The user interface is not intuitive at all. It's very easy to accidentally delete parts of your scenes permanently and then have to reupload the whole thing. The most frustrating part is that it won't let you overlay the audio from one video onto another. You're better off downloading to PC & using Premier Pro
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi There! We're truly sorry to hear about your experience with the recent update. Here is what has changed: https://adobe.ly/new-express-mobile-faq. We would like to hear more from you as your feedback is essential to us. You can contact our community of experts at https://adobe.ly/3DS568s for assistance. Thanks, ^NK

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible update. The older one(spark), although simple still worked fine. It doesn't upload my photos, it loses the images that were uploaded and leaves a grey square, it is very buggy and frustrating to use. Now it's not letting me download the work done saying it's "working on it. That's why I un-installed and am gonna use another app. It's too buggy and to get something done takes forever. Expected more from Adobe very disappointed.

EASILY the best program I've ever used to make advertisements for my business. They always turn out eye-catching and professional. Program is so easy to use I can think of an idea and have it down in 10 minutes. The free version is great! Has saved me LOTS of time and done a better job than I could have done on my own programs. Great photos to choose from if you don't have your own, and it gives you font color suggestions that always look awesome.

I've been using this app almost a year until suddenly it signed me out. When I signed back in, all of my previous projects were not saved and the app was asking me to subscribe even though I've been paying 9.99 a month for over a year. So I cancelled my subscription. No sense paying for something that doesn't recognize you're already a loyal customer. Thank you!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It sounds like you logged back into the app with the wrong account.  Do you have another email address you could have signed into or did you login with Facebook or Google?  You can also try logging in to spark.adobe.com on web.  Send us an email at hellopost@adobe.com and we can help find your original content.

scraped_reviews.content: I love doing digital art and image editing; so many other apps are restrictive, clunky, or even when they work well they don't understand what I'm trying to do (like when "resize" stretches image but not borders so it's a stretched portion inside a box). EDIT: Right after posted, next image is cropping instead of resizing. Trying to make a reel about drug awareness and getting help, so need frames being same size, and now back to drawing board. Just wanting to change dimensions, not crop/cutoff.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thanks for sharing your experience. It sounds like you're running into trouble. Could you share more details and a screen recording over the community here: adobe.ly/adobeexpresscommunity? That might help us better understand the issue and suggest the right steps. ^SV

scraped_reviews.content: The website version is easier to navigate, mobile is a little clunky in the sense that when you try to move images or text, the interface is slow to respond and ends up glitching all over the screen and not going where you want it to go, or it's hard to interact with it because you can't zoom in with it. It's also difficult to get to the extra stuff like the template designs or backgrounds but it does have all the options the website has.

title: BandLab ‚Äì Music Making Studio
description:
The free BandLab app has everything you need to start making beats ‚Äì whether you‚Äôre laying down your first loop or crafting your next global release. With this powerful music maker in your pocket, you can produce, mix, and share your beats on the go. Dive into a massive sample library, craft MIDI like a pro, and unlock next-level beatmaking tools ‚Äì all from your phone. 

Got a burst of inspiration? Instantly bring your ideas to life in our free DAW: 

‚Ä¢ Sampler ‚Äì Build a beat with 100K+ royalty-free samples from BandLab Sounds, or create custom samples by recording sounds around you. 

‚Ä¢ 300+ Vocal/Guitar/Bass Audio Presets ‚Äì  Shape your sound with effects like reverb, delay, and EQ, and save your go-to presets for quick access across your projects!

‚Ä¢ Splitter ‚Äì Split any song into high-quality music stems with our free AI stem separation tool. Use it as a vocal remover, isolate instruments for practice, or get stems from any song for creative remixing, beat flips, and more. 

‚Ä¢ SongStarter ‚Äì Make beat block a thing of the past! Jumpstart your hit with royalty-free ideas from our AI beat generator. Explore unique song ideas in 11 genres like Drift Phonk and Hip-Hop, with 3 unique compositions to choose from for each generated idea. 

‚Ä¢ Drum Machine ‚Äì Create killer drum patterns effortlessly with our online sequencer. Choose from a massive library of genre-diverse drum sounds and pre-made kits to fit your vibe.

‚Ä¢ Looper ‚Äì New to beatmaking? Pick a sound pack in your favorite genre, load it up, and start building your beat or backing track in seconds ‚Äì no experience required!

‚Ä¢ 385+ Virtual MIDI Instruments ‚Äì Need hard-hitting 808s for your beats or smooth synths for your melody? Access 330+ cutting-edge Virtual MIDI instruments to perfect your sound.

‚Ä¢ Automation ‚Äì Get precise control over your mix‚Äôs volume, panning, and effects parameters to enhance dynamics and build smoother transitions. 

‚Ä¢ Mastering ‚Äì Give your tracks the shine they deserve with presets designed by multi-Platinum and Grammy-winning engineers. In just a tap, perfect your sound for streaming platforms and beyond. 

‚Ä¢ Distribution ‚Äì Release your beats globally on popular streaming platforms right from the app, and keep 100% of your earnings. 

Top BandLab features for beatmakers:

‚Ä¢  Free song cloud storage 
‚Ä¢  Unlimited multi-track projects 
‚Ä¢  Keep projects synced with a cross-device DAW
‚Ä¢  All-in-one music making app ‚Äì from ideation to distribution
‚Ä¢  Easy export or sharing to social media and streaming platforms

Join a thriving community of over 100M music makers and creators on the BandLab app today! 

Terms of Use: https://blog.bandlab.com/terms-of-use/ 
Privacy Policy: https://blog.bandlab.com/privacy-policy/

summary: Make beats anywhere on BandLab. Record, mix & produce, all from your phone.

scraped_reviews.content: it is really really fun and easy to use. I use it to record metal songs and stuff like that and it works really well. I like the drum machine because I don't play drums. the only thing it needs is more time signatures. it currently doesn't have 7/8 time signatures and that makes it hard to record a lot of my guitar riffs that would be in 7/8. so PLEASE ADD 7/8 PLEEEASE. other than that, I'm happy with it. also please explain why metal doesn't show up on the explore page just like other genres.

It's good for beginners, I guess... it just makes you, idk, DO A MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION TO USE ANY SAMPLE AT ALL...it used to be free until they decided to take away my happiness...they have AI features as well. And I don't even think they're free...wth dude. It barely lets you edit the instruments like other apps I've seen people use. All you can do for free is split parts of audio, make a certain instrument louder or quieter than the rest, and 1 or 2 others. BUT it's very good for beginners
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review. We're sorry to hear about your frustration. We want to clarify that basic editing features are free, but some samples and AI tools are part of our premium membership. It sounds like you may have found a bug. Please try clearing your cache, and if the issue persists, contact our support team directly!

scraped_reviews.content: The fact that there is a free app that allows you to make make records possibly make a hit and at the very least have a place to go to practice and hone your skills making music or beats and even videos all of that You can't say too much bad about it. Yeah, it wants you to pay for a membership, so you don't have to deal with those pesky. Ads or so that you can use more fx tools or have more mastering options things like that, but just on a regular free to play deal this is the way to go rn‚ÄºÔ∏èüíØ

I've had this app since 2021 and for awhile, I saw it come a long ways and get better. until this year. everything was fine until I got blasted with ads every 10 seconds. all the instruments I used to use for MIDI now are premium. this is ridiculous. I've been experiencing more glitches than ever since the summer updates and half my stuff won't sync properly. no. Im not paying to use what I've been using for free for 4 years. fix your damn app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Anwar, we're sorry to hear about your experience. Could you please write to us and let us know about the issues you are experiencing? We'd love to look into it! - https://bnd.la/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: Here's a thought: either offer a genuine free trial with no strings attached or don‚Äôt offer one at all. It‚Äôs frustrating that I have to activate the trial before I can cancel it, risking an auto-renewal without knowing if the app is right for me. Just make it simple: let people try it freely (i.e can cancel their subscription and still use the app) or charge upfront.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Nick! Sorry to hear that! Have you reached out to our Support Team yet? If you haven't, you can do so here: https://bnd.la/contact-us. We'll be happy to look into it!

scraped_reviews.content: Very hit and miss. The ads are insane if you don't pay for the subscription. Constantly gets laggy and runs slow, has an updated every week it seems and yet nothing seems to change. When adding a looper, alot of the times when you start playing it the sound is very muffled and you have to close and restart the app to get a normal sound.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand the ads are intrusive, and we rely on them to keep the core app free. Regarding the lag and muffled sound, these are critical performance issues that we need to address. To help us investigate the muffled looper sound, please contact our support team.

scraped_reviews.content: To the devs (if they even care enough to have an actual human read) You guys need to figure out getting Cakewalk on the app stores. I'm giving a one star because BandLab is going downhill. Buttons will randomly not work and I have to restart the app to fix it. PC has piano roll features that we still lack on the mobile app. There's much more but I have a text limit :/ To the user: This app is great and has allowed me to explore my creativity a lot. just don't expect a lot from a free app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your candid feedback‚Äîwe assure you a human has read it! We apologize for the bugs causing buttons to randomly stop working; we're actively working on stability. We also hear your request for more Cakewalk features and advanced piano roll tools on mobile. We appreciate the honest feedback and hope to win back your stars!

scraped_reviews.content: I DID use this app, and would have loved to give it 5 stars, but they locked all of the samples behind a premium. I only use samples, so it's hard to continue using the app when the main thing I use is completely gone unless I pay an absurd amount of money. Another thing is goes through battery like it's nothing, I have to have my mobile device charging at all times to even use it. without the samples, its still a good app, but I personally have to find an alt or change the way I make music.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We're sorry for your experience. We understand the app can be demanding on your device's battery, and we are constantly working to optimize its performance. Your feedback on our features and monetization model is noted and will be taken into account for future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: in the beginning I have this 1!star but I think it was more of an issue with the device I had that made it impossible I do anything. but since then I upgraded my equipment and I have made almost a whole albums worth of songs .no love the sound library of loops and my favorite part is I can make my own soundboard of sounds that record. I have learned so much about music arranging and producing from this app bandlab! sorry we got off to a rocky start! love you guys.

The Looper Tool is a lifesaver! Being able to take bits from royalty free music and incorporate them into your own songs is an incredible feature that makes it so I can actually develop music! It's awesome! So, why isn't this five stars? It just isn't explained well. No music apps really are. Not saying I have major problems with it though, cause this is great!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for the feedback! Keep making good music! Cheers!

scraped_reviews.content: need to quit raising the prices and moving all of the free features to a paid subscription. i will never pay that much money for a software. sorry, not sorry. honestly I barley use the app now that I cant work with samples on my tracks. the only thing it's good for now, unless you wanna pay over a hundred dollars a month, is recording mixing and mastering. and you can't even use all of their mastering features unless you pay for the subscription. 4 - 5 years on this app and I liked it till now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Tucker! We get why you'd be frustrated with some of the new changes we've made, especially after being with us for so long, but we hope you'd give BandLab Membership a try! On top of access to BandLab Sounds, you get a bunch of other exclusive features in and out of the Studio. You can find out more at: bandlab.com/membership

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for 5 or 6 years and it was great while it lasted but my experience was ruined because something that was once free is now locked behind a paywall. I never minded not being able to use the new effects or AI features, but I do mind not being able to use samples that were ORIGINALLY FREE. Change the app description because if you have to pay for it it's not royalty "FREE", and that's false advertisement.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We totally understand why you'd be frustrated with some of the new changes we've made, especially after being with us for so long, but we hope you'd give BandLab Membership a try! On top of access to BandLab Sounds, you get a bunch of other exclusive features in and out of the Studio. You can find out more at: bandlab.com/membership

scraped_reviews.content: The desktop version has been super laggy and stuttering ever since I updated my Chromebook, I have froze all tracks, I have cleared all possible cache, bought all new cords, and factory data resetted my Chromebook, and no luck. The support team is no help as the automated response recommended an article and when I answered "No" this didn't help, a support team member reached out and recommended THE EXACT SAME THING , I just confirmed didn't work. I have no choice but to buy a new laptop and DAW
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Cole! We're glad to hear from you! If you've cleared your cache, freed storage, and done a factory reset but still face issues, your Chromebook may have hit its CPU limit. Try freezing your tracks to see if it helps. Please contact us if you need the steps on how to do so - https://bnd.la/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: The constant pop-ups, people being slowly strong armed into paying for tools. I got it at the beginning, a few transaction offers for OPTIONAL tools that didn't impact overall musical development. but to pay for what was FORMER free samples and musical release. it's basically saying, "Buy our premium membership or have your music quality drop so bad you'll have to pay." it wreaks of the word "parasitic." and it tarnishes what the relationship the app had with those who've been using it up to now
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! We understand some of the features you were using are now for Members. We'll share your feedback with our team to review for future updates!

scraped_reviews.content: IT'S SO OVERSTIMULATING. I literally just wanted a simple, "hey here's a thing to make music" and instead I get something that's trying to be a social media app but also be for making music at the same time?? I only had the app open for a few minutes and I got an ad in every single one of those minutes.. And it was actually so annoying to find where to actually make music that I decided I didn't want to have to go through that awful experience every time I used the app. Why?? Just why???
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback! We'll share them with our team to review for future updates! Please know that you can still just use the BandLab Studio and completely ignore the social side of the app. Get started here! - https://help.bandlab.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002945153-Getting-started-with-BandLab-s-Studio

scraped_reviews.content: this app is trash. freezes up and won't let you use the studio or even open it without it freezing, the studio is a 2/10, recording and editing is the most difficult part about it. it's supposed to be fun not irritating. I'm typing this just a few mins after I posted my review and after bandlab froze my phone and shut it off I open up the app to keep working on this song I've been working on for days on end its now all gone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear you feel that way, Reese. A quick reinstall usually resolves common issues. If it persists, send us a message here: https://bnd.la/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: edited for more clarity. using any more than a couple audio channels produces constant glitching and stuttering. Layering vocals is impossible. It seems to happen when I do more than 3 vocal chains. Makes the app effectively useless. tried with an Xbox mic, my ATTUSB and a generic cordial microphone. All the same results. Very very bummed out. happy to pay for premium but can't with this issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Jay! We're very sorry to hear that! Thanks for letting us know. Could you drop us a note so we can investigate further? You can do so here: https://bnd.la/contact-us. We're here to help!

scraped_reviews.content: this is actually a very good daw. it offers so many plugins that work so well. mixing is easy, optimizing your mix even just down to the color of a track can be a little misleading at times but once you figure out their lingo and the tricks You'll realize how close this is to older daws like cubase. I haven't tried publishing but I have listened to a few of the other artists using this. I'd really like an easier way to listen to the genres I like. works great on a midpowered phone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We'll forward them to our developers. Let us know if you have any other suggestions! - https://bnd.la/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be so amazing but now it's fail safe so you don't lose your studio progress that seems good but it always loads if I left the app with studio open. Which means if I want to edit i have to go out of the studio to go back in. This was a pain figuring out. And let's not talk about the ads. Try to go to the library, it spends 10 seconds loading an ad above it. I'm skeptical when clicking because of pop up ads. All these new random glitches and bugs... Why change it? it was fine...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! We'll share them with our team for future considerations! Cheers!

scraped_reviews.content: woah‚Ä¶ I've been using this website/app since I was a teenager. it was always unmatched with how easy and friendly to a beginner it was compared to *real* programs. but recently with the overwhelming amount of unskippable 30-sec ads, everything-ai interface and putting the previously free features behind a needlessly expensive paywall‚Ä¶ thanks, you've finally given me the push to give up on you and actually work with real programs which will give me more options for a fraction of your price!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We totally understand why you'd be frustrated with some of the new changes we've made, especially after being with us for so long, but we hope you'd give BandLab Membership a try! On top of access to BandLab Sounds, you get a bunch of other exclusive features in and out of the Studio. You can find out more at: bandlab.com/membership

scraped_reviews.content: A lot of fun! I havent figured out how to sync the timing of all the tracks yet but it's user friendly for the most part. edit: 5 years later, still haven't figured out the latency issue. but also, did bandlab remove the feature to read lyrics while listening to music on the app??? üò≠ that button randomly appeared for me one day and just as randomly disappeared. I thought I lost all of my lyrics!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thanks for your rating. We value your feedback and we'll make sure to take this to the respective team so we can look into it. We'd love for you to share more details about this so don't hesitate to reach out to us! https://help.bandlab.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

scraped_reviews.content: So first off, I'd like to say that this app has very few issues... with exploring other music. Making music on this app is pretty difficult, but it doesn't mean I won't stop using it. Although, what I'm most disappointed about is their "boost" option. I spent some money to get my music boosted, and the song only got 5 likes, and I gained a follower. I was very disappointed with this, but besides that, this app is okay.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review, Develan! Let us know how we can make your experience better - https://bnd.la/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: I've used Bandlab for a very long time now, and to see it slowly fall under paywalls is nothing short but disappointing. I didn't care about the updates that had happened over the years. Then, I saw that over 98% of my favorite samples go under a subscription was the final straw. I'm only giving this a two star rating because of the effects and auto tune, but I know very well that those are too going to be subscription based. I had my fun, but I wish NOT to continue with bandlab.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ta Moo! We totally understand why you'd be frustrated with some of the new changes we've made, especially after being with us for so long, but we hope you'd give BandLab Membership a try! On top of access to BandLab Sounds, you get a bunch of other exclusive features in and out of the Studio. You can find out more at: bandlab.com/membership

scraped_reviews.content: If I get one more pop up add any time I try to click on absolutely anything I'm going to throw my whole phone. Every. Single. Time. I try to record telling me about some headphones interference when I don't even have headphones connected make me feel like pulling my hair out. Keep it simple many people use this app there's absolutely no need to be pushing these ads down our throats.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear the ads are interrupting your experience. To make sure the ads are not too invasive, we set limits so that you'll only see ads once when accessing certain features and functions per day. For example, if you see an ad when entering the Studio for the first time today, you won't see ads again the second time you enter.

scraped_reviews.content: Ads Apocalypse! Don't download unless you're ready to pay the $80 a year. You can use the free version for some basic edits (almost all levels and filters are not included from the free version), but it'll only let you edit and save 15 minutes of your audio. It's how I would envision Communist China would want an audio editing app to operate. Barely usable. Deleting after I write this review.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Josh! We're sorry about the 1-star rating. We appreciate your feedback, and we'll make sure to take this to the appropriate team so we can look into it.

scraped_reviews.content: Double edged razor blade. Bandlab is cleverly thought out, and easy to use. The original intention was noble, and as a songwriter, getting to record my own thing, with an ever expanding set of tools at my disposal. For free!..that's reasonably cool. I'm learning production by trial and error. And the results get better, and better. This app wil pay you fairly in results. You'll get what you give. On the flip side, it's become a hub of conmen, grifters, and scam artist.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! We're glad to hear that you're having a great time on the app. If you encounter any inappropriate users, please don't hesitate to send us a report. - How do I make a report? (https://help.bandlab.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002946973-How-do-I-make-a-report)

scraped_reviews.content: This is the best Daw in the play store! Hands down, it beats any other in my humble opinion. If you have any issues, which is not very often at all, the support team behind Bandlab is literally the best that I have had compared to any other app and that goes for all apps, not just music related ones. Incredible platform, incredible support! Unbeatable!!! Get this if you are serious about making music, you will not regret it!

probably the only app I have ever posted music on. Although some things are finicky, it's easily bypassable by music files and editing! I found that when paired with something like Groove Pad, great music is made! I do suggest one thing, able to edit music covers after they're published (or i just haven't figured it out yet). regardless, still amazing!

today i opened the app and got hit with a popup to try a premium feature, a popup to buy a vacuum, a popup to buy premium, and a popup to rate the app all in about 5 seconds. The actual DAW itself is solid for a mobile app and (for now) ad free, but the ads are getting a little hard to deal with. I get they need to make money but at a certain point people are just going to stop using the app if they get an ad everytime they try to do anything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear the ads are interrupting your experience. We'll share your feedback with our team to review for future updates! Cheers!

scraped_reviews.content: Bandlab is incredible and I wouldn't recommend any other music making app. I've made all my songs on Bandlab as a teenager and I don't know where I would be in life without it. 100 stars out of 5. Incredible, easy to use, easy to record, create, edit, it's truly the one app I've always needed starting out. Having Bandlab as your music distributor is incredible, you can trust it, it's affordable, and it's so worth it. I love Bandlab.

not bad at all! I love the sounds and the fact that you can insert your own songs from different platforms just by uploading them! I do not like the fact, though, that people take the posting mechanism on the app and use it to post things that THE SHOULD NOT BE POSTING(inappropriate wise)... but what the app is actually supposed to be used for is top-notch! It reminds me of MPC beats!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Josiah! We appreciate your rating and review! Thanks for letting us know about this. Could you please make a report regarding the described posts? https://help.bandlab.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002946973-How-do-I-make-a-report

scraped_reviews.content: i couldn't figure out where ANYTHING was. I wanted to record vocals and then add in the background music. there NEEDS to be a tutorial. it was just very confusing. also, all the ads I got for this app made it seem like an app to just make music, not like social media. I just want to use it for fun (I'm not trying to write songs). it is good if you want to share your music. (that is if you can figure out how to record anything other than vocals, and how to stop it from recording)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear that. You can absolutely use it just to record and layer music. Check our tutorials & Help Center to get the hang of the Studio: https://help.bandlab.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002945153

scraped_reviews.content: This app was just about perfect for me, until I started working on a project that requires a tempo shift mid-song. The tempo changing functions are pretty clunky. You can't blanket alter the tempo of a specific section of a song, you have to do it by individual tracks. On the mobile app the tempo adjustment increments seem to be random so its almost impossible to line up multiple tracks perfectly. The web version isn't much better. I confess myself disappointed. Gonna try Cakewalk by Bandlab.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Yusef! We're sorry about the 2-star rating. We'd love to help you out with this, please reach out to us through our help form so we can investigate it further: https://bnd.la/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: This is a great app... For people who want to make pop or rap songs. I tried Band Lab because I wanted to make pieces I could use to get into college to pursue video game and film scoring. I was expecting to be able to write out my ideas for each individual instrument on pieces of digital paper, not recording each separate part to mix together. Overall, this app is very useful to get started on a career involving music that is typically heard on radios, and it's definitely worth trying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ayden! We're glad you liked our app. We'd love to know how we could earn a higher rating from you if you don't mind. A little goes a long way for us!

scraped_reviews.content: You know, I would give it a higher rating, if I could use it properly. You see, Everytime I create a new song on this, I can only edit it for 5 minutes and then the app just crashes. and the funny thing is, this only happens on this one app. not on any other one's. It's not storage because I have apps that take three times the storage and work fine. and don't get me started on the ads, every time you click on something you're jumped by four adds. Then everything good is behind a paywall. 0/5 ‚≠ê
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear that, Carson. Could you please write to us directly with more details of the issue? We'd love to investigate! - https://bnd.la/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: great app for people who want to start out on their music journey and I've done that, spent a couple of years here creating music gaining my experience however it's become more terrible with each update they release, everything used to be free, there were no subscriptions even featured. now you can't use their samples unless you pay? at this point you can't really use it for free anymore, the app crashes a lot too. lost a pile of song's due to that (studio didn't work, project just disappear's)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Mariah, the membership we provide only offers additional features and shouldn't affect the basic functionality of BandLab. Please write to us if you're experiencing any issues. We'd be glad to assist you! - https://bnd.la/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: if it freezes and exits the project without saving it, try clearing your cache. also if you are getting a weird delayed feedback when you use headphones, turn off input monitoring in settings. oh, its also like a hub for scammers, but there are hardly any ads and you get almost everything you need for free. the only change I would make is an option to swap ownership of a project with another collaborator
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback, fam! We appreciate the detailed notes! We'll be sure to share your suggestions with our team to review for future updates. Keep an eye out!

scraped_reviews.content: I'm loving BandLab, but it's not quite meeting my needs. When I'm building music with virtual instruments, it tends to get choppy when I add multiple tracks and play them back. I'd love to see some improvements on this front. Additionally, it would be awesome to have access to a variety of professional-sounding bass guitar and kick bass presets. Thanks!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jorde! Thanks for your rating. We value your feedback and we'll make sure to take this to the respective team so we can look into it. We'd love for you to share more details about this so don't hesitate to reach out to us! https://bnd.la/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: It's impressive how this app has genuinely become worse. At this point I might as well buy another piece of software to make music on. The only positive about this app is it's free and has a relatively large amount of features FOR A FREE APP. HOWEVER, most of these features have become progressively less usable and bugged. I can't even add midi instruments anymore without using the desktop version and it randomly crashes when I use certain plugins with modulation. Fix this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lunas! We're sorry about the 1-star rating. We appreciate your feedback, and we'll make sure to take this to the appropriate team so we can look into it.

scraped_reviews.content: Whenever I use my headphones, a delayed playback plays whenever I move or talk while editing. I need microphone access removed for it not to do this, but if I do it doesn't let me make any projects. Is this a bug? If so, please fix! I've never had this issue before the update. Other than that, I love this app! Definitely recommend.

Riddled with adverts and also increasingly full of bugs and glitches. I work in music education. Used to recommend this app but no longer can. Shame really as used to be a good android alternative to garageband. Apple use Garageband as a free accessible gateway to building customer base who then progress to their pro software when they are earning money. Shame bandlab can't see the benefit of that model and shove adverts to the extent that it's not ever going to gain traction for future custom.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear about the trouble. Are you using edu.BandLab.com for education or our BandLab.com platform? If you are running into issues, please submit a report so our team can help: https://bnd.la/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: was fun to try at first but there's no good sounds to pick from and the decent ones need to be payed for. a different problem I have is that after making music, the music just won't load till I manage to fix it somehow. This time, I had just finished making something and it didn't load, so I did the usual things I do to fix this but it just made it worse, I couldn't play any song. I tried to uninstall and reinstall bandlab but now I just can't get into it at all, not app or website.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That's not good. Sorry to hear that, Adora, and thanks for letting us know! Please help us by reporting this to our Support Team at: https://bnd.la/contact-us. We'll look into it!

scraped_reviews.content: I like this app, I really do, it's just been very buggy recently. Today when I tried to experiment with midi instruments it wouldn't stop lagging and crashing (without any affects or weird settings mind you, just the base instruments). The worst part was that after I recorded a part, the app was crashing, and didn't save the version of the song I had just done. I normally don't use midi instruments, but I want to experiment with it more, however it's way too buggy to do anything with
scraped_reviews.replyContent: To help fix the lag and crashing, please try these steps: close all background apps, run the Latency Fix test in the app's settings, and clear the cache. If the problem continues, please send your phone model and OS version to support!

scraped_reviews.content: I really love BandLab. It‚Äôs honestly one of the best platforms out there because it‚Äôs free, easy to use, and still super versatile. That‚Äôs why I gave it 5 stars. If I could wish for a few things though, I‚Äôd love to see some more advanced creative options. For example, it would be amazing if there was a way to actually create my own instrument inside BandLab, so I can shape sounds from scratch instead of just using presets. I also think the interface could grow a little in the future with more

BandLab is one of the best free music-making apps I‚Äôve ever used! üé∂ It‚Äôs perfect for recording vocals, making beats, mixing, and even collaborating with others online. The interface is simple, and it has a lot of powerful tools like effects, loops, and multitrack recording. I also love that everything is cloud-based, so I can continue my projects anywhere.

Been having numerous issues lately. Doesn't matter what mic I use (or device). My best guess is it has to do with all the updates, which make the app better for most, but for some of us.. not so much. Guess I'm gonna have to update my phone and Chromebook if I want to keep using it the way I used to (without lack, live and in recordings. Clicking noise and stuttering and desynchronized monitoring after like a minute. It was fun while it lasted).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Dick! We're very sorry to hear that! Thanks for letting us know. Could you drop us a note so we can investigate further? You can do so here: https://bnd.la/contact-us. We're here to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Putting the sound library behind a paywall was a terrible decision. It's one of the best features, creating my own drumkits with the sampler was fun but after using Bandlab for 3 years they make me pay for it. The membership gives little to no value for its price, and if you want people to actually buy it, MAKE IT CHEAPER instead of locking useful features behind it. The whole reason most people use this app is because its free.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey willemnuggets, thanks for your suggestion about the price! Our BandLab Membership offers so much more than just full access to BandLab Sounds and an ad-free experience. It also includes a variety of fantastic features like unlimited music distribution, exclusive Studio features, and so much more. We truly hope you'll think about subscribing!

scraped_reviews.content: Bandlab is probably the best DAW that supports PC and Mobile, I like how projects are saved by cloud so you can access them very easily from different devices. More instruments or the ability to add instruments would be very nice and would make this app even better. Despite that I really like the instruments that are available and I like how there is many for different genres.

The app itself does what it says, but the amount of ads is insane. In the first 2 minutes, I probably spent 20 or 30 seconds using the app and the rest of the time closing ads, closing popups asking me to pay for the premium version and watching unskippable ads that are purposefully difficult to close. I'm using it for one thing and never redownloading it again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! Having ads helps to keep our core app free for millions of creators worldwide while developing new tools on BandLab. We appreciate your understanding and support. If you happen to encounter any unskippable ads, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to us. We‚Äôd be more than happy to look into it! - https://bnd.la/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: overall really good music production app, but seriously need to fix the issue with it freezing every 20 mins, i go then close the app to refresh it just for the app to be stuck on load for the next half an hour or more, (samsung s24) always stayed updated, UPDATE, now it freezes after I load a few samples from the bandlab library i use a samsung s24
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback, Dean. A quick reinstall usually fixes common issues. If you're still having trouble, send us a message here: https://bnd.la/contact-us

descriptionHTML:
Music Maker JAM: The music maker & beat maker free music app for all music creators, DJs and producers, whatever your level is. Music Maker JAM is an easy-to-use song maker: create or remix amazing music beats and tracks using loops from a variety of musical genres including Trap, EDM, Rap, Dubstep, Hip-Hop, House, Garage, Pop, Rock, and more.

Whether you‚Äôre an experienced beat maker or just exploring for the first time, this is the perfect way to make music!

‚ú® Our free beat maker features will give you the music studio experience:

‚Ä¢ Make music or remix music beats: Choose from over 300 Mix Packs with more than 500,000 loops.

‚Ä¢ Make it your style: Available musical genres include Trap, EDM, Rap, Hip-Hop, House, Pop, Rock, Dubstep, Jazz, Latin, Techno, Garage, DnB and many more - the possibilities are endless.

‚Ä¢ Be a music production pro: Record your tracks with a perfect mix on the 8-channel mixer, or just jam live for your friends at a party.

‚Ä¢ Be creative: Change tempo and harmonies, arrange song parts and play around with spectacular real-time effects like reverb, stutter, delay, and more.

‚Ä¢ Make beats and remix tracks by simply shaking your smartphone or tablet.

‚Ä¢ Sing or rap on your tracks: Record your voice and mix your vocals into your beats, then apply autotune effects for ultimate results, like a real trap beat maker.

‚Ä¢ Choose from all the instruments you could want - who needs a garage band!

‚Ä¢ Share your songs directly on YouTube, SoundCloud, Facebook, TikTok and other social networks.

‚Ä¢ Join our music community: Connect and become friends with artists, influencers, fans, followers, DJs, music producers and more.


Music Maker JAM is a user-friendly and free music app for DJs, beat makers, producers, or simply music lovers of all levels, beginners or pros. Make beats and create music with our song mixer - anytime and anywhere!

Our Music Maker JAM community has created and uploaded more than 10 million tracks. Join it now!

Get Music Maker JAM to create your own music and become a beat maker today. Unleash your creativity and your music production skills now.
