summary: Watch TV series, stream the latest live sports & download movies you love

scraped_reviews.content: I swear this app gets worse and worse every month. It constantly logs me out, has connectivity issues despite every other app on my device working fine, now I've just spent the last 30 min trying to play my show but because Hulu didn't want me watching it i had to try something else. It worked so I went back to the show I wanted and it worked. I pay way too much monthly to be having so many issues. Don't pay for this. Find alternate ways to watch your favs.

This app doesn't keep your place. So you have to skip around to find it. An ad break with every click of the screen. I've watched up to 10 minutes of ads, just to find where I left off. Worse, it signs you out of the app while watching. In the middle of a show, it just throws you out. Then emails that someone signed in to your acct each sign-in. Edit..Now they've taken up the same "cause" as Disney. One that I want no part of. And I certainly won't support it with my money. Last straw. I'm out.

The amount of ads in this PREMIUM subscription service is nuts as well as their placement. You can be watching an old show that has natural breaks for commercials but they'll stick ads in the MIDDLE OF A SENTENCE. Then, after watching multiple minutes of ads, you rewind to watch the scene uninterrupted and guess what? The ads replay at the exact same spot. And then, less than 5 minutes later, multiple more ads. I paid for a subscription to watch content. Not constant ads. Unsubscribing.

The app randomly signed me out on mobile over a month ago, and I haven't been able to sign back in since. Every login attempt I get an error message saying "Something went wrong. Try again?" What is the point of having a subscription plan to allow watching on 2 devices at once if it never works??? Not to mention the amount of outages in the last month.

I pay for the ad free version and still get ads. Greedy, terrible company and then Disney bought it and it got worse. They slowly raise prices as not to shock you with big jumps in price so you don't notice how much they are screwing you. What a rip off! Also, the app has been working incorrectly more frequently as of late. I regularly have to restart the app and clear my cache to be able to use it. In summary it's becoming a more expensive product while simultaneously becoming worse.

I'm giving 1 star because your subtitles suck. I mainly watch K dramas, and I watch them on multiple apps, and I have to say, subtitles are really , REALLY bad on your app. Half of the time they don't appear and I'm left not knowing what was said. Or they're so quick , it's just a flash on the screen. For the amount of money you charge to use the app, you should have way better quality subtitles. It also glitches, a lot.

The first 14-15 years of this app (or however long it's been out) have been fantastic. Unfortunately, I've been forcibly logged out several times a day for about 3-4 months now with no explanation. Hulu claims this has been normal if logged in on multiple (2+) devices, yet it's never happened before. It's not only annoying, but defeats the purpose of paying for the ability to download as the logging out process deletes all downloads, and in areas with no service, there is no alternative.

I have left feedback after feedback and emailed support and they STILL haven't fixed the issue!!! If you rely on closed captioning, this app will do your head in if you cast from your device to your television. The captions are WAY behind what they are saying. By the time the caption comes up, the program is already on to the next scene. I pay them a lot of money for this to not work right. Where the hell is tech support?!?!?!? FIX THIS POS!!!I Til it's fixed, don't bother.

The Hulu app is fairly decent on a mobile device, but terrible on tvs. Recordings are impossible to delete & voice is never in sync with video. Also, Hulu keeps losing good shows to other platforms. Every time we like a show and watch it for a year or two, suddenly the show is bought out by Paramount+ or another subscriber platform. Hulu keeps going up on price but has less and less of the popular programs available and terrible technology. Disney is going to put itself out of the market.

Hulu is another rip off just like Amazon prime. I keep finding YouTube shorts of videos "only shown on here" just like some only shown on Amazon and Netflix for "only so much a month"! What they fail to tell you is the shows that come with the paid subscription are all older shows and movies or unpopular shows and movies. BUT! If you pay them even more, then will you be able to see the shows you want to see. If you're trying to watch something they're promising, plan on paying extra to rent it

More commercials than programs. At the end/ beginning of every show there's 2-3 commercials over a minute each 2 minutes before the end, then again in between, and a third time 2 minutes in to the next episode. Not to mention the several times in middle of the show and never on predetermined commercial breaks. The app also skips around and starts over and makes you watch even more ads than what's reprogrammed. Every time you close you lose episode progress as well. Absolutely terrible app.

I love Hulu, got a subscription and it works great! No ads, free to watch. However.. this is being a two star rating. Let me explain why. It has logged me out of my account many times. It doesn't save sometimes when I leave out of my episodes. I let these two slide for a bit, but those are the minimum problems. Now, I can't watch any show without the show freezing up and glitching out. Nothing works, logging out doesn't help and it only streams good on my TV...

I have the ad free sub. Come to find out that's not truly what it sounds like. It's ad free on hulu original content. When you ask them they tell you all third party has ads. They give a link to an article that says third party has ads before and after the episode. That would be ok if it was true, but we get 3-4 ads a time lasting almost 4 min long. So ad free is really not ad free.

It has some decent stuff on it, but the user interface seems to be lacking very badly. Almost every other time I turn my TV on and try to click the Hulu app. It crashes while I'm trying to scroll through shows and then it'll just randomly crash while you're watching. It's almost like every other streaming service could easily figure out how to not make this happen, but Hulu is making it seem like it is rocket science. They are turning it into rocket science to not constantly crash.

I got my money's worth from this, so it gets an above average score. But still, at some point, I can't really defend it. Way too many terrible ads, at a higher price point than Netflix, and the ads are not just worse, but again, more frequent, longer, and more invasive than the ones on Netflix. I can't put up with it any more. Watch Anora, watch some good shows, and then move on with your life and never get hulu again, is my advice. : P

Paying for a service to watch your favorite shows only to watch commercials every 5-10 while watching your shows. Unless you pay for another subscription on top of your subscription to not see any commercial breaks. Might as well just get DirectTV if I wanted to watch commercials, at least you'll have a much better selection. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS SERVICE!! GET NETFLIX INSTEAD!! MUCHLEES Ads.

very poorly made app both on mobile and Playstation. menus do not make sense and shows/live TV are difficult to navigate. search features do not show results that can be found manually. suggested shows repeat over and over when scrolling for new shows/movies. sometimes I can't even stream, but other services work fine and I have restarted my devices. no way to multiwqtch sports. the only reason I'm paying for this is because of ESPN. if YouTube TV gets sports again I'll switch back.

Hulu is great and all. But would be nice to watch movies with out TV commercials in them . I will change it to 5 stars if that ever changes. I don't mind the commercials in the TV series but not in movies . Hulu made a mistake. I have a subscription that allows TV series. Then after this review I got a notice saying I can't watch this series which is Maried with Children.

The "choose your own ad" experience is really annoying and needs to be forgotten about. Just play an ad and be done with it. I'm not paying attention to them either way. This just slows down how fast I get back to what I was watching. And before an automated message suggests upgrading to the ad free version, no, I'm not paying more for a service when the current price I pay should already have no ads.

It's the same ads for depression, allergy, eczema, weight loss and HIV prescription meds over and over and over again, an ad within the first 5 minutes of the start of the movie or show, if you rewind past an already watched ad spot, another ad! If you're in the middle of a very tense or important part of your show, no worries here's a 2 min ad! 2 mins before the end, another ad! Subtitles are slow or non-existent, and the app likes to log me out for no apparent reason in the middle of watching

If I want to rewatch a series. The auto play starts at the end of the episode. I have to delete my viewing data every time I watch a series. This is sub-par programming. This is across all platforms to watch hulu. I'm highly annoyed that I can't just leave the TV on, and it will auto play properly. I spend the same amount using any service, and I dont have this issue.

The app never works without an issue. it doesn't save your place, you have to rewatch commercials, it freezes and dumps you out. Subtitles don't work properly. it's always a problem. I've tried every suggested solution and nothing works. I don't have the issue with any other app. I'll just watch them. I cancelled - not worth the headache.

Garbage app, there are more technical problems than I can list in 500 characters but here are some highlights. Subtitles will desync. Certain shows or episodes will be randomly unavailable due to technical issues. Hulu will disconnect from casting to my TV and be unable to connect for the rest of the night. This stuff doesn't happen with other steaming services. To top it all off, paying to watch commercials is absurd. I would recommend every single other streaming service over Hulu

It was difficult to watch The Handmaid's Tale because the subtitles are out of sync often and parts of the dialogue were hushed with lots of loud noise. Plus you can't pause a show within the last few minutes or it'll restart the episode when you try to resume. It also often kicks you off saying they're having difficulty playing this title, but it'll usually play after refreshing. They do have a lot of great shows. Ad free... with exceptions. The user interface has improved since my original sub

Hulu has some problems. I've had unauthorized recordings. Progress bars that show you've already watched a show are continually being reset. Shows that are known to have recorded just disappear. Frequently, shows that record, but haven't been watched yet, show a progress bar indicating that the show has already been partially viewed. Hulu claims the problems I reported to them are merely system "glitches". It's mind-boggling to have them state they have no clue why concerning problems occur.

The Chromecast with the app specifically is especially buggy. controls disconnect after some time but TV keeps playing. Will say connected but isn't actually at times. You'll stop it and it'll stop casting but the app will think it's still playing and consider it like you watched 15 more episodes overnight so you don't know where you are anymore. List goes on

I do not understand how you can provide one service - video streaming - and be unable to do that right. I get errors saying to "restart my phone" or "test my connection." No other streaming app has any issues. Even when I follow Hulu's instructions, it doesn't work. And for what it's worth, the app basically doesn't work on GoogleTV smart TVs.

When watching live TV, Hulu will shut down every hour. I've tried to change all the settings and nothing works. Then when I'm streaming Hulu on my phone the sound cuts in and out if I'm using headphones. I've tested this on multiple headphones/earbuds. I used to have YouTube TV but switched because of the shows Hulu has that others don't. As soon as I'm done watching these shows I'll be switching back to YouTube TV unless these issues change.

Has a great selection of adult animation. Tons of ads, garbage app that hangs or crashes. Subtitles cover most of the screen on mobile. Skip intro is constantly missing, and it still leaves a bit of intro to still have to watch. For the cost, this should be near flawless and a lot better. Charging a huge premium for a low experience.

lied about its monthly price. right after I signed up for a monthly price that Hulu & myself agreed upon, Hulu said they were going to charge more for every month. and no, I was not started on a promotional price. also there are way too many ads, And when their ADS come on, they are very, very extremely loud. Compared to the regular volume of their programs. like 2 times louder than what you're watching. and their customer service is very unprofessional and unhelpful!

Frustrated! The app doesn't hold my favorites list. It puts my husband's favorites on my list when we have separate profiles. I watch entire season and it still shows it as unwatched making it sometimes hard to determine where I left off. I have Un-installed the app and re-downloaded it. I have also signed in through my laptop and its the same issues across the board. I'm sure there are glitches with the account but I refuse to give a good rating until this is fixed.

has to be the worst app, I wanted to watch the football game on my phone... doesn't come up under sports category.... I click live, doesn't come up under live, I click channel, nothing comes up... you can't search, you can't find shows... it's literally the worst app, they need to fix it especially if they keep raising the price for even worse quality

I used to really enjoy the app and the shows and movies on it. Where I work Im allowed to have my phone play videos or music alongside my work but theres no internet at my location, so I have to download everything. The last few months, NOTHING will download. The download icon just loops but doesn't download a single thing. It only works when I un-install the app and reinstall it, then re-download EVERYTHING. Im sure my ISP loves that. Also like everyone else I got logged out randomly too! 1/5 ‚≠ê

Please fix the subtitles, specifically regarding the performance of your app on the PS5. They randomly turn off in intervals throughout the film, and the only way to fix it is to exit the film and return back. it's extremely frustrating. Another complaint is that once an ad comes up, sometimes the subtitles will turn off immediately after the ad is finished. Exiting out the film and returning to refresh the subtitles leaves you with an endless loop of ads, which is unfair and poor practice.

Movies mostly stream well. But TV series skip and freeze with no solution. Letting it buffer doesn't help, neither does restarting the app, clearing cache or, picking a different episode. To add insult to injury, all the ads are perfect quality. I recently downgraded to Hulu with ads. Premium didn't have this issue. Paying less shouldn't mean an unusable app.

possibly the worst streaming app on the market. Constantly unstable. Crashes regularly, forgets playback point, search does not work, recently watched shows will say "unavailable" or sometimes it just doesn't load the interface at all. Cancelling and will not be renewing. Total waste of time and money.

HULU+live tv has always had some problems, but most of them have been fixed over the 2 years that I've had it. Except one big problem. I watch the same show every night for bed. But the shows always start at the VERY END of each episode. So u either have to restart them or u wake up several seasons later and have to remember where u left off last time. It is super uber annoying!! HULU PLEASE FIX THIS!! IT HAS BEEN GOING ON WAY TOO LONG! I don't have this issue with other streaming services!!

for about a year, I've still been randomly logged out multiple times on the mobile app despite being the only one device that uses my account so obviously it's not logging me out cause of being logged on another device. Plus lately the subtitles have been going out of sync very often or sometimes there are missing subtitles. Done all the troubleshooting options with no luck so the issue is on their side but they have never fixed it. And I rely heavily on subtitles as I'm hard of hearing

the Mobil app is fine. the actual tv app is Annoying. you go to resume am episode or movie and it starts it all over again! then if you skip back a few seconds cuz you missed something, it goes back and then Jumps Ahead missing what you were trying to see in the first place! For the price I pay this should not happen. it's very frustrating. then when you rewind it more to try to see what you actually wanted to and it freezes and just keeps loading. you have to leave the app and play somthg else

If I could go negative, I would. App, Browser, Smart TV, Firestick, casting.... it's all terrible. And it's not on my end. 400mbps for internet. All updated. Errors left and right. can't even watch shows anymore. It's not even worth paying for at this point. And if by miracle I get in, the shows kick me out with more errors. Hulu doesn't care. And it's only getting worse. find another platform that actually works and subscribe there.

doesn't seem to work anymore since I got Disney+. Now I can't log in to Hulu. It won't accept my password, which I know is correct. I have to sign in to Disney+ and access the TV shows from there. Also, Hulu doesn't let you speed up content like Netflix and Tubi do. they let you watch at 1.25 or 1.5 speed, which is fantastic. The inescapable commercials still play at regular speed of course. I guess I should just uninstall this app since it no longer works and I'm forced to go through Disney+

can't watch anything ever normally. I constantly have to watch the ad at the beginning of a show or movie just for it to freeze. you can keep watching the ad! but never the show! unless you switch to another device, watch the ad on there, and then switch back to wherever you're trying to relax at. so basically this service is complete hot garbage and If I didn't get a student discount I would cancel and go back to pirating tv shows and collecting them on a harddrive.

I enjoy the programs that are available, but I'm starting to get upset because of the issues with being able to play any of the content without "Something Went Wrong". It has become more and more of a frequent occurrence, and I'm paying for this platform to watch without ads. Please fix the issues with the app, because I know it's not my phone or my connection. Netflix runs smoothly everytime.

The app itself is fine but the amount of commercials is insane. I could watch more actual show time on regular cable than on this app. My husband and I will watch a whopping 15 seconds of our actual show just to have another 2 minute commercial break. I know it's for a cheap price but we still pay! No other app I have with commercials has such long and frequent commercial breaks. Also, if you have to pause or rewind, the commercials will start all over again along with the content of the show.

The app doesn't work. It stops playing and loads for a long time. (and its not my connection, netflix and other platforms work perfectly) It doesn't save progress so I have to go looking for my spot. Ads every 10 minutes. I've tried on my TV, phone , laptop and nothing works. I dont remember it being this bad.

I mostly use Hulu for letterkenny and anime that isn't on Crunchyroll. selection wise it's alright and getting better. but at least in the anime section, the audio streaming/mixing is God awful. compared to other platforms everything just sounds like it was made in a dingy office. I'm not sure what could cause this poor audio quality, but some voices are so excessively loud and some can barely be heard. I have to turn my volume up for conversations and down for ANY action sequence. it's bad.

Overall experience is terrible. No way to switch to Live TV channels without going to the channel, pressing up 5x and clicking this tiny channel button. No way to view a channel content and menus overly complicated and glitchy. The trial also contains ads in Hulu. When signing up there were a lot of glitches with saying "something went wrong, please contact us". The TV app makes you use the remote and login with no option to scan QR code.

This streaming app has some old TV shows that aren't offered on many platforms, which is nice...but the ads are some of the worst I've encountered. I'll get 2-3 minutes of ads before an episode starts, then a 30 second intro plays for an episode, and then I get a full set of ads AGAIN! Just now I had a full set of ads just for the credits to an episode to finish. Too many ads for a paid subscription imo.

I am so over this app. I paid for no ads and still got ads on everything. The ads have gotten so bad that I will have to watch 2 mins to watch 30 seconds of my show for another 2 mins of ads right after! Not to mention all of the glitches if you use a fire TV. if there is an "interactable ad" and it needs you to click what experience you want, it glitches the whole episode and then you can't watch it at all. ever. I have many more complaints but those are the main two.

The subtitles for hulu are so unreliable. I have closed the app, backed out, logged out, and done all the troubleshooting. They are still out of sync when I try to watch the episode from where I left off. This has been an issue for years and is still not fixed. You're a multimillion dollar company and can't fix this? Do better.

title: Swiggy: Food Instamart Dineout
description:
Hungry or Need Groceries in 10 minutes? üõçÔ∏èüçî

Welcome to Swiggy, your one-stop shop for online food ordering, groceries, dining, and convenient pickup & delivery!

Here's why India LOVES Swiggy üëá

- Order food, get instant grocery delivery, & other essential services online
- 30+ cuisines
- Swiggy One users get unlimited Free Delivery on all orders
- Find top local restaurants like Mcdonald's & Burger King in your city
- Order Groceries like Maggi, Dairy Milk Chocolate, and Amul fresh cream & enjoy lightening delivery in 10 Mins with Instamart
- Get great discounts by paying dining out bills via Swiggy Dineout
- Late-night delivery
- Real-time updates on your order status & an ETA 
- Make payments via VISA/MasterCard Credit or Debit Cards, Net Banking, Paytm, FreeCharge, MobiKwik wallet, Sodexo Meal Cards, cash on delivery & credit services like LazyPay.

ü•ô Food Delivery: Order Delicious Food With A Tap ü•ô

Get Up To 60% Off + Free Delivery with Pocket Hero's picks
That's not all! There are No Minimum Order conditions, so you can order even a single item on Swiggy.

Order chicken biryani, Margherita pizza, masala dosa, vegetarian and chicken burgers, coffee, tacos, chicken momos, desserts, and more.

Explore our endless range of cuisines, including North Indian, Chinese, South Indian, Thai, Vietnamese, American, Healthy, Street Food, Breakfast, Late-Night Cravings, and more.

Get North Indian dishes, Punjabi cuisine, South Indian cuisine, Thai cuisine, and Bengali cuisine with top chains like Domino's Pizza, Wow Momo, KFC, Burger King, Pizza Hut, FreshMenu, McDonald's, Subway, Faasos, Starbucks coffee, and more.

- Find local restaurants, breakfast places, brunch spots, cafes & bars

üõí INSTAMART- Get Anything In 10 Minutes üõí

Instamart delivers groceries and more to your doorstep within 10 Minutes. We take care of your groceries, emergency supplies, midnight cravings, cake deliveries, and more.
From Lay's chips, Davidoff coffee, and diet coke to fruits, vegetables, Amul ice cream delivery, dairy, Galaxy chocolate, cleaning essentials, personal care products like Santoor soap and Sunsilk shampoo, and baby care, you can find everything here.

- Present in 120+ cities, open from 6 a.m. to late at night* for Grocery Essentials like Maggi, Pringles Chips, Nescafe Coffee, and more.
*Opening & closing times might vary across cities owing to Govt. regulations.
- Grab 30,000+ products across groceries & other categories like toys, stationery, home & kitchen appliances, electronics, beauty & more.

üçΩÔ∏è DINEOUT - deals on dining out at top restaurants
Use Swiggy Dineout to get up to 50% FLAT discounts with no upper limit on your dining-out bills.
Over 40,000+ restaurants across 40 cities 
additional up to 15% off on your bills with HDFC Bank Credit Cards
Pre-booking / reserve your table options for hassle-free dining
Find the trending cafes, bars, pubs, breweries, luxury dining, kid-friendly, rooftop dining, brunch buffets, and much more! 

With Swiggy One, you'll experience savings like never before. 
üçî Unlimited free delivery from top restaurants
üçï Extra 30% discount from popular restaurants
üõí Unlimited free delivery on all Instamart orders
üöó No additional surge fee

üöÇOrder Food Delivery In Train IRCTC Delivery üöÇ

Now, you can enjoy Swiggy's online food delivery even while traveling! With Swiggy's IRCTC delivery service, order food on train from top-rated restaurants at major railway stations and have it delivered directly to your train seat. Enter your train number, and let Swiggy handle the rest.

summary: Online Food Delivery | Exciting Dineout Deals | Grocery Delivery In 10 Minutes

scraped_reviews.content: All good, but in my personal experience, 2 places where it's cheating/scamming customers: 1. Restaurant packing charge: they charge the customer but don't pay anything to the restaurant. I have personally checked with many restaurants. 2. On time guarantee: this app cheats by running fake timer where sometimes it just sits there at the same wait time for several minutes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey, we request you to let us know more about your experience by writing us an email at swiggysocial@swiggy.in from your registered email ID so that we can have your concern addressed.

scraped_reviews.content: They show you a delivery time which changes as soon as you place the order. they assign another order to your delivery partner but show your order as out for delivery even if they are waiting to pick the other order. They ask for more money if you want the delivery exclusively for yourself. something has seriously gone wrong in the management. This is shameful. not using the app anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are disappointed to hear about the trouble we put you through. We would like to look into this and make amends for the hassle. Please do share your registered details by dropping an email at swiggysocial@swiggy.in, we will ensure the quickest resolution.

scraped_reviews.content: Swiggy customer service is deteriorating exponentially, I wish I could provide negative ratings. I am not someone who form opinion based on one incident and on swiggy I have had multiple instances of bad experience. Sometimes they will assign delivery partner who will not deliver and then they will give random reason and assign other one. In the process you wait for hours. Even in 10 minute category they show order deliverable within 8 minutes and when you order they will deliver in 30 minutes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, that should not have happened and we would like to get this checked right away. Kindly help us with your order ID over an email to swiggysocial@swiggy.in, it will help us take this up with our executives and work on corrective measures.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to love Swiggy but it's getting worse everyday. Got orders delayed by half an our, got cold food delivered, didn't get any compensation. All I got was false promises, twice. Was trying to add a mode of payment and mistakenly placed an order today. Immediately went to cancel the order only to be informed a cancellation fees of the full amount would be charged. it's not even been a minute yet. Frustrating would be understatement.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, that doesn't sound right. We would like to have this investigated. Please share the relevant order ID to swiggysocial@swiggy.in and we will assist you further in this regard.

scraped_reviews.content: the worst customer care service I have ever received. one of the time was missing from my order and when I tried to contact them , they just closed every conversation without any help or discussion. and I had just renewed the membership. and yes most importantly, when I asked for the invoice it doesn't contain any order details.. no mention of any items in the invoice
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, we apologize for the inconvenience caused. We request you to kindly let us know more about the issue by writing to us at swiggysocial@swiggy.in from your registered email address, so we can look into it and have it fixed at the earliest.

scraped_reviews.content: i added 2 items to my cart and went to the payment page. when the payment got initiated I saw that the amount is being charged for just 1 item and it went through. That's when I realised the restaurant branch automatically changed and it probably removed the item that was not available in the store by itself. This lead to additional delivery charges and when I tried to cancel, that didn't happen and there was no response from support for 15 minutes. ended up paying extra for a glitch on the app.

Deliveries are taking so much time now. 1 hour is fine I understand but I received my order from a restaurant 3km away after 90 minutes. The same delivery guy is assigned another order 6km away from the restaurant. Chat support is a bot who tells me the things I already know. Its very annoying. if you want food on time order at least 2 hours before.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please let us know how we can make our service better by writing to us at swiggysocial@swiggy.in from your registered email address.

scraped_reviews.content: Worst experience ever. I had placed an order and there was no rider available and i waited till 11pm in the night but still order was not delivered. And I got a message to cancel the order as there was no rider then I cancelled the order and I have been charged with cancellation fee. Simple and easy way to trap the customers. Please don't do such things.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we are sorry for any hassle you have faced while ordering with us. Please share the order ID along with the details of the issue by writing to us at swiggysocial@swiggy.in from your registered email address and we would be happy to connect with you and resolve the matter.

scraped_reviews.content: What a terrible app this has become. Always freezes. All the time. Can't place an order. Can't browse for food. Can't browse instamart. It's constantly freezing and glitching out. And this is not new, it's been going on for months. I've resorted to using Swiggy in my browser because at least it works. Is this how you treat One members? Is this how bad your app development has gone? And you think you can do a successful IPO?? Sad state of affairs here. Disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're apologetic about this experience you've faced while ordering with us. Please write to us at swiggysocial@swiggy.in from your registered email address detailing your experience, so we can look into the issue and resolve it for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Ordered 2 items that were available while ordering and pre-paid for it. But after ordering One item went out of stock & never delivered for which I got a refund for that item. Reorderd that item and some other a few days later seeing it available, But they gave me entirely different product for 2 items. You can't connect to anyone for support in app unless you have their membership. As the AI chatbot didn't give any solution I sent a mail. A week later the response was cant be replaced/refunded.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, we apologize for the inconvenience caused. We request you to kindly let us know more about the issue by writing to us at swiggysocial@swiggy.in from your registered email address, so we can look into it and have it fixed at the earliest.

scraped_reviews.content: It's almost impossible to give feedback. On one of my orders, the delivery partner could not find the restaurant at its given location and asked me to cancel the order. I did cancel the order, but was unable to provide feedback. The Help & Support section has limited options, with no place to give open-ended/specific feedback. The customer care number the chatbot gave me was dead, I called twice but could not hear anything. There is no option on the app to leave feedback for the restaurant.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we would like to know more about it. Please write to us at swiggysocial@swiggy.in with relevant details elaborating further on your ordering experience with us, so we can set this right for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Very bad experience, they dont have any delivery partners. It takes them more than 30 mins just to assign someone and then the same person gets assigned multiple orders. While they show 60 mins delivery time on the app, it definitely takes a lot more time and they would still show delivered on time. There is no way to reach out to customer service, the bot keeps giving repetitive replies. They should either shut down or provide a better customer experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we are sorry for any hassle you have faced while ordering with us. Please share the order ID along with the details of the issue by writing to us at swiggysocial@swiggy.in from your registered email address and we would be happy to connect with you and resolve the matter.

scraped_reviews.content: On multiple occasions I have noticed that they give an offer/coupon, mention it's validity, but when you check again after some time or a few days later (still within the validity period aforementioned) the offer has disappeared!! This is Swiggy's way of deceiving the customer into making a quick decision! If they don't use the coupon immediately, it is gone! I received a coupon of 120 off on 699 valid till 22nd November which has now disappeared! Shameless behaviour, don't mess with my trust!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are sorry about this. Please help us with the order id over an email at swiggysocial@swiggy.in, so we can help resolve the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the worst app to order from. I ordered 3 meals from Burger Farm on 14 November at 8 PM and got the order at 9 PM, but it only had 2 fries and 1 fries and 3 burgers was missing. I raised a complaint, and the executive offered a coupon for the same amount. When I tried to use it, it showed an error. When I told them, they said the code will work after 2 hours. So basically, I‚Äôm hungry now, but they expect me to wait 2 hours to use a coupon for the item I already paid for.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Oops! Our apologies for the trouble you're having with your order. To help us get this sorted right away, could you please send your order ID to swiggysocial@swiggy.in? We're on it!

scraped_reviews.content: i ordered just today. for around 450 rs. n app didn't showed my order and showed my items in cart. so i ordered again. from the same cart. and now I have two orders and the support is not cancelling it or refunding me for it. it's the issue with your app and I don't have to pay for it. Fix your app and give me refund for the same. i spent 30 min on call with your escalation desk and all he said was sorry we won't be able to do anything. what kind of customer service is this?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, we are sorry for the unpleasant experience you had. Please share more details about the incident by writing an email at swiggysocial@swiggy.in from your registered email ID. we'll take it up.

scraped_reviews.content: Dismal UI. There is no confirmation screen for the Pay button, which means you can end up placing a large order if you accidentally tap on it. There is no way to cancel an order after you place it either, not even within 10 seconds of accidentally placing it. If your finger accidentally touches the Pay button while you have a large number of items in your cart, you'd have to pay for that order, although you didn't mean to place it. Absolutely abysmal UI design.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, we apologize for the inconvenience caused. We request you to kindly let us know more about the issue by writing to us at swiggysocial@swiggy.in from your registered email address, so we can look into it and have it fixed at the earliest.

scraped_reviews.content: One item was missing from my order. When I tried to report it via the app, I encountered a glitch preventing me from submitting the issue. I reinstalled the app and cleared the cache, but it didn't help. Customer support was unhelpful - one rep said it would fix itself, but over 24 hours later, nothing has changed. I even received an automated message saying my order wasn‚Äôt active, despite it being clearly so. Extremely frustrating. Still waiting for a refund.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, sorry to know that you are unhappy with the interaction. Please share the relevant order ID along with the details of the issue to swiggysocial@swiggy.in and we will fix this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: I ordered food from the app, and it showed 30‚Äì35 minutes delivery time. But right after the payment, it changed to 50‚Äì55 minutes. I tried to cancel immediately, but it showed a cancellation fee that‚Äôs the same as what I paid, which really doesn‚Äôt seem fair. Also, the help center isn‚Äôt helpful at all ‚Äî it only gives automatic responses and there‚Äôs no option to explain the issue properly. This whole experience is really disappointing
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're disappointed to know the service has not been to your satisfaction. Kindly write to us at swiggysocial@swiggy.in from your registered email address and we'll have this addressed.

scraped_reviews.content: This is like the 6th or 7th time when they straight up refuse to initiate refunds even when the issue is genuine. I've lost counts on how many times I've gotten the wrong order and they just refuse to initiate refund or listen to me. It happened just last night as well. If you do not want to hear customer complaints, why even bother putting up pretentious customer support who allegedly will help customers if they have issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: This shouldn't have happened. Kindly help us with the order ID along with the details of the issue by writing to us at swiggysocial@swiggy.in from your registered email ID & we will have this checked.

scraped_reviews.content: Very bad experience. When I'm paying for something, I expect to get all the items. It's been three times when I ordered something and items were missing. Even the reporting of these issues didn't fix anything. I will never use this app or any other service by Swiggy. 0/10. Zomato and Eatsure are way better. scraped_reviews.content: I am very disappointed with the recent service. Orders are always taking 60‚Äì70 minutes to deliver, which is far beyond the promised time. scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Thank you so much for the excellent rating. We're absolutely thrilled, and it inspires us to keep delivering exceptional service. Keep Swiggying! üß°‚ú®

scraped_reviews.content: every time I ordered and something went wrong with the order. missing food items and üòï cold food. when we connected to the restaurant they told us that it was not there mistake. and this is not first time when I faced this issue. we all are going to uninstall the Swiggy application. because number of time we complaint but they are not improving their services.

scraped_reviews.content: I ordered at 12:36 PM and waited for almost 3 hours, only for the order to be cancelled because the delivery partner‚Äôs bike broke down. scraped_reviews.content: I order the food and give instruction to drop at hotel lobby and give my room number. But this app cancel the order and apply the full order bill as cancellation fee. I would Avoid there services at all costs at this point !!

scraped_reviews.content: worst to the core, cheating the customer with higher rates and even providing fake coupons for outdated orders. very very cheap and worst experience each and every time., especially when it comes to Instamart, the products sent are outdated 4/5 times. do not use this application at any cost. title: BlaBlaCar: Carpooling and Bus
description:
BlaBlaCar: Carpooling and Bus - your pick of rides at low prices! The choice is yours with thousands of rides and destinations on BlaBlaCar. Ride with someone going your way and save on your travel costs. You will find rides at your doorstep thanks to many different options of carpooling and bus carriers.

Carpooling
Driving somewhere?
Share your ride and start saving on travel costs!
‚Ä¢ Publish your next ride in just minutes: it‚Äôs easy and fast
‚Ä¢ Decide who goes with you: review passengers‚Äô profiles and ratings to know who you‚Äôre travelling with.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy the ride: that‚Äôs how easy it is to start saving on travel costs!

Want to go somewhere?
Book, meet and travel at low prices no matter where you‚Äôre going.
‚Ä¢ Search for a ride among thousands of destinations.
‚Ä¢ Find the ride closest to you: there‚Äôs maybe one leaving from just around the corner.
‚Ä¢ Book a seat instantly or request a seat: it‚Äôs simple!
‚Ä¢ Get closer to where you want to go, thanks to thousands of carpool options.

BlaBlaCar buses
Book your next bus ride and travel at low prices.
‚Ä¢ Choose among a wide choice of destinations.
‚Ä¢ Bag a bargain with bus tickets from just ‚Ç¨X.XX for trips in France or in Germany.
‚Ä¢ Book your bus ticket easily and enjoy the ride.

-------------------------
Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
TELL US WHAT YOU THINK: https://www.blablacar.co.uk/contact

summary: Travel by carpool & bus

scraped_reviews.content: super easy to use, good drivers, more convenient than buses or trains. just have to watch out for the size of baggage you bring. also be sure to note how tall you are in your profile (193cm!) because some small cars can get uncomfortable. the biggest minus is that they don't have enough drivers going to smaller villages, but maybe as it gets more popular.

This app makes my unplanned trips completely hassle-free! It‚Äôs incredibly reliable and easy to use. I highly recommend it to everyone who loves spontaneous travel! You can plan your trip in advance if rides are available on your preferred travel date. Typically, rides are posted a couple of days before the journey, as owners often finalize their plans at the last minute based on availability and demand/availability of co-passengers.

Great experiance of app and finds the rides better. Also for our rides gets the passengers easily. Nice UI and updates. It is very helpful for the environment by sharing rides instead of individual ones and increasing traffic and pollution problems, and economically helpful for people as well. Only one caution I would say not for the app but for the users using it, don't pay before ride completes.

Based on today‚Äôs experience, many drivers and travel agents are bluffing on BlaBla. The driver name shown in the app is often different from the person who actually arrives, and the vehicle provided is not the same as the one shown during booking. This feels like a major scam. Most passengers, having no other choice at the moment, end up accepting whatever option is available in front of them.

Very useful app for frequent travellers. But it has a bug which I have experienced multiple times. App doesn't open at all. Especially few minutes before ride time. Sometimes the route shown is wrong. Whatever updates the owner of car makes, it is not shown in our app in real time. Also if we could get an sms notification when someone cancels the ride it would help a lot. A good app, otherwise.

I have been trying to register for three days, but the application does not allow me to. It constantly shows an error message about unusual browser behavior, suggesting things like clicking too fast, disabled JavaScript, or a robot on the same network. None of these apply to me ‚Äî I‚Äôm simply trying to create an account. This is the first application where I‚Äôve faced such a registration issue.

The app is awesome! the only problem I have is I search a ride for 1+ passengers, rides not available at my preferred time, so I create a ride alert. I receive alerts on email and app notification. I can't change the number of passengers while booking from the alerts. I can't find the ride if I search from the app. happy to connect and explain the issue, if the developer team is interested.

It's the best app for sharing rides at an affordable cost. The only problem I face is that we can't check whether a ride has started or not, or where the car owner actually is. There's no live map location. Most drivers lie and arrive at the location 1-2 hours late.

I had a nice experience using your service. I would like to share a couple of suggestions for improvement: 1. Real-time GPS Tracking: If possible, please consider implementing real-time GPS tracking to display the current location of the ride. This feature would help users plan their time more effectively. 2. Advertisements: Some advertisements are quite lengthy, and there is no skip option available. Introducing a shorter ad duration or a skip feature would enhance the overall user experienc

I will use rare cases, but really it will help us as well as others. Thanks for the Bla Bla Car services. But one small problem I have faced, one of the passenger booked the ride but after starting when I have called and messaged him several times - at the last moment due to some reason he needs to stay back, in that case he needs to cancel the ride. No language choice, profile picture zooms on your smallest pimple, it appears as if they want to create confusion by deciding at what hour your car will magically appear at destination, because every driver always drives at the same speed and traffic jams do not exist. it's such a shame they have a monopoly.

Very unreliable app, bookings done on the app are cancelled automatically, rides available on the app are totally converted to business, these are not fellow travellers, they have setup business around this app. Once we book the ride, they give personal number where we have to call and then they adjust us in there available cars Multiple accounts of same person and accounts of groups of people working together as a business. Not sure about using it frequently.

I've been using bla bla for more than 5 years. Had gone numerous journeys. each one was better in a way. it was more safer, reliable, flexible and mostly humane in terms of cost than the rubbish omni bus services. Think of it, will you share your own car with some stranger jus for the sake of 700 or 1000 bucks he/she gives. but all the people I've got to ride with was good,not a very soar experience except in terms of engaging and topics of interest. some people talk,few drive silently. amazing.

You can't use the app; just launch it. First, you get a long advertisement, which is so frustrating. I booked on the web login, but after a long time, there was no reply, even though the ride was confirmed. When I called the driver, he refused due to a route change, and another driver canceled the ride. Otherwise, there was no reply from their side, so always make a plan B; don't trust them.

really good app, the value it brings is immense. I'm giving 4 stars because I think more features could be added to make it easier to agree on where to meet because it's quite frequent for the driver to end up a few hundred meters away from the meeting point, this could be solved through location sharing and extending the chat to allow sharing places and coordinates. Additionally, a nice feature to add to chat is replies.

The app provides really good service through approved drivers. Just one thing I observed is that there's one main person who got the approval and then he handles 2-3 cars driven by other drivers which may or may not be registered with the app. So kindly ensure that safety. Else a good service especially at places where cabs are unavailable.

Nice app. Need to improve about booking. people are booking but at the last moment they cancel the ride. And give excuses. If they are cancelling at the last moment then the app should not allow or change it. Thanks... And the default ticket rate should be high. it should show Rs. 3 per KM.

I know many people who use this app and swear by it, but I have installed and uninstalled it multiple times in the past 2 years and never been able to use it. Not being able to choose English because I'm in Spain is silly. I've never had an app that functions this way before. People should be able to select their language for the app. We should also be able to add the language(s) we speak and at what levels on our profile to better connect with people we'll be sitting in a car with for hours.

Very good app. Please bring back the near, far distance colour coding. It was a very very useful feature. Dont know what made you remove it. And add an option to save rides so that you can save few rides and decide to book among saved rides and not go through n number of rides multiple times. Currently I have to go through many rides which are irrelevant everytime I check for ride. Please implement this feature.

Really bad user UX. I understand that this app fully relies on people's commitment but this is Product fault: - Not being able to select more than one driver in the same hour. So I don't need to rely on just one and can cancel the others once one confirms. - Drivers add a due time for the confirmation that matches with departure time. - No penalty for drivers that don't confirm a passenger request. - Origin and destination info is removed every time I move to other features in the tab bar

I'm reviewing after a couple of years of usage, one thing is was major role playing is in terms of distance showing in colour coding way I.e "close to departure/arrival points icon green/orange" has been removed and it's very difficult to find out whos is near or long distance now...!! #Blabla whatever you update, but bring it back again that feature..!!

Best app for sharing cab service Sure üôÇ "Please add a notification with a tone so that I can know when a ride message or notification arrives." This is a good app for both passengers and drivers but some people create fake IDs here and make bookings, later when the driver calls, either the number is wrong or he does not pick up the call, in which condition Some numbers are given which are from outside countries and it is impossible to contact on them. Please pay attention to this

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Great App for Affordable Travel! Using Bla Bla, I can easily travel from my source to destination without paying any extra charges. As a user, the only thing to keep in mind is to travel with verified people and avoid those using it like a taxi service. Apart from that, the app itself is awesome and works perfectly! üöóüëè

Pretty horrible and more or less useless. The app just doesn't work half the time, just returns errors or opens to a blank screen. Yes I tried reinstalling and all that stuff. Very clunky as well. I guess that's why hardly anyone uses it and why there are f all share rides available. I have a complete and verified profile and reached out three times to book a ride and they all just rejected or didn't answer.

BlaBlaCar is one of the best apps for safe and affordable travel. It connects genuine drivers and passengers, making long-distance travel convenient and cost-effective. The app interface is smooth, easy to use, and provides real-time updates. I‚Äôve had multiple great rides with polite and punctual co-travellers. Highly recommended for those who love comfortable and budget-friendly travel!

First the app would not allow me to login. Finally after trying over several days I could log in, but now morning loads, only a blank white screen. I've used this service several times in the past and it was great. It is a pity the app is completely dysfunctional.

Safe, Reliable, and Affordable! BlsBla has completely changed how I travel. The verification process for users makes me feel secure, and I appreciate the ability to see reviews of drivers and passengers before booking. The payment is seamless within the app, and I've found the pick-up and drop-off coordination to be very smooth. A must-have app for any frequent traveler!

good app but recently I faced an issue with a ride in which i booked it then when I reached the pickup location he asked me to come to a different location and when I reached there he changed the drop location and told me that few passengers cancelled his ride so he won't go and asked for extra charges but as the purpose of this app "it's a mutual destination sharing ride and it's not like ola, uber" but people using it like taxi service, and I faced the same with this ride. so team PLITT.

it's a good app for long ride users . it is very helpful to share rides with others to secure the environment and control the pollution. It's easy to book and schedule your journey. I strongly recommend the people who want to share rides and book the rides .

Worst application ever! Absolutely no ride guarantee every time you try to book, it either gets canceled or no driver accepts the ride. Total waste of time and patience. The app keeps showing "searching for driver" forever and offers zero support when things go wrong. Completely unreliable don't depend on this app if you actually need to reach Somewhere on time!

BlaBlaCar is a useful app for long-distance travel. It connects drivers and passengers going in the same direction. The prices are reasonable, but sometimes last-minute cancellations can be an issue. Overall, it‚Äôs a good and budget-friendly travel option.

I am facing the ride cancel issue at the time of departure. It shouldn't be working with anyone to manage their planning if the ride canceled at the of departure. So NEED TO BE PREPARED FOR "PLAN B" ALWAYS. And Secondly there are travelling business fellows who manipulating this app for their gain and messing with the app as well as Passenger.

best car pool app, but some riders cancelling the ride without any information. that considered like cheating. waiting for them for long hours. they won't pick the calls and we have to change the journey plan. just be aware of this and use the app wisely.

After 3 trips, what i felt is, its a worst platform, not even a single driver takes responsibility, just travelling to save time but always late pickup, late droppings. Places one route, and asks to come to some other location.cancels without mentioning, no response if called. All drivers are arrogant. Behaves like i dont care. Worst worst experinces, my suggestion avoid this app, mostly cars are run by travelling agents. This app just connects, doesnot verify the status.

This is a great app that offers services completely free of any charges. However, there is a small suggestion for improvement that could significantly enhance user experience. Currently, if there is one pending request for filling the last available seat on a ride, the app marks the ride as full, which can be somewhat misleading. As a result, multiple requests cannot be placed on hold simultaneously, potent

I‚Äôve been using BlaBlaCar and it‚Äôs been a great experience! The app is really helpful and makes finding rides so easy. Comfortable, and completely hassle-free. Highly recommended for anyone who travels often.

Never gonna use bla bla again. Used it only once and It took me 4 hours extra to the place I was traveling to. Driver was literally driving so slow plus he was doing timepass half of the time. And was not giving any surity on what time we will reach the destination. We were uncertain and scared cause it was literally night time. Plus driver also charged double the price which was shown on the app.

Fantastic application very Useful and Easy to Use .....Really Great Idea and Finally Find my other way to Earn money and Travelling to different Places with Less time without thinking Fuel Expenses....Time saving compare to buses and Trains really good application I'm giving a review for the first time.....Really Happyüòçü§©

Good application. Always meet new and great friends. One thing I faced that some pessengers need not pick the phone at departure time nor they cancel their ride. This causes financial loss to car owner and other pessenger also suffer not received the seat. The ride also skip from phone 15 minutes before departure time. It should be shown even after the departure time more than 15 minutes later. Because at that time mostly car is moving in city and in emergency any person can approach the driver

Overall, my experience with Bla Bla was good. However, some drivers did not respond appropriately. It would be beneficial if such drivers were reviewed or blacklisted, ensuring that every driver maintains proper communication and professionalism.

Earlier when I selected a ride it used to show me the distance from my location to pick-up point and also distance between my drop point & drop point set by the rider...how can you remove something that is useful in the name of App Update and where the useful options are removed... what kind of update would you say it is ...

This app is really good for car pooling. Some points I want to highlight, hope they will be considered for improvement. 1. To highlight the Taxi service provider offering the ride through this app. 2. Should initiate the Discount or Loyalty program for the customer using it more often. 3. Extra benefits for the customer creating Ride through this app. 4. Should be a more interactive user interface of this app. 5. Should provide a solution for shifting between different tabs of messages...etc...

terrible. drivers book with you a day before and then cancel an hour before the ride. this is the most unreliable system in the world for transportation. these drivers should be banned from the app, but there does not appear to be that option. only one put of ten did not suddenly cancel. DO NOT use this service!

You've been blocked cause bla-bla-bla. Same problem as many other people. I'm using mobile - of course there MIGHT be a bot in my network. And how do you propose me to deal with it? Your bot-fighting department is garbage. Fire them and the app would be better. Also save some salary costs to make the app really better. Most ironic is that web version works perfectly for me on phone.

I have been using this app for more than a decade both offering and getting ride through this, although not frequently. Surprsingly no service charges and mostly genuine people use this. Recently few travel taxi people have started offering through this app and that is affecting overall experience, rest all is excellent.

good app but have to focus on pricing. "I recently booked a ride from kolhapur to pune and noticed that the driver was charging much higher than the usual fare for the same route. Also if we join the ride from middle of the route we have to pay same amount. It would be great if BlaBlaCar could monitor driver pricing more closely and ensure fair and transparent charges

This app is full of fake profiles and owners. Also, there is no call centre to report. Neither they took any actions over fraud drivers. instead, they easily delete their profile and create new one without any inquiry and clean background. this app should be banned with immediate effect

Hi, while using the chat option, the keyboard covers the whole chat area on One plus nord CE5. I am not able to see what i have typed in the chat box, I have to keep closing the keyword to check the typed message. Kindly fix this issue or is it only for One plus nord ce 5 issue?

Bla bla is a great app & big help for those who use public transport & usually travel alone in their car like daily round trips. This facility help people to travel via car in a reasonable rate. It s a good source of income as well as you got company of people to travel along with you. Smooth to use, reliable, and really helpful. Highly recommended!"

this is very usefull app and helps many who wants to travel usually with all options, where we can select with whom I can travel up to what distance, how the car is, what is the car owner rating is. overall good.. 1* less just because wants to see more functionalities.

title: Wayfair - Shop All Things Home
description:
The Wayfair app is the easiest way to go after your home goals. Discover app-only deals and early access to sales so you‚Äôll always get our best prices. Plus, be the first to know about price drops on your favorite furniture, decor, and more.

The Wayfair app makes your shopping journey seamless from start to finish. Get inspired with just-for-you recommendations. Once you score something you love, get order updates and real-time delivery tracking in the palm of your hand.

Just exploring? Use Lists to save, organize, and even share your favorite finds with friends and family when you need a second opinion.   

All the things you love about Wayfair‚Äôs website are in the app, too! Scroll through tons of home picks for every style, space, and budget ‚Äì so you can find the ones that are just right for you. And discover items you never knew you needed with seasonal decor hubs, trend spotlights, and more.

With the Wayfair app and your design ideas, that dream space is totally doable. Download now to get started today.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to find using this app enjoyable. You can use the filter tools and view the items in whatever order you prefer (newest to oldest, low to high, etc). I like being able to save my favorite items into folders. I can still do all that, as long as I am fine with having to log in every single time I try to do any of those things. I can't even just sign-in with my password everytime. I have to be emailed or texted with a code. It is just too much trouble.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with our app. We're aware of the issue and are working to get it fixed ASAP

scraped_reviews.content: Updating this one year later. App continues to bog down. The longer I shop the slower it gets until it finally freezes up and stop working altogether. Clearing the cache, deleting and re-downloading doesn't help. Please fix! Crashes a LOT! I finally found exactly the rug I wanted and the app crashed on me. Haven't been able to find it since. Very frustrating experience. I have cleared the cache, checked for updates, restarted the phone, etc. It works for about 5 or 10 minutes and crashes again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: App is terrible. Start going thru things and it freezes on the second or third page. Edit- it's worse. Put something in the search bar and it bring up maybe 20 objects but the rest of it stays blank. No option to filter or sort. Can't even shop in the site! I've tried multiple times in the past 24 hours. I'm done trying. I'm redecorating my home and it sucks being unable to shop when I need it. But guess I'll stick with stores that I can actually see merchandise. SMH
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry you‚Äôre having trouble with our app. We‚Äôre in touch with the right teams, and we‚Äôre going to try and get this fixed for you soon. Please check back in a few weeks, and the issue should be resolved.

scraped_reviews.content: Pixel 10 Pro XL. The app doesn't like when you leave the app in the background after a few hours. I experienced weird behavior like looping search results and the "add to cart" option not appearing in the product window when I returned to the app after some time. I have to force stop the app the get those functions back. Also, I can't expand customer submitted photos of the products in the review section, so the products people submit themselves are hard to see. App functions great otherwise.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: The Wayfair app freezes every time I try to do a search and filter it. It frequently goes back to the home page without provocation. very glitchy. As for the service, I have purchased several large furniture items from wayfair, and have been very pleased by the results. this review is about the app, not the items purchased. The app is frustrating to use and hinders seaches and purchases. easier to just use a computer
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry you‚Äôre having trouble with our app. We‚Äôre in touch with the right teams, and we‚Äôre going to try and get this fixed for you soon. Please check back in a few weeks, and the issue should be resolved.

scraped_reviews.content: Wayfair itself has great items, but this app is buggy as hell. Filters disappear if you exit and reenter the app, and it's often unclear sometimes if the search results are loading or not. This makes it hard to navigate between Wayfair and other furniture sources at the same time, among other annoyances. Still, the app works at a bare minimum.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the issues you are experiencing. We have been in touch with the right teams to get this resolved as soon as possible. For any assistance please call us at 877-WAYFAIR!

scraped_reviews.content: Don't Want To Join Rewards Program that is all but pushed down your throat. Even when you make it to, you think, the page that will be the final for checking out - there it is - an entire page pushing the rewards thing. At the bottom of the page BE CAREFUL if you agree to the terms you're agreeing to the Rewards terms and the cost is being Added to your balance. The only way I found to get around it is to click on the almost invisible X in the upper right corner. Doing this, I could checkout.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry you‚Äôre having trouble with our app. We‚Äôre in touch with the right teams, and we‚Äôre going to try and get this fixed for you soon. Please check back in a few weeks, and the issue should be resolved.

scraped_reviews.content: This may be the worst retail app I've ever tried to use. I use the link from texts alerting me about sales - and after it makes prove I'm human - it takes me to a reasonable home page. But this is where the fun starts - I can never link to ANYTHING from that page without an error saying "something went wrong". I have deleted, reloaded the app, changed email accounts. Nothing matters. I don't understand these positive reviews. I have never used a worse app for a retail store.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the trouble you are experiencing with our app. For further assistance, please email us at +18779293247.

scraped_reviews.content: Beautiful wall cover. Very tricky to line up repeating pattern and remove bubbles. I think the pattern really doesn't quite match up. I'm an unskilled wall paperer, with lots of DIY experience needing level measurements. This project is taking me quadruple the time I alloted. I'm being strategic hiding all my imperfections. Finished product looks fab. I didn't order enough though. Hoping my new order matches enough. Lucky for me, the new order will begin in a very forgiving area.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Kudos to you for installing the wall paper yourself! Thanks so much for the review!

scraped_reviews.content: Wayfair has the best prices and selection but the cellphone app needs a lot of work. The app force closes for no reason, screen freezes all the time, and I can't apply more than 4 filters without the app shutting down or slowing down to the point that I have to close it and reopen it. And yes, I verify the app doesn't have any updates pending, I'm hooked up to my home internet, and its the only app I have open, so I can confidently say the issues are with the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We truly appreciate your feedback. We‚Äôll be sure to share this with our team as we continue to improve our services. Please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out if there‚Äôs anything else we can assist you with. We‚Äôre always here to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Entered credit card number four different times. It was accepted every time. But then, when it would get to the last step of check out, it would throw my old credit card number onto the order. No matter what it would say, it was accepted and added, and then it would disappear. I needed to change the number as the old one was stolen. I finally gave up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with our app. We're aware of the issue and are working to get it fixed ASAP. Our sales team can be reached at (844) 261-2533 any time Monday to Friday 8 AM to 12 AM EST, Saturday 8 AM to 8 PM EST, and Sundays 9 AM to 6 PM EST.

scraped_reviews.content: The store itself is just amazing, filled with great finds and sometimes good discounts. This app, however, is just the worst. It's hard to log-in, browsing is super slow, i spent an hour trying to add a credit card so i just went to the website and did it in seconds. just stick to the website, don't download this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'll look into this issue for you. Please send us a note at +18779293247 so that we can follow up.

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible. It lags and crashes. Finally pick out everything you want, and it freezes at payment, sits on the loading circle of death, deletes your information so you have to keep entering it. Just buy brick and mortar. 2025 and they haven't figured out how to make an app yet. Every time I look at my cart, all the prices change daily. Like watching the stock market. App designed to make you pull your hair out trying to buy furniture.

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, I like this app. It does have some other room for improvement, such as: -The filters don't always filter according to my selections completely. -The filters don't always give me the choices I want to filter by (dimensions, features). -It gets laggy, then crashes (Android Samsung S21 Ultra). -Sometimes it freezes up and logs me out. -I wish that could edit search text -Checkout page won't let me see what I'm typing (scroll down) with my keyboard open.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your kind feedback. We are aware of this problem and are currently working on solving it. Please update your app to the latest version when you see an option.

scraped_reviews.content: Wayfair "Policy" is to make you suffer! From my experience, even though the seller is ready to give you a partial refund for a damaged part, the Wayfair "policy" doesn't allow partial refunds without returning the product! Also, according to Wayfair "policy", if the product is not even shipped on the date it was supposed to be delivered, you'll need to pay a return shipping fee (for the item sitting in their warehouse), to cancel it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
Sorry to hear that! We request that you please help us with your order/shipment number at +18779293247. We will get back to you at the earliest.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is always crashing or loading slowly. Most recently, there is no longer an icon in the toolbar to go to your cart! Update: After deleting and reinstalling the app, the problems persist! When I click on "shop," I am brought to a blank page. When I click on "manage order" from the home page, it will either open up a pop up with suggested items to buy or it will actually bring me to the order details. And still, there is no way to access your shopping cart! Changing to 1 star. Awful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We just released an updated version of the app that should fix the problems that you've reported. Please go to the Google Play Store and install the update or simply uninstall, then reinstall the app.

We hope you enjoy the new version of the app and will consider updating your review.

Thank you for shopping with Wayfair!

scraped_reviews.content: The app constantly takes you back to the shopping page after each completed step in the checkout process. I had to keep opening my cart to proceed to the next step in processing an order. That is super stupid, I'm actually trying to buy things, and they keep trying to sell me more stuff. That only makes sense to someone who graduated from the 16th grade with a marketing degree. I have a business account, so it's not as if we won't be buying more stuff later. Checkout means stop selling me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Jerry, our sincerest apologies for the experience you've had with our app. We've connected with the appropriate teams who will look into this further. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is consistently inconsistent. I'm so irritated. I've wasted half a day trying to make a purchase. I've removed and downloaded the app again. I add items to my cart, and when I go to check out, it says the cart is empty. I finally got to checkout, and the screen froze. If I didnt really want the items I found and they were available elsewhere, I'd delete the app forever.

The app appears to no longer offer any sort of item indexing like categories or collections. Instead, they'd rather you look at yet another endless feed of random, social-media-esque product spotlights. Or by using the "discover" tab which is... yet another social media feed, but this time just jpgs! Oh, and a plug-n-play AI chatbot. But no "Living Room" or "Sofas". Clearly Marketing's AI is calling the shots here, and not the UX team.

I shop on the app often, and it usually has glitches. The app freezes and closes unexpectedly, and the search filters don't narrow down the products. For quite a while, the "shop" button hasn't been working, so you have to go to the home screen to search and shop. There isn't even a cart button on the app. I have to go to the home screen, scroll down, and view cart. It really needs some updates.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with our app. We're aware of the issue and are working to get it fixed ASAP

scraped_reviews.content: Idk if I've ever left a bad review for an app, but this is maybe the worst retail app I've ever used. scraped_reviews.content: Fix your app!! The sort function and filters are garbage, they never work and freeze the app. Every. Single. Time. scraped_reviews.content: I love wayfair, the products are really nice and very affordable. They have a huge selection and a wide variety...but man does the app suck. It's slow, laggy, and crashes. Please fix this. You guys are literally making it hard for me to give you my money...editing my review to 1 star. The app really doesn't want my money, literally. payment won't even work. App is only good for tracking you order

scraped_reviews.content: Wayfair...FIX YOUR APP!! It's ridiculous this app is so terrible. It's glitchy, it freezes, searches won't load or load partially, it gets slowweerr the longer you're on it..and soon freezes again or just flat crashes. The search and filtering don't work well, listen to what your customers are searching for- stop with the "no you want THIS"! Uninstalling and reinstalling doesn't help.
