scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our sincerest apologies for the experience you've had with our app. We've informed the appropriate team, and they will look into this further. In the meantime, if the issue persists, please feel free to continue shopping with us directly at Wayfair.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Navigating the site was a challenge; especially when I attempted to use a promo code on a saved cart from the night before. When I went to my cart using the promo link the next morning, one of my items in my cart jumped up in price. Coincidence or intentional? The second time I adjusted my cart to delete the higher priced item for another similar item. When I went back to my cart, all of the other items in my cart magically disappeared. I had to start all over again. I did get my discount, final
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry you‚Äôre having trouble with our app. We‚Äôre in touch with the right teams, and we‚Äôre going to try and get this fixed for you soon. Please check back in a few weeks, and the issue should be resolved.

scraped_reviews.content: I got a couple of items back in September but dealing with this app was a nightmare. Browsing experience was fine but checking out was impossible. It was stuck on "loading" for long periods of time no matter how many times within a day and how many days in a week I tried to check out my items. This issue persistent not only in the app but also on their desktop website. I had to constantly try to check out just to get my items. I will avoid this app at all costs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Visara! Our sales team is also happy to help, feel free to call 877 929-3247, to place an order.

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible. Unusable even. Filters don't actually filter your selections. Example: if I choose a price point of $400 for a bed, it's probably not a good idea for 1/3 of the beds you show me to be between $500-1300 bucks. It's almost as if WayFair wants to show you what they want to sell you. Not good for people with a mission or goal, especially if you're strapped for time. Second worst: I had the app for maybe 1 hour, it crashed 4 times. Haven't uninstalled an app that fast in a while.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry you're having trouble with our app. We're aware of the issue and are working to get it fixed ASAP

scraped_reviews.content: Very disappointed with this app. I love shopping with Wayfair. The selection is great and the prices are very fair. I've purchased many products from them and will continue to do so, just not with this app. It crashes every single time I run a search causing me to have to restart it from the beginning over and over and over again. it's absolutely maddening! Do not recommend.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That doesn't sound right! Can you give us more information at +18779293247 so that we can investigate.

scraped_reviews.content: After downloading and getting the sign in page, somehow it recognized my email address as if I'd had an account before. I don't remember making one at all, but it's not out of the realm of possibility. After resetting the password which I had obviously forgotten, I was able to get in and browse just fine. Meanwhile, I'm getting bombarded with emails from Wayfair to reset my password over and over... as much as two and three times per minute! I ended up having to uninstall the app to stop it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry you‚Äôre having trouble with our app. We‚Äôre in touch with the right teams, and we‚Äôre going to try and get this fixed for you soon. Please check back in a few weeks, and the issue should be resolved.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is great when it works, however, it doesn't work consistently. I tried looking at a past order because I wanted to reorder something. The order is less than 1 year old, but the app was unable to pull it up. I kept getting the message "something went wrong". So I closed the app and logged onto overstock on my computer. Wayfair the malfunction of your app is costing you a lot of money in lost customers. Since the app is unreliable, I don't trust placing an order.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'll look into this issue for you. Please send us a note at +18779293247 so that we can follow up.

scraped_reviews.content: I like Wayfair, I'm not really a fan of the app though. There is no easy way to search by category, and the filters for products are more of a suggestion than actual filters. For example, I wanted to look for a three piece patio set (very common). The first few results were correct and then the next were all full 6,7,8 piece sets with 3 piece sprinkled in. I was so frustrated that I just gave up and eventually forgot about it. I was ready to buy too.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre sorry you‚Äôre having trouble with our app. We‚Äôre in touch with the right teams, and we‚Äôre going to try and get this fixed for you soon. Please check back in a few weeks, and the issue should be resolved.

scraped_reviews.content: If you view an item on your cart I loses your search results. It crashed twice in under 45 minutes. It has a memory leak. Their servers are incredibly slow to respond. They allow multiple sellers to list identical items at wildly different price points (the same bed for $375 and $1350). They also allow the same seller to list the same item multiple times at different price points. They will show the duplicates in the "similar items" AND even the item you're currently viewing.

Horrible app. It's laggy. I was updating my payment, and it just keeps giving me a blank screen after adding it at checkout. I went to settings, but I can't find a way to add a new card. Wayfair keeps upselling their own credit card, which was quite annoying. After the eighth attempt, I was finally able to add my card four hours later. We'll see if they manage to deliver my order.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: While they may have a large selection of items, which is good... I curated a wide range of items in my cart over a period of 3 months. One week after downloading the app, literally ONE DAY before I was going to order it all, and ONE DAY after I reviewed my selections, Wayfair erased my entire cart!!! If that wasn't bad enough, relocating the vast majority of it was nearly impossible!! Needless to say I made 99% of my purchases through other companies.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're so sorry to hear that this happened with your cart. If you need assistance with placing a future order, we're happy to help if you email service@wayfair.com. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Wayfair is not willing to work with their customers. I've had a Wayfair credit card for a while, but never had a desire to purchase anything until now. The desk I wanted was $10 over my credit limit and I wasn't able to do a split payment online. I called to do it over the phone and they said they don't do split payments. Ridiculous. I had a "$40 off" my first bill promotion and asked if they could take $10 off the order price and reduce it to a $30 promo. They said they could not. Their loss!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Dianna! We truly apologize that we were unable to accommodate a pricing adjustment. If further assitance is needed, our customer service team will be happy to help if you give us a call at 877-WAYFAIR or email service@wayfair.com. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: I love Wayfair. The items I buy come in handy more often than not and the sales usually make a lot of the products a reasonable price compared to most places. That is the ONLY thing keeping this review from being 1 star. I have an s9+ and other apps work beautifully with this phone, so I can rule out the phone being the issue. Pictures never load correctly on this app. I have to close it out and reopen it far too often. I can't see my orders without restarting the app a day later. Terrible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We‚Äôre sorry to hear you're experiencing these issues with our app. If you're able to provide more details, we'll use that information to try and fix the problem. Please email appsupport@wayfair.com with the following items to help us troubleshoot the issue:
-Screenshot of issue
-Device you are on
-Your app version
-Your Wayfair log in email address

scraped_reviews.content: Prices are never accurate. It may say $150 on the icon page, then opening the product to purchase it shows it's actually over $200. Shipping does not update properly, you're never notified of changes on your purchases. Delays are frequent, you'll be waiting close to a month for something that should have been delivered in two weeks. Customer service is great though. That's the only reason for a star.

Wayfair is no Amazon, which is unfortunate. The application is glitchy and has issues. It is limiting. I tried canceling an order, not yet shipped, but forget about that option. It doesn't work, it ends you external to a web page. Want to chat to fix it. Nope, you aren't going to get that option. Agents aren't there, and you get a chat box . My item hasn't shipped, was supposed to arrive 3 days ago, and they can't cancel it refund because the label has been made. This company is terrible!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: was given 10% off coupons, but they only work for first-time buyers. since I have purchased with them in the past, it wouldn't accept it. why send me a coupon I can't use? why penalize repeat buyers? because of the sale price and the uniqueness of the piece of furniture I ordered, I went ahead with the purchase. however, it put a bad taste in my mouth. it's not even the discount but the principle regarding the coupon. hopefully the delivery goes smooth and the item is as lovely in person.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we‚Äôre sorry for the trouble with your order. For assistance, our customer service team will be happy to help if you give us a call at 877-WAYFAIR or send an email to service@wayfair.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Not impressed with this app. Hardly ever lets me see tracking info on purchased items. Or when i look to see my order information a lot of times it doesnt work. I have high speed internet so its not a connection issue. Says no data connection. Please fix these bugs in the app. Really not a great app if you want to access your purchases and tracking is useless. Update 3-11-19. everything i marked as favorites for my list will not come up. so i just deleated the list of 60 items. Bad app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we're so sorry to hear that you've been having trouble with our app. Would you mind sending a few more details about your experience to appsupport@wayfair.com? Customer feedback is vital to helping us improve, so thank you for reaching out.

scraped_reviews.content: So bad. Takes forever to load and when you click on an item, it takes a long time to load the picture (if at all) and you can't see any details of the item and I havent actually been able to purchase anything from the app. Not sure if they want you to buy or not, but I am having a hard time giving Wayfair my money. I can order from my phone on my browser pretty easily though so I just do that if I need to. They need to sink some money into this. No app is better than a crappy one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We‚Äôre sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues with our app. If you're able to provide more details around, we will use that information to try and fix the problem. Please email appsupport@wayfair.com with the following items to help us troubleshoot this issue:
Screenshot of issue
Device you are on
App version 
Your Wayfair log in email

scraped_reviews.content: ...It's probably easier to use the website and just get email updates on shipping... Even though I turned off all notifications other than shipping updates, they send multiple notifications to shop, disguised as shipping updates. I only want to know about when my item leaves, arrives, or is diverted. That's all. No need to spam me to buy more items that match with what is on its way. Uninstalling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: ‚ö†Ô∏èI've bought three items so far and so I had decided to buy more items because I felt ok with purchasing, the shipment and how fast it came. Although when I wanted to buy more items, they kept canceling my orders and then took hundreds out of my bank account, i havent received a refund or any items. Then I called them and spoke to some guy named Thomas, he said that he couldn't do anything because some address was wrong, which it was not. Now I'm negative hundreds and the bank said to pay up.

We ordered a farmhouse dining set but our bench was not delivered. We've called customer service numerous times and always get "disconnected" partway through hold. Usually after 10-20 minutes. There is no other way to contact customer service. We've had good experiences with Wayfair up til now. Not anymore. Don't order anything that comes in a set.

-1 star if I could give.. 1. Customer care cannot be reached at any time. 2. Delivery date was moved two times and I have to wait another 3 weeks for the item and I cant cancel it now. 3. I cant track the item to know where it is or the progress of the shipping. Stay away from wayfair,not only the app but the site itself it is the worst place to shop online. This is my biggest regret of online shopping. üòíüò†

They canceled the orders on their end on many occasions, saying the product was out of stock when, in fact, they had made an error in the discount on the listing. So don't be assured that the ordered item will be delivered once the order is placed and money is deducted from your account. Skipped on all other deals for the wayfair order and after a week when all deals / prime day was gone they canceled the order. Completely unprofessional!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we‚Äôre sorry for the trouble with your order. For assistance, our customer service team will be happy to help if you give us a call at 877-WAYFAIR or send an email to service@wayfair.com.

scraped_reviews.content: My wife and I ordered an item and within less than an hour canceled the order. We got a message (a day later) telling us the order can't be canceled, the funds will be removed from our account, we will have to wait for the item to be delivered, and pay for the shipping cost to send it back (it will be deducted from our refund). A simple cancelation (within less than an hour) should not be a problem. We'll never deal with Wayfair again, the app has been deleted off both our phones.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Thomas, we‚Äôre sorry for the trouble with your order. For assistance, our customer service team will be happy to help if you give us a call at 877-WAYFAIR or email service@wayfair.com.

scraped_reviews.content: TERRIBLE! Don't waste your time or money with this company. They evidently allowed me to order an out of stock item, which I had to wait 5 days of with order status "preparing for shipping" and a call to customer service (CS) to figure out. They cancelled the order, and it has been "cancellation pending" for three days. Despite multiple calls to CS, they won't release the funds, so I can't order a replacement. CS is abysmal, and have lied to me several times. TOTALLY UNPROFESSIONAL!

Wayfair has been the poorest customer service for a company I've ever encountered. They don't care if you have an issue with your order being delayed, their response is simply "you can click on cancel order at any time." They dont care if you receive your product or not but they are quick to take the money as soon as the order is placed. I've reached out multiple times to ask why my order has been delayed every month since December, & I've received different responses every time. Beware!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we‚Äôre sorry for the trouble with your order. For assistance, our customer service team will be happy to help if you give us a call at 877-WAYFAIR or send an email to service@wayfair.com.

title: Instacart: Get Food Delivery
description:
Get food delivery and grocery orders delivered directly to your door in as fast as 30 minutes with our app that helps with your shopping. Let Instacart connect you to your favorite food & drink spots, local grocery store or chain and get your goods in no time. Browse, shop, and eat with convenient grocery delivery in just a few taps! Plus, enjoy $0 delivery fee on your first three grocery orders within 14 days of the first order. Service fees and terms apply!

Enjoy getting safe, contactless food delivery, including all of your grocery needs like your favorite home essentials and snack eats. Shop your grocery list, explore products from grocery stores around you, and get them delivered to your doorstep. Our grocery technology app helps you save money and time by avoiding multiple trips to the grocery store.

With Instacart, grocery savings are made easy. Get the best of grocery and food technology services all in one easy to use app. Order drinks, household items, snacks, groceries, or your favorite cuisine. You can even access same-day delivery across the US. Prefer pick up? Make your grocery orders online, pick up at your local store, and skip the fees. Download the app to see what supermarkets are available in your zip code.

Just imagine what you can do with on-demand grocery delivery through Instacart! From getting deliveries in as fast as 30-minutes to coupons that help with grocery savings ‚Äì Instacart has it all. Download your new favorite grocery technology app!

Meal delivery from restaurants, groceries, and shopping are easy with Instacart:

1. Enter your zip code before shopping for your grocery list
2. Shop online for fresh household items, electronics, ingredients, and snacks
3. Get exclusive discounts from local grocery store sales
4. Add your items to your cart and place your order
5. Chat with your shopper in real time to make any changes to your order
6. Get your shopping delivered straight to your door or skip the delivery fee and pick up at the store

INSTACART FEATURES

GROCERY SAVINGS & EASY SHOPPING FOR YOUR FAVORITE CUISINE
- Get your entire grocery store list delivered in as fast as 30 minutes
- Takeout, snacks, food & drinks directly delivered straight to you, from grocery stores around you for convenient and fast shopping
- Find grocery savings on drinks and home essentials available
- Get quick and safe orders with our contactless deliveries

SAVE TIME WITH OUR APP
- Skip visiting supermarkets and get more done with your day when you use Instacart to complete your grocery list
- Grocery savings on fresh produce, beverages, and late-night snacks
- Explore your grocery store from the comfort of your home and shop conveniently - Instacart helps you bring it all so you can do more

EARN  REWARDS, COUPONS, AND DEALS FOR YOUR GROCERY LIST
- Grocery savings found on some of your favorite products with Instacart
- Discover exclusive deals and grocery coupons found only on the Instacart grocery app
- Shop your grocery list, store sales, and get the better prices on produce, home essentials, and snack eats

SHOP GROCERY STORES & TAKEOUT NEAR YOU
- Instacart connects you with over 85,000 supermarkets and stores across North America
- Shop from your favorite stores ‚Äì Aldi, Publix, Costco, Safeway, and many more
- You can also support local supermarkets. Simply browse and shop with our app!
- Order your favorite snacks or takeout with same-day delivery
Instacart helps bring you fresh products, savory snacks, cold beverages, and everything you need to complete your grocery shopping. Earn rewards and more perks with Instacart+.

Download Instacart today and discover a faster, safer, and more convenient way to shop at grocery stores.

Terms apply. See details: https://www.instacart.com/help/section/360007996832

summary: Food Delivered to your door! Order from 1800+ Grocery & Retail Store Brands.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using the Instacart app for a little while now, and I really enjoy it. The app is very easy to use, you do pay more for some items than you would in the store, but that is the cost of convience. 9/11/24 UPDATE: I recently notice that when I order heavy items the female shoppers will mark them as not available, even when the item is available. I feel like some of them don't want to lift the heavy items. I'm ready to stop using instacart. I wish I could choose male shopper for my order

They give coupon codes, but then you can't ever use them. Again, I got a promo code for $40 off $80 IF I PICK UP. Somehow, there is never anyone available to make a pick up order, so they tell you to make it delivery. Well, then I pay extra and have to tip someone, and don't get the money off. I dont know why they keep advertising pick up if the stores around me don't offer it.

Before Instacart offered free delivery. Now, in order to force Instacart+ on people, you have to pay anywhere from $1.99 to $9.99 depending on how fast you need the items delivered; absolutely awful. Plus, shoppers don't know how to say thank you. A $25 tip isn't enough? Do you want $1,000? Items shown as in stock are often marked as not available & alternatives ignored. What a joke Instacart has become.

Beware! I have tried to reach support and work through ordering issues multiple times. Each time they have told me a different way that they cannot help me. They have told me they can link a new account but without my Instacart+ offers (which make restaurants affordable), that I can verify my number in a month after my subscription expires, and that, because I was able to place one order, I am not eligible for a refund. Run, fast and far.

Search function is busted. Shoppers consistently deliver to the wrong address. I've even received orders meant for other people, not just had my own orders misplaced. There needs to be more of a way to make sure shoppers drop off orders at the correct place. As it stands, I'm paying a monthly fee to get a slight discount on orders I rarely actually get.

Absolutely god awful, was fine once, now you can't get anything on there without the price being raised 20 times over. I recommend it if you're actually rich Edit: Forgot to mention they decided they were done delivering food within a few hours. Now you either pay extra to have them delivered normally, or pay double the extra amount to have it be delivered quickly. If you want that part to be free you can schedule for tomorrow, it doesn't matter, it's still sickingly expensive. Just go shopping

I've ordered groceries through here a few times and they never seem to get it right. Forget trying to buy produce they will pick the wrong items and they will be nearly rotten. I've also tried using the $25 off coupon for restaurant orders that they keep advertising. It is impossible to place an order, I've even tried restarting my phone and trying different restaurants. The orders will not go through. Then I reached out to customer service and they told me that they cannot help me. It's a scam

Only order from this app because of the limited options for grocery delivery apps. App is manipulative, it will say an item is in stock when you purchase it and check out and then say the item is no longer in stock. They manipulate you into making a purchase you would not have made had you known whether they had an item on hand or not. Wish there was an alternative.

Always an issue with billing.... I am trying to my multiple credits but for some reason they keep charging my credit card and leaving a few credits behind. Hopefully your order doesn't need substituting, because that really messes up the using of credits. At least a refund (in credits) was easy when my produce arrived visibly moldy or rotten. I wish they had reimbursed my credit card instead though - I don't want more stupid credits! My order should have been free, including fees and tip, but no

App used to be great for groceries, not any more. Yesterday I ordered about 40$ worth of groceries to make dinner, paid extra for Express so it would get delivered within 2 hours. Not only did my groceries get delivered 2 hours late, I was also charged twice 2 different amounts. So my 40$ groceries turned into 90$. Don't waste your time or money

Don't waste your time or your money! The prices are more expensive than purchasing in-store!!! For example, the rainbow carrots I purchase are normally $2.99, but in-app for delivery they are $3.36. I noticed this with a lot of the items that I normally purchase at ShopRite. I was going to use the $25 off an order of $50 or more, but it wouldn't be saving money since they're upping the prices. Seems like a con to get you to use their app!!

"It's great!" is what I would say if I could use the damn thing. But no, whenever I try to add one of my cards as a payment method, I get a "Something went wrong" error message for no reason at all. And the support line was no help either. Their advice was to wait 15 minutes to 24 HOURS and see if the app fixes itself. 0/10 app, do not recommend.

This app has become more slimy as its gone on; I went to checkout after adding things to my cart, and without asking me, there hidden in a new location that didn't exist before was a toggle ALREADY SWITCHED ON for buying Instacart membership. If you were someone that'd just hop to 'Confirm your order' without a second thought, you'd accidentally sign up for the service they nonstop spam you to get with every purchase. They're well-aware of this tactic. I hate Amazon, but it's time to switch.

Had a horrible experience... my shopper got stuck for over an hour at the shop unable to pay. the customer service is beyond horrible, also the help features in the app are bismal! sad there isn't an option to give 0 stars. I tried to reach customer service for over 30 minutes and in the end they just ended the chat and didn't help or resolve the issue. they just hung up on me...

I would appreciate the app alot more if I weren't constantly reminded that I get credits for shopping through the app that I will NEVER use. I'm allergic to too many things and ha e a picky family, so restaurant credits are not worth the headache of creating an order, nevermind getting one right. try offering credits in general or some kind of exchange. or even the opportunity to offer restaurant credits as tips? I won't use them. Aside from this issue, it's alright.

it is hard for beginners. I placed an order and apparently put the store i wanted them to shop at and not the home address. I thought it would prompt me to put it in later. it did not, so I had to cancel, and they changed $15. said he was working on the order, but that wasn't true because I had a note saying he was working on other orders before mine. This was all in a matter of 5 minutes when I figured out it wasn't going to my daughter's address. my mistake i guess but $15?? Not happy!

Paying the fee for priority is pointless when Shopping for multiple customers starts at the end of the quoted time frame and the delivery gets pushed back to the normal order time frame. Not to mention the app asks you to tip the shopper before even knowing how everything will turn out. Convenient if you can't go Shopping personally but if you really need something quick then you better go get it yourself.

first impression is a lasting impression, my order was paid for, plus was so called priority, you got your money, now my order is delayed up to 4 hours now. Update, cancelled the order. when I get done writing this review, I hope instacart realizes that they lost $6,535 dollar/year in one customer. I'll tell my friends and neighbors that asked me to let them know how it works out, so potentially, over $100,000 per year is gone. 8 hours for 7 items, uninstalling and will never use again.

I've been both a shopper and a customer. As a customer you are straight up lied to with the "Priority" $2 "straight to you" option. Every time I do this it says the shopper has multiple orders and the time gets delayed, not reduced. This is an outright scam. Shoppers are slow, support is terrible and the prices are through the roof. I only use service if I'm sick or in some sort of desperate situation and even then I can't recommend it.

I can't find answers to my questions. The app is impossible to navigate & illogical. Ex: My order was delivered early. I can't find what window I requested to see if I DID request a BY 9 am delivery; I don't believe the shopper. I don't know how much I am tipping. Over the last year, the list of tip percentages it not visible when ordering. It seems to have defaulted to a percentage I selected in the past or may be assigning an arbitrary percent. P/u location changes w/o clear notice to me.

I'm trying to buy cat food and I understand putting limits on the amount you can buy. I doubt instacart wants to deal with people ordering several hundred cans of cat food. Here's the thing, I'm not trying to order several hundred cans of cat food. I want 14 packs of Sheba. That's one of the lightest cat foods I know of. 14 packs could easily fit into one bag. I get an error about too many bulky items and to make a second order.  That is beyond stupid to make two orders for 14 packs of food.

First and last order with Instacart ever!!! I ordered 1 item (candy) which was out of stock and gladly issued a refund, then the shopper decides to substitute cereal without my approval and delivers it!!! Unbelievable! Instacart first tried to give me a credit towards another purchase for the value of the item only, then I pushed them for a refund, however, they refused to refund the $2.49 service fee saying I still have to cover their operating costs for a totally failed service!

Great app! Easy to use & it has been a lifesaver in those moments when I've really needed something & didn't have the time to shop myself. Diamond, Platinum, & Gold shoppers are EXCELLENT shoppers!!! I've noticed a lot of times other shoppers seem to not pay attention to the expiration dates, the quality of the items & they tend to not really care about how they pack the items. Other than that Instacart has been WONDERFUL!!!

How convenient that they send you a promotion, which you tried to redeem several times. When you think you are all set and spend more than $180 on an order, where more than $20 was for extra charges and fees, the promotion disappears. You contact them, and they just say, "Sorry, we can't help you." This is despite the fact that you pay an annual fee and hundreds in extra fees every time you place an order, which is about 10 times a year... Seriously! Waiting for the competition to switch.

BEWARE using this app for weekly grocery shopping!! Every mistake made by shoppers and drivers count against you. If they get the wrong items, spoiled items, or stuff is missing, Instacart WILL NOT refund OR credit you after an unclear number of mistakes made by their people, even if you appeal the decision. They treat you as if you're trying to scam them even though mistakes made by their people are out of your control. Choose another app and save yourself the stress using this one.

In the last year alone, orders are taking upto 5 hours to be fulfilled. I ordered groceries at 244pm Eastern time. its 5PM a shopper has yet to be assigned. By the time an assigned shopper starts shopping, hands over the order to the delivery guy and or delivers I will probably receive them by 7PM. I will not be renewing my subscription. Instacart is no longer a convenience. I say skip it and try the myriad of other grocery apps.

The app is relatively easy but it makes it difficult to edit if the shopper starts shopping. I find problems with the shoppers more than the app; but, it may be an app problem. They do not read notes for refunds or replacements. They do not read notes for proper hand offs. I provide a table for deliver bags and they constantly put my bags on the ground that has been spayed with insecticide. if I didn't depend on this service I would have cancelled years ago. Poor customer service dept.

I used to find instacart really convenient. However after paying for premium membership for 2+ years and continually receiving orders late, I have become so frustrated. Orders are delivered past the TWO HOUR window and customer services response is always ü§∑ sorry. No compensation unless it's a priority order either. I can no longer recommend instacart.

First time I used their services they canceled my order after changing my delivery window 4 times with two different people. I gave a tip. I live within 3 miles of the store. I didn't change or add to my order. I received no explanation for the cancelation. I have to order takeout not instead of cooking because of how late it is now. I ordered at 2pm it's almost 7. Very disappointed.

It was good with delivering the payment was ridiculous. I would recommend not to get this app if you don't want to get ripped off. for example , when they took payment out the first time I had around two hundred dollars , I was supposed to and when I found out they took more of an only end up with a hundred dollars that was pathetic

Tired of my orders being rescheduled I have been using Instacart for a very long time but now I'm about ready to cancel it. I dont get how is someone shopping my order and then all of a sudden it rescheduled and I find out in the app. I never had this issue with door dash. more reasons to cancel Instacart. Chances I will be. if I could give it zero I would. So ove it. I need the things I order, better yet I will pick up my own. Bye Instacart üôÑüôÑ üòíüò°

If I could give less than 1 star, I would. Deleting this app after yesterdays fiasco. first several orders went smoothly however the app went south fast. my order was supposed to be delivered between 7-9AM and waited all day for any update from the shopper, who I contacted 3 times, no response. called customer service twice and they tried calling the shopper twice also no response. app showed she was checked out twice! and my order was on the way. my order never arrived, cust service was bad.

I have no other options so I use it but instacart is a false crutch. It marks up the cost on the items, charges service cost and and ask for tips for the drivers. On top of that it ask for additional tips for doing the service you pay for originally. Dont add anything once you order they charge a fee for adding to the list even if its at the same store but get this they encourage you to add forgotten items then charge you. I'm just doing what I have to to survive or I wouldn't mention Instacart

I placed an order to arrive the next day between 6-9pm (some free delivery options give time ranges) the day came and the order picker started grabbing items and then they messaged me that the store had closed and my order was cancelled. it gave me a new delivery time for the following morning and I couldn't change the time so I cancelled the order. I messaged their "help" and these were the most uncooperative, non understanding people ive ever tried to communicate with. deleted.

During the Government Shutdown my account was deactivated and I'm not able to order groceries. I've used the app a handful of times and all of the delivery people looked like ICE agents. Few last orders were not good, I had to reschedule and cancel one because the time was not convenient. I think this is the only grocery delivery app in Los Angeles. Also there's a delivery minimum and a service fee in the app, most things are too expensive than what I've seen in the store. Who's doing that?

twice I have ordered from ya'll, and both times sucked, one time on Tuesday I didn't get my order period, and today items that I ordered ya'll didn't even have what I ordered, so money was refused on both occasions, and now my account is at a minus, but I was to have my money reimbursed, never again Instacart, you lost me ad a customer, I'd rather have it door dashed, or delivered by Uber. I will never order from your app again, your app sucks never again

Items being marked out of stock means I cannot add them to my cart -- even though they will almost certainly be back in stock by the time I actually place the order and I will 100% forget the item if I cannot add it to my cart-which-is-a-grocery list. This removal of functionality adds nothing. Tried to message the help center about this. Got asked to hold for 2-3 minutes and agreed. Then the chat automatically ended because I hadn't sent a message "in a while." Awful experience.

Instacart is absolutely not worth it. I've used instacart for years and while yes it is more expensive than going out to get the items yourself sometimes you can't beat the convenience in a pinch. However a new thing Instacart is doing is placing the initial pending charge on your card, and then creating a completely new charge for the actual price of your order. And if you change your order because you forgot something it places an entirely new charge on your card again. $300.00 for $47.00.

I've used the + subscription for a while, I think it's been worth it considering how often my family uses it. I am ticked off right now since they recently added a long distance "feature". I put in an order from a local chain store that was listed as less than 10 miles away, but after the shopper checked out, I saw they were headed over an hour drive toward my house. 10$ long distance fee, dinner was over 1hr late, and the shopper sees none of the fee even though its their time and miles.

PERFECT for when I need a "personal shopper" sometimes I'm just not able to get to the store. whether it's because of transportation, occupation, or my schedule is just too busy. they are an immediate fix. there are so many stores to choose from and different delivery options. even pickup is available. so far, I've only had one issue with them. I was charged for 2 cases of chicken that were never deliveredüò† I hope that remains the only issue. other than that, I'm satisfied‚ò∫Ô∏è

I had free delivery on an order until I chose a shorter window. it cost me $7.99 for a shorter window. that window was not met. there was a delay in my delivery, and instacart refused to refund me the $7.99. per their own policies, I am supposed to get a refund. this isn't the first time I've had issues with Instacart following their own policies. I stopped using them for a while because of it. I AM DELETING THE APP!! I'M DOBE WITH THEM!!!

Was a great app until you could only get free delivery with Instacart Plus. I still had two orders that I was supposed to get free shipping on due to being a new member and now suddenly I can't do that. I will be deleting it and refusing to use it because of this. I'll go to the store to get my groceries, I won't pay extra for shipping in this economy.

It's a decent app. But not 100% reliable. I had to cancel 2 target orders because nobody picked up the order. But yet customer help said somebody did. That was a lie. So I opted for Giant Eagle that was more reliable. So yeah the app works great and saves shopping in stores. but the shoppers need to be more responsive to customers orders and not make them wait over 2 hours to receive the order. Shopping typically takes 30 minutes to an hour depending on how many people are ahead of you.

I received a mobile push notification information me that Instacart was offering $40 off an order of $80+. I clicked to claim the offer, and added items to my cart. Once I was done shopping, I went through the checkout process, the entire time my subtotal showed the offer of $40 off applied. Once I hit submit, the offer was taken off and I was charged the full amount. I have been in contact with customer service both through the chat feature and via email, and they are of no help at all.

I used to use Instacart all the time, but for the past 5 orders or so, the orders have come several hours late or have been canceled last minute for little to no reason. The app is much too expensive to be wasting this much of people's time, and it can be quite difficult to contact customer service. I will no longer be using this app, and encourage others to also uninstall.

the app was easy to install and use. I like the different delivery times. I like the home page with the different stores. you can also purchase sale and discount items through the app. I like that you can change your choices or update easily on the app. no need to speak to anyone. everything is accomplished through the app

I actually didn't want anything other than a proper apology after my last order was so mishandled. Instead you doubled down and said that this was normal to not receive more than half of your order. What is the point of ordering food only to have the person doing the pickup decide not to use their eyes or even better their voice and ask for things they don't know the location of. I was able to find the majority of the items within 30 minutes of when they said they were unavailable. Laughable.

if the first Google search you see is for a product you want and a price that is unbelievable. it is instacart bait and switch tactic to get you to sign up for a $99 membership. then the order cannot be fulfilled if you don't get the membership and they put a hold on your funds even though they claim to give you a refund. they blame your bank for this but this is not true. absolute garbage service

Probably the worst app and company that I have ever had the misfortune to use. Their customer service is so bad that they should just do away with it altogether. They will fail to issue a refund for a missing item and lie about it. Kind of like petty thievery - small amounts, so they think you will just give up. The only reason I started using it is because 3 of my Chase cards give me monthly credits on Instacart. But the aggravation of dealing with Instacart is just not worth it.

okay so Instacart has found an even better way to screw me over. I had a $15 credit applied to my order. I later added a single item to my order, and it was a chocolate drink, non alcoholic. They took my $15 credit off while still saying it was applied to the order even though the full charge was being applied to my card... Every time I try to use this app I get some sort of screw up that is their fault, and I end up having to deal with the inconvenience and frustration of it.

title: AP News: World & Local
description:
Bringing you breaking news from the Associated Press and hundreds of trusted local and international sources, AP News is your trusted source for real-time world news coverage anytime and anywhere. With articles in both English and Spanish, AP News by The Associated Press provides a personalized news experience, the most important and timely headlines and Pulitzer Prize-winning journalism. 

Here's some of what you'll see inside: 
¬∑ Live coverage of important local news stories as they happen 
¬∑ Curated content hubs for deeper insights into major world news events, sports news and story lines. 
¬∑ AP's award-winning photography from U.S. and global news events 
¬∑ Quick, informative videos that capture the stories that you and your friends are talking about. 
¬∑ AP Top 25 Sports Polls. 

AP News. Advancing the power of facts.
descriptionHTML:

With articles in both English and Spanish, AP News by The Associated Press provides a personalized news experience, the most important and timely headlines and Pulitzer Prize-winning journalism.

Here's some of what you'll see inside:
¬∑ Live coverage of important local news stories as they happen
¬∑ Curated content hubs for deeper insights into major world news events, sports news and story lines.
¬∑ AP's award-winning photography from U.S. and global news events
¬∑ Quick, informative videos that capture the stories that you and your friends are talking about.
¬∑ AP Top 25 Sports Polls.

AP News. Advancing the power of facts.
summary: Stay informed. Get all your world and local news with AP News!

scraped_reviews.content: AP used to function just fine on my Samsung Galaxy Z6 Flip. Now, when I open the app, the homepage works fine, but if I click on an article to read, the app freezes and will not scroll up or down. After a few seconds of trying to scroll, it will simply crash. I've checked for updates, uninstalled and reinstalled, cleared cache and data, and always get the same results. I guess I'm on the hunt for another reliable news source with a functional app.

The news and functionality are good. But the ads are too frequent, appearing on every article on top of the pages. The "x" function reduces the size of the ad but they still obscure some of the reading area. UPDATE: I am uninstalling this app and just bookmarking the website. I still get push notifications although I turned off all push notifications. it's quite frustrating. I like APNews but the app is not good, in my opinion.

Regarding just the app: it NEEDS custom notification settings. If I'm being inundated with notifications and can't choose what I want to see, I'm disinclined to read any of it. I want to choose what I care about the most. Instead, I had to turn off ALL notifications. News is important, but only when you can actually read it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nathan, thank you for your feedback. We are working to bring improvements to the notification experience to the app soon.

scraped_reviews.content: [Update: (One hour later). I received a reply from the developers telling me the glitch has been fixed, and it has. I've reinstalled the App.] I've been using this App for several years without issue. As of this morning, October 1, 2025, when I open the App, a notification appears telling me to update. When I follow the link to the Play Store, no option to update is available. The App will not open. Clearly, something has gone awry. Tried uninstalling and re-installing to no avail.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Michael, Apologies for the hiccup! This has been fixed.

scraped_reviews.content: It's among the most trustworthy of large news sources. But it only populates local news sources based on your location. If I don't want to share my location, or if I want local news of some other area, I seem to be out of luck. I also can't seem to disable notifications by topic, so I must continue to get notifications of major topics I don't care about.

Quickly repaired problem frim original review below. Top-notch news app, still hangs on bringing up articles. ................. Currently unusable on my up-to-date Samsung S23 Ultra. Pop-up announces that an update is available and asks me to update, while Play Store says it IS up to date. Deleting and reinstalling doesn't help. Clearing cache and data doesn't help. Can't get out of that loop. It had become increasingly glitchy before this, but this is new today.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Apologies for the hiccup! This has been fixed.

scraped_reviews.content: I have amended my rating downward due to difficulties I've had with the app. The AP has always had especially terrible clickbait ads, but they are so aggressive now they seem to be making the app unstable. Getting through an article is a challenge now due to the app's tendency to freeze or crash when a banner ad is trying to scream at me to buy something.

used to work great. Over the last several months it's progressively gotten worse. It started just not opening the article from notification. now it won't even open the app and if I do get the app open I can't navigate, the front page is missing and the only thing I can get to is the sections menu. Oh and the font suddenly and randomly changes to 24pt and I can't change it back. I wish I could give zero stars as it doesn't even open from notifications anymore. update 6/17/25 changed nothing
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Aonyx, Thanks for your feedback! We've resolved the bug with font sizes in our recent update and hope that your experience using the AP News app has improved.

scraped_reviews.content: The general layout is nice, but there are a few shortcomings to this app. 1) I can't turn on news based on my location w/o turning on loc on my phone. zip and state options would be nice. 2) app keeps crashing - is it not backwards compatible for people with older phones? 3) accessibility is a problem. I need an option to turn off side swiping. I am constantly struggling to scroll straight enough to not open the adjacent article. 4) causes my VPN to crash, which I saw in another review as well!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, and thanks for your feedback! We are working on changes to Local News that will let you select your location and will include this in an update soon.

scraped_reviews.content: There's no option to customize notifications - I only want headline or breaking news alerts. Unfortunately, the app doesn't let you choose specific types; it's all or nothing. I‚Äôm not interested in getting notifications about weekend activities or sunny-day suggestions. I wanted actual news. Going back to CNN.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your feedback. The app now supports notification customization!

scraped_reviews.content: This is my preferred news ap. However, since the upgrade in July it has been absolutely horrendous. The ap crashes, it randomly scrolls, it takes you back to articles you read before in the middle of reading another one, the share button is completely gone, and the formatting makes the headlines hard to read. It's to the point now that I'm just going to find a different platform. And before this I would have given it 5 stars.

I love AP news and the app used to be great and user friendly. However, since the last update about 2 weeks ago, the app crashes, never opens the correct story when I click on one in my notifications, and I have to search all over the place for articles, even big news events. Half of the time the feed doesn't update when I open it and I am seeing the feed for a few days prior. It is unpredictable and there needs to be an update to fix all of these pain points.

Since the latest update, app continously crashes. I used to love to click the articles within (below) an article, but those immediately crash the app, so then i re open the app and search the article title üôÑ...it's frustrating, when I used that method to find so many articles that weren't on the "Top News" page....it's a shame as well since I trust no other news app on my phone, not even my local. Can ya change it back? Kthanksbye

Having an issue with notifications on Android (Google pixel). I get a notification and instead of it just being in the pull down menu like it always has been, it's also displaying the headline over whatever other app I'm currently using. This isn't an app that has "display over other apps" permission so I can't shut that off to make it go away. Intrusive and annoying, I'm going to uninstall if it isn't fixed or given an option to disable.

Moving within the app is fine. But the notifications do not work well, and it's very frustrating. Clicking on a notification doesn't take me to that article unless I have fully closed the app beforehand. Otherwise, it just takes me to the last article I opened. I also keep getting repeat notifications, which clutters my notification bar. This wasn't always the case so it must have been some update that ruined it.

AP News is my favorite news source, but this app needs to give better control over notifications. I do not want notifications about sports, but there's no way to turn that off individually. Notifications are either on or off, and there are about two dozen topics that are "default" and you can't delete. I'm going to have to turn off notifications entirely, which defeats the purpose of the app in the first place... so that probably means I'll end up just deleting the app entirely.

EDIT: As of July 19 the app is still down and does not work. Under normal circumstances I love the AP app. HOWEVER, my app has been unusable for over a month. I open it and it just says "sorry there was an error. Please retry" and it's an infinite loop. I have un-installed multiple times and nothing is working. I understand updates can break things but come on, it's been a LONG time. Once the app is fixed I'll update this to a rating that's more accurate To what it deserves.

Too many pictures. How could anyone give this app a good rating? Every story has a picture that's full screen that you have to scroll past to get to the article. I want to READ the news not look at pictures. You have to scroll all over the place to find stuff. Make the pictures smaller. If someone wants to see a pimple on someone's face, they can tap the picture to make it bigger. I tried the "show less pictures" option. It doesn't do squat.

Good news, bad app. There's the autoplaying videos, though I get no sound at least. But there's no way to control what notifications you get (such as only politics, or sports), only a simple on/off toggle. When I turned it on, I get spammed with dozens of irrelevant notifications per day, drowning out all other notifications on my phone. And worst, when I toggled it back off, I continued to get them anyway. Maybe a bug, but I'm forced to uninstall just to turn off the firehose.

Current version is essentially useless, I miss the prior functional version. As others seem to be experiencing, there are major issues with articles loading. I can load one article and that is it. If I wish to read another I must close the app, making sure it is not running in the background, and relaunch to read another article. Every time. I have tried clearing the cache, all data, and even uninstalled and reinstalled with no success. As a result I am exploring other news agencies.

The news content on the app is great. Associated press, in my opinion, has done a great job of relaying information without bias while minimizing alarm about the topics. There are some technical issues with the app, most of which are easy to work around, but the charts and graphs are currently broken in a way that makes them unusable. Charts will appear with only their headings, graphs are improperly zoomed, and there is no way of enlarging either to actually see them

This used to be my go-to news app until a recent update. It now autoplay videos from the main Frontpage feed, with no option to disable as far as I can find. This is incredibly annoying if I am in a place where I am not able to listen to audio, and I'll be using a different news app until/unless this is fixed. Other than that, this is a 5-star app - timely, updated, and reliable news delivered in a concise and organized way.

AP News app had been my go-to news source for a while now. I'd share articles from it and followed the app closely with breaking news updates. However, the pop-up ads now cover at least half the viewing page, and the "1 minute news" auto-plays, and there is no way to change the settings. I'm about to delete the app and will get the news elsewhere, as I don't want the ads and I can't turn off autoplay. This app had been so awesome and reliable - such a shame.

The news is great, but the app continues to be increasingly flakey. In the sub sections, when you select a story, the previous story is brought up. You have to page forward to get the correct article. Lately, the app will just blank out, pause for a few seconds, and quit. No error, just as if you only have so long to read an article, and failed.

This was a good app until recently. The latest update autoplays video loudly, and you have to scroll to find where it is in the feed. This does not work if you decide to catch up on the news in bed when your partner is asleep beside you. There is no option in the setting to disable this (at least not that I have seen). The excessive inserts are annoying, it causes the screen to jump all over. I'm uninstalling and going back to Google news and BBC news. They at least respect the end user.

It was a 5, now it's more of a 2+ The update changed the format, making the headlines larger resulting in having to scroll a really long time to find what I want to read. Often the link doesn't fully load and the video/ pictures are not available. Frustrating..... Also getting duplicate "Breaking News" notifications, sometimes the next day. Is it really Breaking News if it's the same info 24 hours later? Not sure why you had to change a really good thing to something that's irritating to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Karen, we're really sorry for the trouble you're having and understand the frustration. Some updates have been made to the layout and we're working hard to fix the notification issues. We'd love to get your thoughts - please email us at appsupport@apnews.com

scraped_reviews.content: App has full-audio autoplay video as soon as you open it. You can not turn this off. Some of that audio is liable to get you fired because they are not moderating their ads. If you aren't on wifi it will eat your data with video. People have complained to high heaven. It appears they don't care. So I uninstalled it and use a competing product.

Clicking on news story notifications doesn't take you straight to the story you want to read, it just opens the app which is left at whatever article you were last reading, so you have to back out of the article to the main page, scroll up and down to find the article (which usually has a different title from what the notification said) and often have to refresh the main page. Due to this, about 50% of the time an article notification catches my eye I don't end up reading the article because I don't feel like hunting for it.

Terrible. I click on the "read more" link in my news alert email and it either disappears entirely or returns to the "read more" button and no amount of clicking on the button gets you to the "more". The whole point of a news alert and "read more" is obviously to access the news info you are alerting to, which currently is impossible. This does no happen with any other news alerts from CNN or any other organization on my phone. What's the problem?

I love the way the news is presented most times just the facts without bias. However the push notification is terrible! You see a article you want to read, you select it, a window pops up, you select open and it takes you to the main page and you end up scrolling through all the news to find the one you wanted. Sometimes its not even there! Fix this please.

I like your news. I hate that when you show me a notification about a specific story, if I click on it, you take me to a totally unrelated story. What's the point of the notification? Why don't you just send "Hey! Come and look at me!" Stupid. I've now shut off notifications which, in effect, means I'll probably never look at your app again. I might as well uninstall it.

The news is excellent, but they started putting in annoying video ads, and you could minimize them if you clicked on them twenty times or so, but then you read half the article and they pop back up, covering half your screen. I don't mind well placed adverts, but this is not that. Maybe others can tolerate it, but as for me, I'll be finding my news elsewhere.

they have a new look, which is nice. however, if you're listening to anything on your phone and pulling up this app, it cuts the audio. the associated press app doesn't play anything, but it does stop all other audio for some reason. I didn't open a support ticket because they have had audio issues before. it's getting better, but still...

Close to unusable on Galaxy Tab S6 Lite. Like Charlie Parry (another reviewer) said, no images in articles, no text formatting, etc. It's as if any CSS, etc. are completely missing from the articles, as now it's just a plain white background with text all aligned to the far left. Furthermore, there are NO descriptions showing up on the main page with all the articles except for the article titles. This app used to work. Now it doesn't, and no cache/data clearing or reinstalling has helped.

I've used the Android version for years with no issues. Recently, though, after viewing one or two stories, getting subsequent stories to load is impossible. I've tried clearing the app's cache and data, along with force stop, and have deleted and reinstalled the app several times. For what its worth, I've noticed that the app's cache will be up to 25 MB after only one brief session; it used to take a few days of moderately heavy use to reach that level.

Privacy settings in the latest version are a joke. The only option for all of them, including Targeting Tracking and Social Media Tracking technologies, is "Always Active." Nor does changing the display setting to Light appear to do anything; I'm forced to look at the black theme. Oh, and articles can no longer be shared to anything.

Not worth your time, except to uninstall. Way too many ads, set to pop open just under your finger when selecting a story. More ads than articles. "Less animations" settings does nothing anymore. The last few versions got less and less stable, crashing or freezing on load. I have better things to do with my time. AP News content is good. App is junk. Deserves zero stars. Use their website instead.

I'm having a hard time understanding why the recent update is SO much better than the previous version. The new one is confusing and cluttered, and I can't even find headlined articles. When I click the link from the phone notifications, it takes me to whatever article I last read, not the one in the link. Either this is a terrible update, or I'm having compatibility issues with my Galaxy phone

No longer works after recent updates. Tapping notifications won't open articles, it just freezes and I get the option to wait or force close. Now the app won't load anything. I just get a white screen and error message "Sorry! There was an error, please retry" over and over. On the latest version, cleared cache, uninstalled and reinstalled, rebooted phone but still fails while other apps work fine.

The notifications on this application give enough of picture of the breaking news as it breaks that you will be able to tell whether or not you will be interested enough to read the whole article ( or watch the video). I personally prefer to read the article so later in conversation I can say " I read...". Instead "I saw..." It just sounds better. Any way the APP IS GOOD.

I don't know what exactly you guys changed about the way your app functions, but for the past two years, across three different devices and a multitude of internet connections (including 1gb fiber) the app has continued to struggle to load. On a good connection it'll take at least 30-45 seconds to clear the splash screen and refresh the app. It's bad enough that I open it up in the morning and then put down my phone and go do other stuff.

Alright, I've had enough of this app auto-playing videos constantly and unnecessarily eating up my data. The moment you open the app or back out of an article, video starts playing. Even if you pause it and scroll down through the articles, it will start again if you scroll back up. This is easily the worst change the AP has made to its app and even with all the complaints, they refuse to get rid of it. So I'm done and moving on. I'm not happy to have to, but there are better options out there.

I've been using the AP news app for several years now, reliably getting curren & accurate news feeds throughout my day. I am now DELETING this app! A Recent update added an auto-play video with sound, which plays every time you open the ap, and every time you cycle back to the Top Stories home tab. Very frustrating and unnecessary! The video is a "1-minute update," but it's laden with ads that can't be paused until you scroll furiously to find it! It even plays when you follow other links! Bye!

Great app, one downside is when I get a notification and hit open it doesn't bring me to the story pertaining to the notification and I have to do some searching. Another is that the share menu is horrible. Not only does it not show any of the apps I've recently used to communicate with people, it doesn't even let me copy a link to my clipboard to manually share it with someone else. I have to send them a screenshot or a summary of the news piece instead.

Finally just uninstalled the app. Both the recent update and their website and covered in ads that are physically in the way. It's sad because for years I have referred to AP for news that covered all sides of an issue. No more picking subjects you can follow (without being redirected to the hideous website from the app). No more date stamp to indicate I may have read a story the previous day. I'll just have to find other sources.

For the last months, the app crashes on opening and triggers crash message pop-ups randomly, even when not in use. I reinstalled once and it worked - but only for a couple weeks and is now up to the same behavior. I had to uninstall it again as it is unusable and the pop-up error messages are annoying. I can see that others have the same issue. The app was 4 star while it worked. I'd prefer a more dense and less photo heavy listing of stories. The AP service has good journalism, so it's a shame the app is so buggy.

One of the best news apps, but I have to uninstall it, because now ads and some news stories automatically make sound and there's no setting to prevent it. I have woken my wife up multiple times, just scrolling through headlines. If I wanted videos, I would be scrolling the video list, or I would be using a different app. Hope you change it back AP, because it was the easiest to read and best organized app otherwise.

Too many intrusive ads. There's an annoying banner on the bottom of the page you're reading that's super distracting. Either its flashing at you, numbers are changing to catch your eye, or the banner enlarges to block what you want to read (you can minimize it but it gets big again within a minute). It's really annoying. I don't have a problem with having ads, but I will not stand for intrusive ones. Offer a premium app without ads or a subscription instead and I will start reading AP again.

I used to love the AP news app but it's gotten pretty buggy and doesn't work on several of my devices anymore. The real trouble though is the the video and audio automatically plays. There's no way to turn it off. So if I want to Read the news quietly on my own. There's no way to do so. It just blares the audio and video and you have to wait 30 seconds or so for the commercial to play before you can turn it off. So I don't use the app as often as I used to. Hopefully they'll fix this.

Good start. Rarely find articles attached to pushed updates. Edited 8/04/24: After multiple updates. It's barely functional. Click on a notification link and it no longer takes you to the article. What's the point? Previously, you were able to go to different categories. Now between the ads and photos, it's a lot more challenging. I seriously struggle to understand how a news org the caliber of AP has such a horrendous app. Absolutely mind boggling.

title: Weather
description: Plan your day with accurate hourly and weekly forecasts from the new Weather app! See daily temperature highs and lows, UV index and precipitation conditions for your location. Get quick access with tiles, and set Weather app complications on your watch face. Compatible with all watches running Wear OS 3.0+
descriptionHTML: Plan your day with accurate hourly and weekly forecasts from the new Weather app! See daily temperature highs and lows, UV index and precipitation conditions for your location. Get quick access with tiles, and set Weather app complications on your watch face. Compatible with all watches running Wear OS 3.0+
summary: Get weather information on your Wear OS watch

scraped_reviews.content: In my opinion, the best weather app currently for Samsung Galaxy Watch 5! Samsung's own app stopped working properly for a long time ago. Anyway, the only thing I don't give this app a 5 star, is that the weather icons feels a little outdated compared to my phone's Google Pixel Weather app. Especially the complication icons. They are just white, wich can be hard to see what kind of weather it is sometimes. Would be good to have at least an option to choose between a colored or a white comp.

The app doesn't have an option to set specific location, it always gets the location using GPS/location services. Which works pretty bad, given that GPS doesn't work well inside buildings. Which is where you would want to get the weather before going outside. Please add an option to set the location.

Doesn't work. Says anything from couldn't retrieve location, to can't load weather. On top of that, it wouldn't let me post a review through the watch. Only a black screen shows after I select the star. No, the screen is not off. No problems with the other weather app. Restarting doesn't fix anything... Uninstalled.

Just bought a fossil gen six in this app is functionally useless because it can't determine location, and rather than letting you set a GPS location yourself it requires you to constantly have a GPS coordinate for the watch to go off of after clearing the cache clearing the data removing upgrades and reinstalling it still fails to function
How can't we just choose the location it's useless if GPS isn't working

Just stopped working. No fix. No solution. Can't even tell it a location. Just says it can't access location despite having full access. Another reason for people to abandon Android for a certain fruit company...

**NOTE** This review & rating is not for the functionality of the app on my watch! I love the app on my Pixel watch 2! However, why is this app not compatible with my Samsung S24 Ultra? It's compatible with my sister's S22. So annoying!

Hurrah !! A weather app that will tile on my Samsung Watch 6 and NOT persist in reverting to C from my preferred F each and every time I charge it since the UI update !! I had to try a few but thank goodness I can lose the rubbish stock one now. A pity it can't be totally uninstalled. This one does all it needs to and remembers your preferences. So it really isn't hard !! Thankyou ~
FINALLY. Now this is one update that I absolutely love. The app finally feels comprehensive and complete on my watch. Thank you Google. Good job.
Could use a feels like temp. But otherwise solid. Faster loading than Samsung's weather app , clean interface and concise information
The app itself is okay, however it forces GPS. If you face difficulty, turn on maps on phone first, watch also pulls from phone Google maps app sitting in background

Wow! This is a great app when it actually works. When I first tried to use the app it didn't work for a few days and then randomly it started working to my surprise. So far so good I'm really enjoying the app I hope it keeps working.
This app Requires Constant Location Services access. Will not work Without it. Shame on you Google! Also, it's set as the Default Weather app & no way to change it.
New appp is looking great however please add moon phases as one of the available cards. If you add that I would be more than happy to update review to 5 stars!
Ideally this should work out of the box... But it doesn't. As the default weather app it is very disappointing
You can't just search a location without adding it to your list? You have to remove it each time. Do you all even test your apps as humans before developing them?
I don't want to have location permissions enabled all the time. I just want the weather for a xipcode
Worst application ever never works for location never works for weather is just good for nothing hopeless people... I didn't get it why Fossil choose this hopeles application...
Can't manually set the lpcation. I turn off GPS to save battery, but this app won't allow me to save battery.
Not compatible with my galaxy watch 8.

scraped_reviews.userName: That Guy Who Regrets His Choice of Email Address
scraped_reviews.content: It forces you to use GPS for the location which not only uses more battery but also gets it wrong half of the time
Updates on the face more reliably than Samsung weather but wish it included humidity in the app
The location it pulls is always wrong. Need to add an option to set a permanent location.
Used it on my Pixel 8 Pro. Tried to install on my new Pixel 9 Pro, play store says, "this app is not compatible with your phone." Really, Google???
Not even detecting the location even after permission is granted and location set to high accuracy
I've cleared cache and data but still get wrong township even with location access set for all the time.
Doesn't work, keeps failing to get location and has no option to set manually
Much better than the Samsung app the Samsung app has trouble with finding my location and I always have to set it manually through my phone
No longer working after latest update. Resets have not corrected the issue
There's no way I'm leaving location on all the time for a weather app that's ridiculous fix it I'll think about it
Please add humidity, air quality and wind display in the app
Does not the have the cute frog from the other Google weather app, I would give 0 stars if I could.
The location is always wrong. And it doesn't have a feels like temperature
After the new update it just stopped working the weather does not display
No option to set location scrolling function could be better
Doesn't actually work. I see people asking for help online from a year back with no responses.
Is not compatible with Google pixel fold this app sucks the weather doesn't work at all
Useless app. Unable to see the precious location
this app does not work at all I been trying to troubleshoot it all day and I can't get it to work not very happy with it
GPS is mandatory! No option to manually set location! üëéüèº
Looks great, but it doesn't have widgets, which is sad
üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü It's great! Love the icons! Also useful app!
great app but doesn't work on galaxy Zfold 7
complication too basic. no chance of rain etc
Can't just set a specific location. Always need gps
Works incredibly well and they recently updated The standing scrolling through the crown and now it's smooth again
Its very reliable but it's not been loading for a month
Awful. Will not even show the weather or even update.
Great on pixel watch. Just improve looks.
The watch face complication won't switch to Celsius

title: Weather Radar - Meteored News
description: Trusted by millions of Android users worldwide and hailed by meteorology fans, Weather Radar - Meteored News is the official free Weather App from Meteored. Our app features our own forecasts,weather alerts, and live radar, all powered by the world's best prediction model. Get accurate weather forecasts with a Material Design layout for quick, easy access to detailed local weather data: Weather Maps, Rain Radar, Hurricane Tracker, 14-day Forecast, and more. With over 20 years of experience, the weather won't surprise you, thanks to our timely alerts and advanced radar features. If you have a Wear OS device, you can wear our app on your wrist. Check the rain, temperature, wind or even add a Tile to your watch to have access to the weather information and alerts. ‚ö†Ô∏è ALERTS AND NOTIFICATIONS With our weather app you receive Official Weather Alerts and live radar alerts for your area from the National Weather Service, including storm warnings, strong winds alerts, hurricanes, tropical storms and other severe weather. Our Assistant provides timely alerts for key weather forecast variations. üó∫Ô∏è REALTIME RADAR, FORECAST MAPS AND SATELLITES An animated world weather map based on the ECMWF Model, shows the weather forecast for coming days and alerts in any region. Enjoy our Live Radar service and Hurricane and Storm Radar Tracker. Access animated radar imagery of the last few hours of the NWS along with visible and infrared satellite images from NOAA. Our radar technology ensures tracking of storm and forecast conditions. Thanks to our advanced radar, track rain, snow, or storms in detail, worldwide. üì∞ WEATHER NEWS Check our daily news to be up to date with the latest meteorologic events and alerts. Be informed about the most recent forecast. Plus, watch impactful videos about severe weather events around the world. üñåÔ∏è CUSTOMIZATION Complete In-App Achievements to unlock new Color Themes, designed to help you discover all the available features. üåßÔ∏è WEATHER FORECAST Check the weather conditions forecast for the next 14 days and 6-day Future Radar . Select a day to view detailed hourly forecast information including heat index or temperature, rain and precipitation, wind speed and direction, wind chill, pressure, cloudiness, humidity, air quality index, pollen levels, UV index, sunset and sunrise times and even the phase of the moon. Check in your device how the local weather forecast evolution and daily radar with our amazing graphics, including potential alerts. üì± WIDGETS You can customize your homescreen with the most modern widgets currently available. You'll have access to widgets with various sizes and weather data to check your local weather forecast and receive quick alerts. ‚úâÔ∏è SHARE YOUR FORECAST Share weather forecasts with your friends and family anytime using any device or social network, such as: iMessage, Twitter, Facebook, Snapchat or WhatsApp. üìç AVAILABILITY Find the most relevant forecast for your current location, receive timely alerts, or search for your favorite locations from over 6,000,000 all around the world. Our forecast, including detailed radar views, is available in over 70 countries and 20 languages. This app collects location data to enable weather forecasts, alerts, temperature display in the notification bar, widgets and notifications, and radar features for the location you currently are. The human team behind Meteored is what makes it possible. About US https://www.theweather.com/about-us To use this app you must agree to the privacy policy, as well as the terms and conditions of Meteored. Privacy Policy https://www.theweather.com/privacy.html Legal notice https://www.theweather.com/legal_notice.html
