summary: Weather Forecast, Trending News, Hurricane & Storm Tracker, Alerts & Live Radar.

scraped_reviews.content: it's okay. I have the premium version but for some unknown reason I'm unable to open the weather from the notification bar, if I expand it and click news maps or radar it will open but just tapping on the weather it will not. other than that it's okay. rain times were off quite a bit and I've had it raining but it tells me it's clear. At least it updates my location properly.

It's fine. As a weather app, it's good. But I set my privacy settings how I want them, and almost every time I open the app, it wants me to set them again because it doesn't like that I toggled all the data acquisition ones off. It's also annoyingly ad-filled, and asking me to subscribe regularly. If they offered a one-time-purchase, I would buy it. But I don't want to rent my weather app, thanks. For those reasons, I'm uninstalling and looking elsewhere.

So much better, used to be with Accuweather for many years. I like the persistent weather notification at the top. Ad-Free Sub options are available for maximum ¬£6 per year (2025 price). The widget is just what i want for the next few days at a glance etc. can select specific places to be shown and app is cuatomisable too. Much Better than Accuweather, especially since they force ads or new subscription on you and have a poor redesign in August '25 making it really small text on the widget etc.

It kept thinking I was 10+ miles away so I tried to get into the settings and found an INSANE number of companies to block, if you don't want them sharing your data with them ....and you have to do it twice. I spent probably 20+ minutes going through the first list, rejecting all these advertising (aka spying) companies, only to come to a second huge list. I gave up, and just uninstalled the whole app. This is absurd. I might've kept it if there was an easy way to reject all of them at once.

Forecast accuracy was hit and miss. The real problem is tracking. I installed an app from DuckDuckgo to block tracking attempts by apps. It was eye opening. Of all the apps I use, Meteored was by far the worst in terms of tracking attempts. Often by a factor of 10 or more. Doesn't even matter if you use the app or not, it will still initiate multiple tracking attempts. I haven't used the app in the last 2 days but still over 200 tracking attempts were made. Yikes!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Brian King, to be able to carry out the automatic location you must accept the permios. It is something that they ask of us and it is mandatory for us, it does not depend on us.
Thanks

scraped_reviews.content: lots of data and the radar is current (unlike the app I just dumped). ads are not super intrusive. mostly the choices for notifications and icons are sufficient. it's alright. but every few days I have to reconfirm my tracking and communication choices and it's getting old. I'm not choosing them on a whim or for certain short term conditions. Reject All, Save and Exit is permanent and the interruption is increasingly irritating, enough to ditch this app next.

I like this. The ads are just annoying enough that I might consider paying for it. However, it is wildly inaccurate. The temperature is 15 degrees low, and conditions are wrong. I could do without the news and videos, and they aren't interesting or helpful. The maps are nice, but it's confusing as there are too many different ones.There are too many themes which aren't useful. The widgets could be improved to include one with future hours.

Just switched from Samsung to Motorola and I'm trying to find a weather app that is close to what the cool app pre installed on Samsungs. I've gone through many lousy weather apps and then stumbled across this one. Wow! I love this app so far. It's similar and awesome to use. Don't particularly care for the ads but at least so far they aren't intrusive. If pay to remove them if it was a reasonable one time fee, not a monthly or yearly fee. That's ridiculous imo. Anyway, great app so far!

Meteored is one of the best weather apps I've used, and I have tried quite a few. The widget is customizable and the ads on the detailed weather page aren't intrusive like many other apps. The temperature seems to be accurate, which is a necessary feature for me. I also appreciate the inclusion of wind speed on the widget. A couple small requests: Could you add the day of the week to your widget and daily rain chance? It's annoying having to pull down my notification bar to see which day it is.

Looked very good on first use -- and still is. Only 4-stars because of the small, embbed ads with "Install" button much too easy to trigger. This weather app is the best I've found -- and more. Accurate so far and have found it better than those that differ. Has more detail than any other, yet is simple and intuitive. After years of trying many weather apps, this the one I hope to keep, but will use the Pro ad-free version. Purchased 19/2019.

I've been searching for an app that has everything I want. Daily forecast, Hourly forecast, humidity, air quality, cloud cover, radar and satellite. I've been using the app for about a week and so far I'm impressed. Edited 08/06/22: The app stopped updating, I tried everything to fix it. Keep getting error messages about their service being improved. After a reinstall, it won't let me choose a location, no matter what I do.

Cannot turn of notifications. It's so frustrating that despite specifically turning off notifications for this app, it continues to send them anyway. The app icon nicely tells me the current temp and a very brief forecast. That's all I need, yet I keep getting notifications telling me the same information. I'm close to dumping this app for another that doesn't have this irritating "feature".

I downloaded five different weather apps, including the Weather Channel. so they all got equal judgement. lol. one by one, I've deleted all but Meteored. This will be my go-to for weather info. Great user interface, accurate location that can follow you if you want, radar map available, future forecast by the hour, just any and all info you want in a user friendly app. Plus an alert feature. This is a keeper.

I don't often rate apps, but this app is truly stellar. It gives way more detailed information than other weather apps in a truly accessible and aesthetic manner. I'm really surprised by the amount of information and customization available in the free version. The widgets are really artistic, clean, and chock full of useful data. This weather app is unlike all the others and definitely worth supporting.

A pop-up shows that they are taking privacy serious. Serious enough to bother you every time you start the app. Also support doesn't respond anymore to emails at all. The location is shown from a place two weeks ago and never updates. The shown information is also off. Don't know what else to do besides leaving a bad review if support just doesn't bother anymore to respond.

After switching from an iphone to an Android, I needed a new weather app + was surprised to find it so difficult to find one that I could live with. I tried multiple apps before settling on Meteored. The others seem to be platforms for advertisements with the weather as an afterthought. I also did not like the busy visuals of the others. Meteored has a pleasant simple visual that is effective at sharing the weather without annoying advertisements. While there may be some, I haven't noticed them.

Love the layout but very inaccurate weather reporting. I'm in SoCal so the weather doesn't change drastically, but the temperature on this app is always off by 8-12 degrees for the morning temps. Which makes me question what else it's wrong about. It's a shame because this app has a great layout. Update 12/11: checked snowy mountainous areas I'm driving through soon for xmas on a 13hr drive, forecasts were wildly from every other app. Deleting, do not use.

I really like this app as someone who used AccuWeather for years and then switched to Weather Channel. I have been searching for a much better weather app that doesn't bombard me with notifications all the time. I love the layout of the app as well. I like how easy it navigates from current weather to news i also like how it tells you what the moon is going to be that day. I think I finally found the weather app that is right for me to use for a while.

Best weather app for precise local weather and temperatures compared to Accuweather which is never accurate. I also like the wind speed and direction information along with the sun and moon rise/set times. The only suggestion I would make is for the barometric pressure (for those of us who suffer from arthritis) to be charted low to extreme like the hourly temperature graph would be helpful.

Happy with this app. A lot of weather apps are not intuitive to my eyes to read at a glance. I like the look and feel of this one and, importantly, its widgets. Is it possible to be able to select the "feels like" temp to display on the notification bar? That would be a great feature as a lot of people go by that primarily.

This is a great no-nonsense weather app without the inaccuracies of other weather apps that display various 'agendas' by adding scary colours and warnings on everything as well as increasing actual temperatures by several degrees locally by default. Please keep it real and don't go down that road and you will always get 5 stars from me and maybe even a subscription. My only suggestion is adding a refresh button to the 2x4 widget if you haven't already done so. Cheers!

Radar isn't working AT ALL. Forecast is almost always wrong. And please fix the moon phase section, it's labeled totally backwards. With all that and now intrusive pop up ads, the app is USELESS. All the positive reviews look like fake bots too, and those seem to be the only ones customer service will respond to. NOT IMPRESSED. Finding a different app bc this is garbage.

Fantastic app so far & accurate!! I just downloaded it a few days ago. Its been spot on with everything. The weather app that came pre-installed on my phone is NEVER correct. I have had various weather apps thru the years. Some of them were pretty good for a while. But then they became glitchy with inaccurate information. Or they'd want you to install the latest update that made the app worse, not better. Anyways, my boss uses this app & told me to try it. So, that's what I'm doing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Alayna. Thank you very much for your comment, we hope you continue to enjoy Meteored and its features!

scraped_reviews.content: the widget is not working not updating DAY and Temperatures until tap on the widget and open it. it is annoying. when outside is 90 degrees it shows 65 . it is useless when today is Sunday and it shows saturday or friday . I did send a couple emails to developers about the issue with the screen shot. looks like they don't care. if you don't tap and open the widget it will NOT change the DAY and Temperature at all. I SENT MULTIPLE EMAILS TO YOU WITH SCREEN SHOT, BUT YOU DO NOT CARE.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello ROBERT P., in order to study the problem we need you to send us screenshots to the email support@meteored.com.
Thank you.
Greetings

scraped_reviews.content: One Issue... Before I started writing my review, to be fair, I realized I needed to open it and evaluate again! üôÑü•¥ I think it's better than Google's that was present when I purchased my mobile. Google doesn't seem to understand that I'm located in Bonita Springs rather than right on Barefoot Beach. Certainly, it could be the age of my phone, but all the same Google's app says it's using the exact location causing many past online address registration failures. I like it üòÄ

I have tried several weather apps. and this one is the best! love the accuracy,( actually pretty good ) and the radar, even the sunset and sunrise, last light, first light, and lunar phases. not many ads and they are short. pretty happy with this one. üòÉüëç

I have set my cookies so many times I have lost COUNT & STILL every 2nd or 3rd opening the app takes me to the cookies where, every single time, I select "Reject All & Save" only to have it ask AGAIN in the next couple times of opening. Been doing this the last several MONTHS since I found these settings & turned off cookies. And wow, surprise surprise.. before customizing this setting it automatically accepts all cookies & does not EVER pop up the cookies settings. Trying to force you to accept

I really wanted to like this app but the number of ads are very annoying. Sometimes the apps take up the whole screen and there isn't an "x" button to close the app and tapping on the back button doesn't work either resulting in having to close the app and re-open. Not to mention how annoying it is to have to set cookie and privacy settings every time the app is launched. Another disappointing weather app... time to continue the quest for another one.

I'm using this app to replace the weather channel app, and so far I am very impressed. tons of detail and features in the free version, and premium is only $10 a year vs the weather channel is $30 for a year. I just downloaded so I can't speak for the accuracy but I will be sure to update in the near future

I paid for premium but the built-in widgets don't show the names of the days (despite them being on the smoke widget), making it very difficult to follow the forecast. I was also hoping for an hourly widget. Great app apart from the widgets though.

Used this for months now, and it's frequently inaccurate. Far too many intrusions to download other apps. No longer even gives sunrise and sunset. Not much use for weather forecasting, and huge amount of tracking and adverts.

i used this app for about 2 months. ill be real, it sucks. have to jump through hoops to figure out the weather. like click here scroll there to maybe find part of what you want. Nothing is streamlined. its a thunderstorm outside and pouring rain right now and it says its sunny and 0.0 perception..... i downloaded weather bug and guess what, 70% chance of rain today. the weather is never correct. the company has to be giving themselves good reviews because this isnt a 4.8 app more like a 2.5

stupid, stupid application. very disappointed. one major problem...the prediction temperature displayed for the day, doesn't match with temperature during the day. It says for example, 70/53 for next day, when open the the next day, don't even see the number 53 or 70. Non sense. I decided to uninstall this stupid app.

Weather map history is an interesting toy, but too onerous for on the go use when I need to know what time to expect the oncoming stormfront; just show me the next hour or two of weather immediately after the last hour or two of weather like everyone else does. I'm looking at this to think about how to respond to the weather, not to play a game.

So much better than the default Samsung app. The ads are not annoying/in the way/in your face and the "premium" features are actually premium and not basic functions. I would also say this is better than most weather apps.

I have downloaded several weather apps in the past, and in all cases found that some characteristic didn't suit me. I ve now been using this app for a few weeks now, and as far as i'm concerned it's as near perfect as possible. Now, in 2025, i'm still using this app. Why move to another.

I like that it can be viewed in the landscape position. I'm able to get everything about current weather as well as several days in the future. No interfering ads is also good. Very satisfied with the app.

I had been using another weather app for a while, where I can change providers in the settings, and each one was showing inaccurate and different weather conditions and temperatures, etc. Meteored is fantastic, and shows pretty much the same info that I see on my Bresser weather station (plus accurate forecasts for the next coming days too). I'm very happy with it, and would recommend.
I haven't had the app long but so far it's much better than Accuweather and only 1/3 the price. location actually shows the address of buildings you're in or if outside those closest to you.

I have used several different Apps, but this App has very soothing colors for me. The actual weather productions !!! have been consistently correct, other than surprising storms, even missed by news reports and weather reports. John B .

it was ok not 100% accurate but good enough until today, it said ZERO rain all through today i couldnt hang my laundry until night and made sure to check before hand, almost finished when i started feeling drops checked again still said zero rain even as it all suddenly came down, then a notice came across the screen saying to update so i click only to get sent to a completely diff app, check it out anyways and it demands i pay a subscription to use it, uninstalling its no longer worth having

Way too many obnoxious ads to deal with every time I want to return to the previous page. Ads are primarily for violent games, as if there is not enough toxicity in the news. Definitely NOT recommended!

Since it's only about 20% accurate, I give it 2 stars. It's easy to use. Unfortunately, that doesn't make up for temp and precipitation being wrong for every day over an eight day period. Even google searching the weather for my location is more accurate. I'm uninstalling and do not recommend this app.

i tried to set a widget and got a warning in Spanish stating the widget will soon stop working and I should get a metereod widget, but the warning provides no link to get such a widget, nor info about where to get said widget. I will have to uninstall this as I was looking for something simple and stable. This ain't it.
it's a good app but I wish you had more options with the widget, such as it'd be nice to get a "refresh" icon on the widget or maybe a "settings" icon for the widget's settings
Best weather app I've ever owned. Colorful, well laid out and easy to read, great home screen widgets.
This is awesome cause I've been using AccuWeather and this is like a big evolution in weather apps. The persistent updates make it much easier to know how the weather is the next day.
very happy with this app and the widgets that it provides. it continuously shows the temperature of where I set it to. that's a HUGE deal for me

Is ok ,nearly accurately ,but not refreshing on the setting ,and location is not refreshing ,just you need to tap on the widget to refresh the location and weather ,not good enough ,if still buy it ,ü§îüò´

I live in town A, but the app insists I'm located in town B. The app recognizes town A and I can have it in my saved locations. But it won't let me default to town A. Stupid, so no reason to use the app. BTW every other weather app lets you default to the location you want.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, Andrea. Thank you for your comment. You can set your default city by going to My locations and dragging it to the top of the list. This way, it will always appear when you open the app. If this doesn't work, please write to us at support@meteored.com.
para ayudarte.

title: Cheapflights: Flights & Hotels
description: Cheapflights searches hundreds of travel sites to show you your options and let you pick what works best for your trip. Track prices, set a budget, build your itinerary and more.¬† ¬† What‚Äôs in our app. Get the flight you want: Compare flight options from hundreds of sites then zero in on the best one for you by using our filters.¬† Hotel rates only on the app: Find mobile-only prices from select hotels. Car sharing: Search car sharing alongside traditional agencies for more options (and maybe better prices). Know when prices change: Track search results for your trip and get a notification when prices change. Search on your budget: Only have $300 to spend? Cheapflights Explore will show you your flight options, on any budget. ¬† Only on the Cheapflights App. Flight tracker: Get alerts when something about your flight changes or track flights so you can see if you‚Äôll make your connection. Trips offline: All your ticket confirmations and reservations loaded into Trips are accessible regardless of whether or not you have Wifi. Measure your bag: Direct your camera at your bag or carry on and we‚Äôll let you know if it‚Äôs the right size for your flight without incurring a fee. ¬† We love feedback. Got a question and in need of support? Send us a message at https://www.Cheapflights.com/help and we‚Äôll help you out ¬† More on what Cheapflights offers. Find flights, hotels, vacation rentals, rental cars and more - then filter by what matters to you most. Like a pet-friendly boutique hotel with a pool. Or a 4-door sedan with airport pick-up to get you on your way. We bring together great deals from your favorite travel sites in one place.¬† ¬† Search hundreds of flight sites at once. With filtering and flexibility options, you can quickly search and book what works best for your trip.¬† ¬† More options, more saving. Find mobile-only rates and exclusive deals on the app. Set Price Alerts to know when prices drop on the flights, cars and hotels you‚Äôre interested in. ¬† Create itineraries as you plan. Our Trips tool puts all your plans in one place. Get alerted to flight and gate changes, access boarding passes both on- and offline, and share your itinerary with friends ‚Äì all in one spot. You can sync your inbox or manually add any part of your trip - from tour and restaurant confirmations to notes on things to see. ¬† Car rental deals. Search from over 70,000 locations to find the perfect rental car. Book risk-free by filtering for free cancellation policies. ¬† Get a hotel‚Ä¶ or a home. See your accommodation options from major hotel chains and resorts to local boutiques to apartments, cabins, beach homes and more. Filter for free cancellation if you‚Äôre worried plans will change. ¬† Plan your next trip with Cheapflights. Download now to start planning a great trip.
descriptionHTML:
Cheapflights searches hundreds of travel sites to show you your options and let you pick what works best for your trip. Track prices, set a budget, build your itinerary and more.¬†

¬†

What‚Äôs in our app.

Get the flight you want: Compare flight options from hundreds of sites then zero in on the best one for you by using our filters.¬†

Hotel rates only on the app: Find mobile-only prices from select hotels.

Car sharing: Search car sharing alongside traditional agencies for more options (and maybe better prices).

Know when prices change: Track search results for your trip and get a notification when prices change.

Search on your budget: Only have $300 to spend? Cheapflights Explore will show you your flight options, on any budget.

¬†

Only on the Cheapflights App.

Flight tracker: Get alerts when something about your flight changes or track flights so you can see if you‚Äôll make your connection.

Trips offline: All your ticket confirmations and reservations loaded into Trips are accessible regardless of whether or not you have Wifi.

Measure your bag: Direct your camera at your bag or carry on and we‚Äôll let you know if it‚Äôs the right size for your flight without incurring a fee.

¬†

We love feedback.

Got a question and in need of support? Send us a message at https://www.Cheapflights.com/help and we‚Äôll help you out

¬†

More on what Cheapflights offers.

Find flights, hotels, vacation rentals, rental cars and more - then filter by what matters to you most. Like a pet-friendly boutique hotel with a pool. Or a 4-door sedan with airport pick-up to get you on your way. We bring together great deals from your favorite travel sites in one place.¬†

¬†

Search hundreds of flight sites at once.

With filtering and flexibility options, you can quickly search and book what works best for your trip.¬†

¬†

More options, more saving.

Find mobile-only rates and exclusive deals on the app. Set Price Alerts to know when prices drop on the flights, cars and hotels you‚Äôre interested in.

¬†

Create itineraries as you plan.

Our Trips tool puts all your plans in one place. Get alerted to flight and gate changes, access boarding passes both on- and offline, and share your itinerary with friends ‚Äì all in one spot. You can sync your inbox or manually add any part of your trip - from tour and restaurant confirmations to notes on things to see.

¬†

Car rental deals.

Search from over 70,000 locations to find the perfect rental car. Book risk-free by filtering for free cancellation policies.

¬†

Get a hotel‚Ä¶ or a home.

See your accommodation options from major hotel chains and resorts to local boutiques to apartments, cabins, beach homes and more. Filter for free cancellation if you‚Äôre worried plans will change.

¬†

Plan your next trip with Cheapflights. Download now to start planning a great trip.
summary: Save money, save time with Cheapflights.

scraped_reviews.content: I have gotten some really good deals with this app before. If you are a frugal person, I suggest having a good idea of when and where you want to go before searching. Airline prices are extremely volatile and you can find an excellent deal, but by the time you click on it, it's gone and the price might double in that minute or so that passed, which I find infuriating. Good app, I have been experiencing lots of errors though. I click on view deal and the page won't load or it will say error.
I've been trying to search for a flight from Toronto to Tehran, and the search was blocked due to the regulatory reasons. UNACCEPTABLE!!!

Very very bad experience bought tickets in Cheapflights with retailer Aunt Betty! The booking information does not match the actual flight time!!! after check with customer service they just very rude, asking for nealy $200 to change! that's kind of cheat! never use this company again!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We‚Äôre sorry to hear about the difficulties you‚Äôve encountered with your booking through Aunt Betty.

To assist you further, please provide more details about your booking using our contact form here: www.cheapflights.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: I found this app by accident, and really glad I did, they give you the cheapest and best options for flights, with real prices and hints how to get them cheaper. they don't charge massive fees like other apps, they give you the best options, of which personally I'm still buzzing about after booking a return flight for less than it would of cost if I had had a holiday on England... thank you cheapflights
It doesn't allow you to filter tickets by luggage and carry on fare included in the ticket.

My experience is not a positive one. I find cheap flights a false and misleading platform. When you click on a deal there's 'sudden' price rises.Sometimes as much as double the price. Other times cheapflights offers flights that do not exist when you click on it. Writing an email gives the standard response: 'prices fluctuate and are dynamic' Yeah right.
super super kindly send and update BETA version Please update on the new IndiGo flight from Trichy to Melbourne.

I am giving you one star because you have companies like EaseMyTrip.co.uk on your application which scam people out of their hard earned money by advertising a ticket price then after you purchase they start Whatsapp calling and messaging that the ticket went up and you need to top up more money. This is unacceptable and i will appreciate your help to get my money back from them. Very disappointed
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for sharing your experience. We‚Äôre sorry to hear about the issues you‚Äôre facing with your ticket. For further assistance from Cheapflights kindly reach to our support team at: www.cheapflights.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: I'll look for flights from this app, but as far as booking with it...never! I booked one flight with this app once and it passed me through other venues to book with. it was very confusing and untrustworthy. I'd like an app to be able to do everything for me including flights, hotels, and car rental, and never pass me with my information through the rest of the world, it seemed to me.
I keep getting emails on prices that dont exist when I open the app
Provides one with a world of choice. Quick results. Usefull app.
It helps a lot. Save money and spend less time. Thank you.
Pathetic app does not show results with baggage options that are chosen. Why show results with no luggage allowance when luggage was chosen. Waste of time app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your feedback. We value your suggestions and would like to hear more about your experience. Please feel free to send us your searches details and screenshot of your experience details for review at: www.cheapflights.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: Some providers of flight bookings are not reliable. We have booked via Jetzy yesterday but their communication is very poor and we still have not received any flight confirmation.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for sharing your experience. We‚Äôre sorry to hear about the issues you‚Äôre facing with your ticket. For further assistance from Cheapflights kindly reach out to our support team at: www.cheapflights.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: Searched for the exactly same flights 3 to 4 times in a period of 15 minutes. The first search showed really attractive prices, but after the second search prices started going up and up. That was weird, so I visited the Airline's official website, and did the same thing. Searched 3 times, but prices remained the same (as they should). Uninstalled the app and I won't be reinstalling it until the problem gets examined and fixed.
only name cheapest, there is nothing cheapest. eventually you are paying same as flight company
why? why this app DEMAND TO SEND ANNOYING NOTIFICATION WHEN YOU FIRST OPEN THE APP AFTER INSTALLING? no way to proceed without enabling the notification. straight away uninstall this trash.
Excellent app that makes it very easy to compare flights without visiting multiple sites.
The price indicates is totally different when proceed to purchase (Agonda) indicates Myr 1800, when make payment became myr3400
it's easy to find a cheapest flight

Nice app but the prices are different depending on who is searching. I searched for flights to Indonesia, and they suddenly DOUBLED after a couple of days. My friend performs exactly the same search and their prices havent changed - yet. If there is one thing I hate, it's dishonesty.

Please don't book through these apps, because the agents in their so terrible. When you book, when they take money from you it's very easy but when something happened very hard to solve the problem. And if the booking cancelled by the airline, if you want to rebook or get refund, you have to pay for these bloody agents. Better directly book through the respective airlines.

While the app works, it includes searches from disreputable sites that leads you to think that this app is finding amazing prices. As you will likely never end up booking on travelgenio or mytrip (just search for their reviews) the cheap prices are meaningless. I have found cheaper fares myself with reputable online sites that aren't included in the searches provided by the app. Uninstalling now. Buyer beware.

The Cheap Flights app disappointed me. It consistently showed higher flight prices compared to popular platforms like Google Flights. I found round trip fares at 255 pounds or more, while Google Flights offered the same flights for just 105 pounds. It may work better in other regions, but in my experience, it fell short. I recommend using other flight search engines for better deals.

This app was good before, but now everytime I click on view deal, it forward me to Kayak site that I have to input my traveling information again, all the deals go to Kayak, and in Kayak I have to search flights again, so why they show the deals. I never use Kayak and will never use it because this really makes me pissed off. I will uninstall this app as well, it's not the app that I used before.

This app is fantastic! I've found many flights for great prices, that you would never think would be legit. It even searches for flight booking sites that rarely get any internet traffic. The only problem I've had with it is when you save a flight, it doesn't save it the way you'd want it to.

I booked five flight tickets through TravelGenio I sent them a cancelation request ten days ago, they never replied to my request. I called seven days ago and they said the cancelation can't be done by phone and they will do it when it's my turn in the email queue and that they would call me back when it's done, which they never did. I tried calling them again but they put me on hold for ten minutes and no answer it's an international call! I'm starting to believe that you put them on your app

cheap flights is very helpful when planning trips. Even if your original flight itinerary changes, they do everything they can to make sure you arrive to your destination in a timely whether it's for a vacation or business trip. Lynette A. from VIP support was very friendly and helpful when I needed to make. Easy to use, nice to look at, good customer service! I was worried other reviewers seemed like they had issues but they've been great with me!
Easy to use shows some of the best flights world wide.

Cheap flights is very helpful when planning trips. They do everything they can, to make sure you arrive to your destination. Easy to use, nice to look at, good customer support. This app is a great app for flight booking. 5star from my side don't know why so many peoples rated this app very low but this app is amazing and I have found many flights for great prices.
Very good app and we love to buy oor tickets on this app

there is NEVER a cheap flight.... there are too many hidden things. Such as you don't realize it's only a one way ticket and it's super hard to understand the logistics of the flight like where a layover is and some layovers are a day long. so in my book ... it's not worth the download
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! At Cheapflights, we strive to provide transparent and comprehensive flight information. We recommend using our filters and sorting options to refine your search results based on your preferences. Additionally, our customer support team is available to assist you via our form: www.cheapflights.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: There's a website called Wingie, please check it out and block it from your search results. It shows good prices but when you actually go and waste your time booking a ticket and reach the checkout, suddenly the price is doubled or even tripled. Kindly review and take an action.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for your feedback. Would you be able to share screenshots of this specific case via www.cheapflights.com/support? We will take a closer look. Best, The Cheapflights team

scraped_reviews.content: It would be nice if their system would sync up between the Android platform and their PC programming You go to put it at a certain time of day and it automatically resets to noon so if you don't stop it from doing what it's doing you get a reservation that you're never going to be able to make it to so your car is not going to be there when you get there.

I can't add phone number and I didn't received an email after paying the booked flight Zamboanga to Cebu for 3 person via Philippines Airlines for coming October 22, please do an immediate action for this
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for reaching out. Please note that Cheapflights is a travel search engine that helps you compare prices, but the booking and confirmation process is managed directly by the airline or travel provider. We recommend contacting Philippines Airlines directly to confirm your booking and update your contact details.

Even if your original flight itinerary changes, they do everything they can to make sure you arrive to your destination in a timely whether it's for a vacation or business trip. Lynette A. from VIP support was very friendly and helpful when I needed to make. Easy to use, nice to look at, good customer service! I was worried other reviewers seemed like they had issues but they've been great with me!

The sheer volume of options can be overwhelming. It would be nice to have an option to dislike some flights that match your criteria, alternatively being able to swipe off or hide the options when whittling down the list would be helpful. I also want to be able to remove things like self-transfer.

Cheap flights is very helpful when planning trips. They do everything they can, to make sure you arrive to your destination. Easy to use, nice to look at, good customer support. This app is a great app for flight booking. 5star from my side don't know why so many peoples rated this app very low but this app is amazing ü§© and I have found many flights for great prices.

It's an ok app but if they could solve the problem with syncing with seller's websites Sometimes when you click on selling sites with selected price but the the link page gives error to upload the link. Otherwise it's good and convincing app to purchase your flights with the lowest rates at fast as possible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Aki, thank you for your feedback. Please feel free to reach out to us via this link: https://www.cheapflights.com/feedback/form and we'll gladly take a look. Best, Cheapflights

scraped_reviews.content: worst company ever, they have a travel agency branch under the same name and the customer services is disgusting. If they are busy they BLOCK your number and have also taken a payment of ¬£3000.00 and not issued our tickets. we have been blocked for weeks without a word of our tickets. WHAT A SCAM ! They also sent "e tickets" a while beck, which when confirmed with the airline, there was no record of us traveling with them under those ticket numbers. Company is a scam 100% dont recommend !

Even if your original flight itinerary changes, they do everything they can to make sure you arrive to your destination in a timely whether it's for a vacation or business trip. Lynette A. from VIP support was very friendly and helpful when I needed to make. Easy to use, nice to look at, good customer service! I was worried other reviewers seemed like they had issues but they've been great with me!
it is the best app for flight booking
easy, fast and reliable

might be chepflight have some good agencies but I have worst ever experienced with smartfares i book flight and I got confirmation email after 2 days its canceled by its own even travel date is still 4 days ago I was paid 390 usd and now they want to refund 188 usd its not even my fault its big scam website I request chepflights please dont have these kind of scamerz in there app please
scraped_reviews.replyContent: HI there we're sorry to read about your experience. Please reach out with your booking details to our support team so we can follow-up: www.cheapflights.com/android-support

scraped_reviews.content: I must sound dumb, but I might not be fully reaponsible for that. I booked a flight and my car rental from this app. For some reason the dates and time changed automatically. I didnt realize it until I reached the airport and figureD out that my flight is a month later. I had to spend almost $1000 dollars from houston to Atlanta cz I had to go. Then when I reached Atlanta again my car rental was also messed up. Why would you change the date automatically to mess up the plans?
absolute rip off do not use. airports and hotel aren't anywhere near each other

I thought this cheap flights app was well priced. But after shopping around it's far from cheap! They don't split tickets and after searching low flights I saved $800 bucks on my flight. I used this app many times but not any more.

Really helpful app to assist in securing the best flight ticket pricing, until one of the companies promoted by Cheapflights scams you. Geostar is a terrible agency that has failed customers regularly. Their service is shockingly poor and often failed to return customers money on flight tickets they never booked. Response to emails are poor to nonexistent as well. This is unacceptable.

Absolutly HORRIBLE! They use a third party that uses the internet NOT the app and when you finally get to purchasing the tickets its ups the price and i tried several times with different flights and it kept doing the same thing so that means...ITS A SCAMMMMMM!!!

I am confident and happy when planning and booking my flights. Cheap flights is the best and very reliable. I had no issues. Their service speaks for itself. I will continue using Cheap flights. Thank you for service excellence.

title: Mob Control
description:
üåü Lead, Multiply, and Conquer! Mob Control delivers thrilling tower defense action where you grow your mob, deploy powerful champions, and crush enemy bases. Unlock collectible cards, conquer exciting modes, and climb the Champions League. Face new challenges, earn rewards, and discover fresh content as you rise to tower defense supremacy!

üè∞ Unleash Your Inner Commander in Mob Control: The Ultimate Tower Defense Clash! 

üèÜ Defend, Conquer, and Rise to Victory in this Epic Tower Defense Showdown! 

Are you ready to become the ultimate champion in the world of tower defense battles? Mob Control brings you an unparalleled strategy and action-packed experience that will test your skills, wit, and tactical prowess. With oddly satisfying gameplay and a wide array of features, Mob Control is your gateway to tower defense supremacy.

Oddly Satisfying Gameplay: Create, Grow, and Lead!

Experience the strangely satisfying thrill of watching your mob multiply as you aim and shoot at the gates. Witness your army grow to massive proportions!
Strategically deploy your mighty Champions to break through enemy mobs and reach their bases. Choose the best combo for victory!
Explore intriguing level elements like speed boosts, multipliers, moving gates, and more, adding depth and challenge to your gameplay.

Become an Immortal Player: Rise Through the Ranks!

Earn Championship Stars by emerging victorious in battles, fortifying your bases, and dominating tournaments. Show the world your tower defense prowess!

Climb the prestigious Champions League using your hard-earned Championship Stars and become an immortal player, joining the elite few who have conquered this tower defense realm.

Fortify Your Base: Shield Your Dominion!

Secure your base from enemy raids by winning battles and earning valuable shields. Protect your hard-earned resources and maintain your tower defense dominance.

Unlock and Upgrade Cards: Collect, Evolve, and Dominate!

Win battles to unlock booster packs of varying rarities and enhance your card collection. Collectible cards hold the power to elevate your tower defense strategy to new heights.

Unlock all the Cannons, Mobs and Champions in the armory and discover their amazing evolutions as you level them up.

Diverse Game Modes: Challenge and Conquer!

Engage in thrilling game modes that keep the action fresh:
Base Invasion: Raid enemy strongholds, pilfer coins, and claim bricks from rival players. Plunder and dominate!

Revenge and Counter-Attack: Turn the tables on attackers and seek retribution against those who challenge your tower defense might.

Boss Levels: Test your tower defense mettle in unique level layouts, earning extra bonuses as you conquer the most challenging adversaries.

Season Pass: A Constant Stream of Fresh Content!

Dive into ever-evolving content with our monthly Season Pass.
Complete quests, advance tiers, and unlock new heroes, cannons and skins

Always Improving: Join the Evolution!

Our dedicated team is committed to delivering fresh mechanics and content every month. Stay connected and share your ideas via Settings > Discord, actively contributing to the evolution of Mob Control.

A Premium Experience: Your Choice to Play Ad-Free!

Mob Control is free to download and utilizes ads to support ongoing development. Opt for the Premium Pass or a permanent no-ads package to enjoy uninterrupted tower defense action.
Speed up your progress and reap extra rewards without watching ads, thanks to Skip‚ÄôIts.

Support and Privacy: Your Satisfaction Matters! Connect with us in-game via Settings > Help and Support whenever you need assistance or have questions. Your privacy is crucial to us. Review our comprehensive privacy policy at https://www.voodoo.io/privacy

Join the tower defense clash like never before with Mob Control! Rally your army, harness the power of collectible cards, and become the tower defense champion you were born to be. Download now and embark on your journey to tower defense glory!

summary: Join Mob Control: Grow your army, lead your mobs, and conquer the battlefield!

scraped_reviews.content: There are TOO MANY ADS for this game and FAR TOO LONG (more than 50 seconds). It's killing the fun and I'm reaching a point of just deleting this. Especially when slapped with an ad in another language "REALLY!!?" You're expecting someone to just sit through it without understanding it. Even the pricing for the extras are outrageous. I watched a few ads and wasn't rewarded because the app restarted, on numerous occasions, so I don't watch the ads any longer (that's too convenient). Check reviews

This game is a lot of fun and extremely addictive. However, it can also be infuriating! I would easily rate it 5 stars, except there have been so many instances where coming back from an ad causes the game to freeze. with no option but to force close and relaunch, causing lost matches, streaks, and potential rewards. Still pretty fun, though.

I give this a 3 because this is a great game, but I can't stand ads. Not only do they exist, but you offer them to multiply rewards. And even when multiplied rewards are refused, you show an ad anyway. Might as well give me some kind of reward just for the troubles. The biggest one is having an ad playing on the side of the game. Completely distracting me and interrupting any music I have in the background. Edit: this is for your ads in other games closing that game, and forcing your game open.

The amount of times there are too many enemies on the screen to the point the game starts freezing is frustrating. When it freezes that bad, the enemies pass right through your guys and multiplier gates don't work for you causing you to lose no matter how good you are. As addictive as this game is, it's a giant pile of üí©. Save yourself the frustration and play something else not made by this company. Update: The game is still a lagging hot mess, extremely repetitive, with little to no updates!

Had a "data error" and my points were not being added to the scoreboard. Restarting the app and my phone did not help so I un-installed and reinstalled the game and lost 2 months of progress. Once I learned I could not recover it, I canceled my subscription. I refuse to go through the grind again. Fix your data issues. This one cost you a paying customer.

I've played this game nearly every day for about 2 months and got up to divine tier. It's a fun time-waster game that has nice and easy upgrades to achieve. However, it gets repetitive. I almost never lose a battle anymore unless 2 specific maps randomly generate. It's also a total ad-heavy cash grab. Everything it suggests is something to spend money on. Lastly, you reach a point where your brick bank doesn't cover the cost of upgrades so it gets annoying to have to space out your upgrades.

Game is decently entertaining, but freezes far too frequently. From what ive gathered from other players, this has been an issue for quite some time. If you're not going to tackle the freezing issue, you need to add the ability to resume non-live battles after restarting the app. When ive spent earned currency to start an event mission and thats all lost because it froze, and me restarting counts as a failure, it drives me to not want to play anymore.

Honestly would be a 5 if it weren't for how intrusive the ads are. I don't mind watching a quick ad between rounds but the ones that pop up in the middle of games are too much. Interrupts any music you're listening to as well. And you might as well use the ad multiplier at the end of each round. You're forced to watch most of the ad regardless.

I've had it for almost 2 weeks now and at first it's great. Now every single battle is lost. I can only go against more leved opponents and can't chose otherwise. It's so aggravating to lose every single match. I can't level up my guys since I can't win. And you have to have network connection to play. Not horrible but it sucks. I was hoping it would turn out good but it was a complete let down.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear about your experience. üíî Reach out to us at [our support page](https://moc-support.freshdesk.com/support/home) so we can make it right!

scraped_reviews.content: First off, it's exactly the game it advertises(FINALLY!)! Super fun game and very simple. It's sort of like clash of clans meets mobs. You upgrade your gun, unit, and hero cards by playing matches. You can spend one whole whopping dollar on coins and then it removes all required ads (though you can watch more for bonus goodies if you want). On top of that you can do events to get "ad-skip" vouchers that let you get the bonus goodies with no ads. Honestly, awesome game and I love it!

This game is fun and worth playing. With that said, the reason I give it 3 stars is the fact that the "season" rewards aren't included in the premium pass. They offer the pass at a $2 discount, but I feel like for $100 for the premium pass should include the season pass. I don't mind spending money on games especially if they are fun (which this one is) but asking for more money for the "premium rewards" after just giving you $100 for the premium pass is a little ridiculous. Fix that and 5 star

Reasonably-fun game with plenty of side-to-side arcade action, but you WILL be forced to watch many, many, many, MANY ads (or make purchases) in order to continue playing this game. There is literally no way to beat some levels without watching ads to boost your cannon speed or revive after a ridiculously-difficult level. Having said that, it is actually quite fun, I'm at Celestial tier just watching about 100 ads over the past few months, so I'm at least having fun with it.

The game itself is pretty fun, but... They have a mini game that lets you collect loot per level. I was at a hard level and lost, and it gave me the option to revive. It said if I quit, I would lose the loot FOR THAT LEVEL with pics of the loot specific to that level. Since it said that, I assumed I would keep the loot from previous levels and chose to quit instead of trying again. Then it told me I had to pay $0.99 to keep the loot from previous levels!! I'm furious about the deception.

I really like this game. However, recently some of the ads you can watch for bonuses are unendable. Like. you cannot click out at any point to get back to the game at the end. The only out takes you to the play store but will not let you return to the game. You must restart the game and lose whatever bonus or even regular 'loot' you got for beating a round. Extremely frustrating.

I would like this game more if you weren't forced to watch ads that start the game over and wipe away any rewards you won in the round. Every single round offers a multiplier ad. If you skip it, it will make you watch one anyway and then take you to the play store, which starts the game over again. Every single time. What's the point? Greed. How about no ads? It would be nice if we could play a game without something being sold to us every second.

would have been a 5 star only that this game crashed on me to the point where I uninstalled and reinstalled only to lose previous data. afterwards, the game continues to crash when there is a big win or after upgrading characters. I've read where this continued to happen to PAYING gamers and that's terrible üòî because the game itself is a blast! complete time killer and enjoying every minute of it. if ads aren't a probable, and you happen to have a stable build, yup the subscription is good üëç.

It's fun but the long ads are too much. I paid for no ads. I understand watching one to extend a life or whatever but they are OVER A MINUTE LONG! The mistplay ad plays 3 times in one video. Then it's a 10 second counter. Then it's a 7 second counter. Then they offset the X. There are several that do this and it's completely insane. Especially when I already paid you, and I purchase extras!! Do better.

Reducing rating from 5 stars to 1 star until the advertisements stop opening the game in the Play Store even without the user clicking on it. This is a new problem, last few days. If this is a conscious decision, it's really a misled one. Given how many ads you have to watch to do anything in the game (even if you pay), it's ridiculous that the app will force switch to the advertisers' without your consent.

Good game, just like the ads. The app logo doesn't do it justice. It's very addicting, and you dont have to pay. Short ads that you can skip through after 5 seconds, and the only forced ones are after a battle. Small base thats straight-forward, no "collecting resources". So overall, great option for anyone wanting to kill time and have fun with some action/strategy.

This game was a ton of fun when I first downloaded it. I liked the different missions or goals to strive for. But since they've put many of these missions behind a paywall, you can no longer complete seasonal, weekly or even daily goals without spending money. They've made their own game redundant by making it impossible to win. They really fouled up and I doubt they even realize it.

Very disappointing click bate game. You strat on a "free tire", then lured into always watch adds to progress well. This is going for a few weeks to get you addicted. Finally, You hit tire 3, and when two or more of your mobs get to level 75, you start getting four out of 5 battles against unfairly strong enemies, which makes further progress painful unless you pay. Oh, most good reviews are because you prompted over and over to give high rating when its still fun during tires 1 and 2. Stupid.

I used to play this game a lot but when I play other games where you watch an ad to get a bonus or more lives the developers of mob control has intentionally made the 'X' to close the ad so tiny I repeatedly get brought to the Google Play store. it's dishonest and so annoying that I deleted the game and will never spend money on it again!! every other ad I close no problem. Not to mention they angle the top of the ad on both sides as another way to get more people to have a miss on the 'x'

it's fun, but way too many ads. if you like ads, play this game. I'm close to just deleting this app. way way way too many ads. I purchased the iap to do away with forced ads... but this game incentivizes watching ads to get the different bonuses and perks that speed up the game. without them, everything slows to a crawl. I've been playing for a couple days, and I think I'm about done.

While the game is fun, it's getting a 1 star rating for purposely, seemingly randomly, setting the difficulty level so high it's literally impossible to beat a level, even if you use paid ad skips to get all the power ups beforehand. That's just blatant thievery. You can't beat the opponent when they're 2x your level!

Ads ruin this game. I've been playing this game on and off for about a year but everytime I come to it, I am reminded of why I stopped playing: the ads. The game itself is fun and a total grind which I don't mind, but when you have an ad after every single match, it gets annoying. What's even worse is that the ads glitch the game. So essentially I could get a bunch of in game currency, an ad pops up, and it makes me lose all my rewards. A pop up says put in money to get rewards... No thanks..

the more I play the more intrusive the ads are becoming. At first I really enjoyed this game. played for hrs on end daily. Didn't mind the ads. most were pretty short and all could be closed really easily. Now every single ad forces open the play store. once that happens the game app restarts and no rewards given. I would give the game play 5 stars but with the ads becoming so much more intrusive I can only give 2. I'm almost to the point of deleting the app. Fix this and I'll happily return

lower levels, the game is a great time waster. As you progress in the game, the ads will become more and more intrusive. The game will repeatedly ask if you want to play ad free for a fee. It's seems that if you click no, the game sends more and more ads at you. Ads will even pop up during game play and block part of the screen. The only way I've found to avoid the ads is by turning off your wifi/internet connection.

(edit-Used to enjoy the game, and gave it 5 stars, but now too often an ad restarts the game in the middle of a run. Also used to be able to continue a run multiple times until you complete it, but now can only continue once without having to pay. ) Enjoy the game very much. Ads are regular and expected, but usually only 15 seconds long, with occasional longer ones. You can watch an ad each run for extra fighters on your side, which is occasionally necessary to win the level.

It starts really fun and you get to play a lot without interruption but the game suddenly started pushing more ads. Then it made me watch an ad after every 45 seconds of gameplay. I'm not exaggerating; the battles only last about 45 seconds to a minute then you have to watch a 30 second ad. I'd give it one star but the gameplay is honestly fun. It's just too many ads to be playable.

the game is easy at the beginning but gets to a point where there are too many enemies to the point you have no chance at all and it freezes as well. it will also kill you randomly even though there aren't any enemies. TO MANY ADDS 50 SECONDS PLUS PER ADD. upgrading things takes forever and to be able to get most of the characters and different weapons takes forever to get enough cards for the thing youre using but once changed all you get is cards for the previous character.

Loved this game and how playable it is without "forced ads," then a minor update happened where most regular battles are suddenly "super hard" and unbeatable. Judging by other reviews, this seems to be a recurring issue. I can't progress anymore and literally can't play the game. And for some reason the boss battle has completely disappeared. Disappointed. Docked a star because the issue is not fixed and now it's lagging. There's no reason to keep playing except to spend money.

Well the game was good for about 2 hours. Yes, it's just like the ads you get, everywhere! The first couple of hours, you can choose if you want to see ads. Watch an ad get a free upgrade! No ads, perfect. THINK AGAIN. After about the second hour worth of playing time, you GET ADS AFTER EVERY BATTLE!!! I'm giving it 1 star because I was just forced to sit through 12 ads on my 30 min lunch break. Done with this garbage.

Ad System Needs Fixing. There's too many times where you'll watch an awful Royal Whatever game ad that just goes on forever and ever and ever, and you click the "x" only to be taken to another screen and then another, only for it to not count and you have to watch an ad another 1-4 times for it to count. I'm not watching some garbage, minute long ad for a "meh" game.

This is the absolute BEST ad watching app out there!! After about 8 or so hours of play, you'll be doing essentially nothing but watching ads. Sure there's 3-5 seconds of gameplay in between but you'll hardly notice it. Just that little bit of progress and you'll be watching your favorite (or least favorite) ads over and over and over and over and over and over again until you forget how to play the little snips of whatever the game it is that pops up between the ads.

I actually like this game, even paid to have the ads removed. However, your ads in OTHER games are the most annoying game ads I've ever experienced. When I'm playing a different game and an ad for your game pops up, at the end of the ad it will force open and launch the game on my phone without my input. This is beyond unacceptable and extremely annoying. I don't want your game launching when I'm trying to play something different. It's enough that I'm considering uninstalling the game.

the gameplay is fine. good even. the problem is that sometimes the ads will kick you out of the game at the end of a battle even if you don't tap on it and wait patiently for the x to close it out. even the i could deal, but when it moves you out, instead of keeping your spot, you have to reload the game to get in, and the battle you JUST won, is totally nullified. frustrating enough that I'm uninstalling.

fun game but the ads make it unplayable. It forces you to watch a 35 second ad after EVERY SINGLE GAME. Each game is only about 30 seconds long so this all is essentially 50% watching ads. And the dumbest thing is that when you finish a match it gives you two options...either "Continue" or "watch an ad to multiply rewards"....but when you click Continue (presumably to not have to watch ads) it STILL makes you watch the 35 second ad. it makes no sense. This would be a great game but it's ruined

30 second gameplay, 1 minute ads. Totally kills momentum and absolutely makes you dread each round end. Tip: when offered to multiply with an ad or just hit next to accept your win; they both push you to a 1 minute ad lol. There is no way to avoid them without paying. It's faster to close and reload then to watch these incredibly long ads. Great games are so good you want to spend money on them. Weak games hold you hostage with ads.

This game is great! I like shooting games like this, but I hate endless ads. Here the only ads I get are if I want to increase my winnings or speed up a task. there's no cheesy story. the adventure mode cute and fun but just the regular game play is enough for me. If you do want to buy extras, it's not crazy expensive. They have really good deals, no more than a coke from the machine.

I like the gameplay, but there are quite a few problems with the app. The gun will stop responding to me moving it randomly, so I all of a sudden can't aim. And sometimes, the app will stay on a loading page instead of going to the ad for a multiplier. I have to close the app and lose the progress from that stage. It doesn't happen all the time, but enough for it to be amazingly frustrating.

Subject: Concern Regarding Score Reset After Game Update Dear [Support Team/Game Developer], I was progressing well and had achieved a high score in the game. However, after the recent update, my score has been reset to zero. It's quite frustrating to lose all that progress and have to start over again. I would appreciate it if you could look into this issue or let me know if there's any way to recover my previous data. Thank you for your time and assistance

There are simply levels the game doesn't want you to win without spending skip it's. Enemy spawn points too close, spawning big mobs steamrolling you, level advantage to boot, horrible map design, lower multiplier gates... Etc. I get the point... Please buy skip it's... We want your money. Gotta be a better way. Wish the dev would figure out a middle ground. Some levels are so easy they're over in ten seconds, others are so hard you lose in five seconds.

Like other comments, ads are very annoying, and 75 percent of the time, the game crashes, especially when it automatically goes to the Play Store. Don't miss pressing the small x at the end of the ad. It's to the Play Store and crashing. Hate when I watch an ad to be rewarded with extra cannon or fast charge and don't receive the reward. Also hate multiple ads after the initial multiplier, which usually happens a lot during World Clash event. Please fix ads to return to the game without hiccups.

The game itself is fun. Spent minimal to remove the forced ads, but ever since doing so the optional multiplier ads are much more intrusive. By this, I mean that when pressing the little button in the corner to skip or exit back to the game, it just goes to the play store and forces the game to restart and I lose out on the bonuses. I absolutely DESPISE advertisements that, even when trying to skip or exit, force the play store to open. Completely unacceptable.

SCAM ALERT! Scams for DAYS. APPARENTLY, disabling ads doesn't stop THEIR ADS in game. üòÆ‚Äç quickly, you get ads AFTER EVERY GAME. the games are a minute, max. and you get a 30 second ad after EVERY GAME. it adds so many mechanics, that the game becomes a chore, not fun, very quickly. if I have to grind for hours to unlock a WORSE ITEM THAN I HAVE, then what's the point? poor game design and clearly takes queues from Casinos to squeeze more money from kids and those with addictive tendencies.

This game is ok. There is lots of grinding, and the gameplay itself has barely any variation. The ads are accurate to the gameplay, though. I played this game for a long time with no issues. Then, while playing the game, malicious advertisements started opening themselves. I thought I had a virus from somewhere else, but that didn't seem to be the case. Played it again, and still had issues. Deleted the game and have never had issues since. Other games from the same dev have similar issues.

I really enjoy this game. its really easy to be good at it and grinding is easy to get into the ranks. you face bots with likliness of players profiles but real players will attack you in the same manner, in which you can take revenge. events are cool and overall I feel the game is generous with its gacha system. Would definitely be 5‚òÜ BUUTTTTT there's forced ads, most of which are skippable after 5 secs. I wont rate any game high when they force us to watch ads while we're trying to play.

Great game until you discover "glitches" then becomes obvious that it's a scam to get you to watch more ads to resume play and not lose your win streak. I don't mind some ads after all they have to make money. After watching many ads, it will "let" you win. It became apparent when the attacking troops would not make to my side but I lost and had to watch ads to resume play. Most times, ads would not play, wouldn't register, be in a language I do not speak or not relevant to me. Uninstall.

was exactly as shown in the ads ( LOVE THAT!! no false advertisement) just had an update? I'm guessing, and now you can no longer watch more than one video to revive, you now have to pay for coupons... I don't know why they changed it but I'm now deleting the app. I refuse to pay to play. I don't mind the ads in between every single game because they were short ( 5-10 seconds) but now all of a sudden it's not good enough we have to pay...

Actually, it's a good game. It's what is advertised. BUT, they give gou no ads at first, until you advnace a bit in the game. Then, suddenly they aske you to buy or continue with ads which is a long ad after EACH battle. Also, one of the ads,"Bus Out", is either you install the advertised game or you restart mob control. It's more than annoying.So, I'll happily rate this good game 1 star.

title: Betterment Invest & Save Money
description:
Invest and save better with Betterment. Investing apps are a dime a dozen, right? So, you might be wondering why you should download this investing app. It‚Äôs simple: Betterment is a robo advisor built with technology that optimizes for you, creating a tailored experience that fits your needs whether you‚Äôre an investor-in-training or a stock market guru. Join the 1M+ people who entrust us with over $65+ billion.

As an independent digital investment advisor and fiduciary, Betterment is built to help you do what‚Äôs best for your money so you can live better. With no minimum balance, you can get started with just $10 in minutes. Keep track of your financial life across your short- and long-term savings goals with our easy-to-use app.

NEW CUSTOMERS EARN 4.15% VARIABLE APY* (as of 10/31/25) ON CASH 
-   Get an extra 0.65% APY* with qualifying deposit‚Äî11x** the national average.
-   Protect your earnings with up to $2 million in FDIC insurance at our program banks, subject to certain conditions. Betterment is not a bank.
-   See program banks at www.betterment.com/cash-portfolio

EXPERT-BUILT PORTFOLIOS TO HELP YOU WEATHER THE MARKET
-   Customize your stock-and-bond risk level with recommendations from the pros.
-   Choose one of our optimized, curated portfolios of ETFs, like Innovative Tech, Goldman Sachs Smart Beta, or socially responsible investing options: Broad, Social, or Climate Impact portfolios
-   Looking for an all-bond strategy? Try our BlackRock Target Income portfolio or our Goldman Sachs Tax-Smart Bond portfolio to target higher yields while taking on less risk than stocks. 

INVEST WITH TECH THAT OPTIMIZES FOR YOU
-   Rebalance your portfolio and reinvest dividends automatically
-   Limit your tax impact with automated tools like tax-loss harvesting and tax coordination between accounts
-   Set up recurring deposits on your preferred schedule
-   Questions? You can browse our expert resources or ask our financial advisors!

KEEP MORE OF YOUR MONEY
-   Invest with us for just $4/month, or pay an annual fee of 0.25% on your investing account balance when you:
          -   Have a total Betterment balance of $20,000 or more across investing and cash accounts you hold at Betterment, or
          -   Set up a recurring deposit(s) of $250/month or more into any account
-   Upgrade to Premium for unlimited access to advisors at just .65% of your invested assets, a fraction of the cost compared with traditional advisors
          -   These are CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER¬Æ professionals, salaried never commissioned, for a significantly lower management fee

TURN LIFE GOALS INTO MONEY GOALS
-   Manage money for everyday spending and get cash back with Checking
-   Save for that exercise bike, your next vacation, and more
-   Go beyond your 401(k) with an IRA
-   Use our projection tools to create a plan
-   Calculate how to reach your target with our goal forecaster

SEE THE BIGGER PICTURE
-   Get our all-in-one financial dashboard
-   Connect outside accounts, see your net worth, and view your investment performance, all in one place
